1.content:
You find yourself going through a normal day when you or others start to change size. This is suppposed to be a fun story so the more people add on to it, the funner and better this story will become.You can grow to anything under 1500 feet, and shrink down to anything above 1/16 inch tall. For the first time in a story, Im letting the reader be a female character, I realized that not every one who will read this will be a guy so I want to be fair.
Here are the characters; You, the main character, can be any of these three people;

You- Either, Davey, a 16 year old guy with a normal life, family and girlfriend. He is normally 5'10. Davey is intelligent and athletic, he has dark colored hair and is very well-liked.
or,
Liz or short. She is a teenage girl, she is very attractive and has long, beautiful hair, a nice body and is very playful and fun. She has a size fetish and has often dreamnt of being a giantess or being shrunken. She normally is 5'6 in height and likes to play sports ( soccer, baseball and basketball being her favorites.)
or,
Sean, a 35 year old guy who works at an office for a big business. He lives with his wife, and two daughters. Sean is normally 5'9 in height, he is smart and is very 'cautious'.

Wow, I never thought that this interactive would reach as many chapters or views as my oldest story, Shrinking, would, but it has and I have only everyone who added to thank for that.

Also, please check out my newest story, http://www.writing.com/main/interact/ite...
Lets see if we can get that one to be as popular as As Size-Changing Adventure!
1.title: Choose Who You Will Be

11.content:
Okay, now your going to be Davey, where do we start off this story for Davey?
Here is a list of Davey's family members;
Adrianna, she is Davey's 11 year old sister, she has long brown hair, she is very pretty but has a punky attitude, she loves to mess with Davey, she is normally only 4'10 tall.

Clara is your 17 year old sister, she has a great body and is very good looking. She has long black hair, she is playful and doesn't like Davey too much. She is normally 5'7 tall

Jacob is your five year old brother, he is very playful and Davey is his idol. He has short black hair and he is about 3'9 normally.

Ann, is Davey's mother. She is still in good shape for her age, she has dark colored hair like Davey and is very playful. She is a fun person and this may or may not be a good thing. Is normally 5'4.

Rick, Davey's dad, he isn't home much if at all. He is like Davey so there really isn't need for a good description for him

Now, where do you begin your story for Davey?
11.title: Where does Davey start?

choices: Davey shrinks to 5'7 ( he is normally 5'10)
Davey shrinks to a very small size ( under a foot tall)
111.content:
You (Davey), were sitting at home, in your room to be precise. You were just playing your xbox, just going through a nice summer morning.

You had been playing a for a few minutes a already and so far,everything was good, until you notice a blue mist coming from the doorway.

" What is that?" you think as you pause the game and check to see what was happening. You walk towards the door to inspect what the hell it was, when you start to feel a little dizzy.

You notice the mist start to go back out the door. You try to see where it's going, but when you open the door and see that the blue stuff had just disappeared. You were confused as to what had just happened, but you just went back to playing games, trying to make yourself this was all just some weird day dream.

About an hour later, ...
111.title: Just a normal day

1111.content:
An hour passed since you had seen the strange blue mist, but by this point, you had almost completely forgotten about it. You had been playing zombies on your call of duty game, but after a while, you got bored and decided to turn the system off.

You then felt a little uneasy as you turned the game off, almost if you had a major headache, but then, moments later, the uneasiness was gone and you felt fine again.
"Weird." you thought as you sat down on your bed.

Little did you know, you had just shrunk 3 inches and now stood only 5'7.
Just as your reaching for the remote for the tv, the door opens and in walks....

choices: You shrunk to 5 feet tall right behind your mom

Your mom walked into your room, " Hi sweetie." she said. You said good morning, but noticed your mom seemed bigger. You just thought she was wearing shoes, but you looked down to see she was barefoot. "Is everything okay?" your mom asked.

"Yeah, I just feel a little different." suddenly, you shrink another inch. Your mother now came up to your chin.

" Are you sure your okay?" your mom aksed again, you nodded your head, " Okay then, well breakfast is ready, so come down." Your mom walked down the hall and you followed, when suddenly....

Your felt a little weird, when suddenly, you see yyourself slowly shrink, your soon the same size as your mom, and then a little shorter than her. You were shocked, just stunned, and thats when your mom looked behind to seer you smaller than her. She was amazed.
" Oh my goodness! Davey, your s-smaller than me now! What in the world happened?" she said, you didn't know, you had no idea what had caused you to shrink, when your remembered the blue mist from earlier. You didnt sa anything though.
What does your mom do?

choices: You shrink 4 inches, going to 4'8 in height ( Your sister's are with you)
You shrink 3 feet in height!(your mom is with you)
1111111.content:
Your mom just stares at you, she can't believe what she just saw. Her only son just shrunk down to 5 feet tall right in front of her. She doesn't know how to react, it's too overwhelming and she ends up fainting. Your mom, who is now a few inches taller than you, falls over.

You go right to her and try waking her up.

"Mom! Mom! Mom wake up! Mom can you hear me!?!" you begin yelling at her.

Suddenly, your two sisters run up stairs to see why you were yelling. Clara came up first, but she was shocked to see you only 5 feet tall. Adrianna came right behind Clara, and was also shocked to find you at your new size.

"Davey!What happened to mom? and what Happened to you!!!!!" Clara asked. Addy walked right up to you and she was nearly the same size as you. Both of you were astonished, but when Clara stood next to you, you were stunned to see she was over half a foot taller than you!

You couldn't believe how short you were now.

Your mom was starting to stir and Clara helped her to her feet. " Mom, are you okay?" Clara asked. Adrianna was still staring at you in amazement.
"I'm fine honey, but Davey... He shrunk!" then your mom came running over to hug you.
" Oh my baby is shrinking!" your mother screamed.
Adrianna said quitely, " He may be smaller than a baby...''

"What happened Davey?" Clara asked you.
" I have no idea how this happened! It just happened right now!" you told her.

With all your family standing there in the hall, no one knew what to do about your sudden decrease in size. The only positive thing about this was that you had shrunk today and you had no school this week.
Everybody walked downstairs to have breakfast, but nobody was hungry anymore. Adrianna walked up behind you and began poking you in the back repeatedly .

" Stop that Addy, your really bugging me." you yelled at.
" What. Your just lucky that your still taller than me. Probably by nighttime, you'll be a little buggy haha." Adrianna than ran upstairs. Your mom shrugged her shoulders as she began thinking of the possibility of you continuing to shrink.
Then suddenly, as you were walking up stairs...

nighttime you were the same size(4'8)

As your walking away from all the drama your mom was making by talking about your shrinkage, you got a familiar feeling as you began shrinking on the stair way. Your older sister, Clara was already up stairs, but Adrianna, for some reason, had came back down to be with you.

You slowly shrunk down another 4 inches, meaning you were now 4'8! You looked around and saw that everything was slightly bigger, but as you turned your head, you looked up into the eyes of your younger sister. That's right, Up!

You had to looked up to see your sister's eyes. Your sister was now around 2 inches taller. You were speechless while Adrianna had the most devious smile ever on her face.

" So how does it feel to be the smallest person in the house now ahahaha. Isn't it great hehe." Adrianna laughed at you.

You mom looked at the stair way and was also astonished to see that you were no longer just shorter than her and Clara, but you were smaller than Adrianna.

" Davey! Did you just shrink again?" your mom asked even though it was quite obvious.
............

choices: you began to shrink(your 3'6 tall now)

111111111.content:
A few hours later, by around 5 o'clock that day, you had shrunk another inches, making you barely 4 feet tall. It was quite an interesting day, with Adrianna teasing you most of the day, you were just hoping for the day to be over and to get some sleep or even some alone time, however, your mom insisted on having someone be with you all the time, just in case you started to shrink again.

Well, you shrunk again and it was with your younger, but no longer little sister, Addy. She never left your side, you could see in her eyes that she was ready for you to shrink again.

"I just can't wait for you to shrink enough so that I can carry you in one hand, or when you could fit in my shoes and mouth, that will be so much fun." Addy told you. You kept telling her to stop, but she just said, 'im bigger than you which means Im in charge of you."

It became quite annoying, but at this point you stopped trying.

You walked to the kitchen where your mother was making dinner.

"Are you okay?" your mother asked.

"Yea Ma, Im alright, I just want to be alone, but Addy won't stop bugging me!" you complained

"Well dear, be grateful that your sister is caring about you so much."

"No ma! She just wants me to shrink so she can torture me!"

"Quit complaining dear. I made an appointment for the doctors tomorrow so maybe this will all get fixed."

You shrugged your shoulders and sat down at the table as your mother called your sisters down for dinner.
But....
111111111.title: later that day, you were only 4 feet tall

1111111111.content:
Just as your two sister's and mom sit down for dinner, you begin to feel weird. Your stomach feels like it's about to implode and that your chest is going to burst. You look at he face of your sister's and mom and you could already tell that you were shrinking again.

You shrink down another 4 inches in a few moments. Clara and your mom was stunned, while Adrianna ate her food and smiled at you.

"Oh My gosh dear! Are you okay?" your mother asked.
You said yeah and you ate your dinner, all this made you think all these terrible thoughts about you shrinking, you tried to get them out of your mind by just eating your dinner like if everything was normal.
....... After dinner, everybody sat down in the living room.

"Alright kids, I don't know what to really say about Davey's shrinking. But I got an appointment tomorrow for him so hopefully the doctor can help." your mom told you guys.

"Alright guys, I guess I'll just go up to my room and sleep." you say as you get up to go to your room, but your mom suddenly pulled you by the arm and made you sit back down. It was surprising to see how strong she was, or how small and weak you were.

"I don't think so dear. I'm not going to allow you to sleep by yourself tonight. What if something happens? No, your going to have to sleep with ______ tonight. ______ can watch you tonight." you mother told you.


"What! Mom that's not fair. Im still a normal sized person..." as you said that, you shrunk down to 3 feet tall in a moment. This kinda ruined it for you and your mother told you that it didn't matter what you wanted, you were going to be watched over the night.
Who would be watching you?

What does your mom tell your sister?

She walked back to her room, but she came across a problem as she began to think of where you could sleep during the nght.
Meanwhile, you hadn't been paying to much attention to what was going on around you, you were still stunned about how small you became and how fast you did as well, it was all too unreal for you and you just wanted to get some sleep, however the spot that your mother suggested for you to sleep in didn't seem to pleasent.

1111111111111.title: Custom Sleeping Bag

choices: Adrianna wakes you up whilst your mum is asleep
11111111111111.content:
"Well sweetie, can you think of anywhere else or not? It's getting late and you need some rest!" asked your mom.
You tried desperately to think but couldn't come up with any ideas. You really didn't like the idea of sleeping in one of your sister’s old socks but where else could someone your size sleep? Your mum was getting impatient and she set you down on her bedside table. You felt a little more shrinkage hit you as you dwindled down to just six inches tall. Your mum looked even more imposing standing over you looking down at your miniature form.
"I guess not mum. I just wish there was somewhere else." You finally replied.
"Well I think this will be the best place for you. You are going to have to get used to us big people making decisions for you whilst you are so tiny and helpless. Do you understand?" your mum stated in a firm voice. You just nodded.
"And I expect you to do what we all tell you. And that includes your sisters. They will be looking after you too whilst you are little" she continued.
"Yes mum. I will do what I'm told. I promise." you responded meekly.
"Good boy. It is for the best. You need to remember that we are like giants to you now." your mum said as she smiled down at you.
She then turned and called for Adrianna. Her voice was loud and booming and emphasised how enormous she was compared to you now. Adrianna came running into your mum's room. You couldn't believe how big your little sister now was to you. You were going to be totally at her mercy. When she saw you on the bedside table a huge smile spread across her face.
"Wow. He is even smaller! This is amazing" she smirked.
"I know. I have decided that Davey should sleep on my bedside table and I thought that one of your socks would make an ideal sleeping bag. Could you get me one, honey?" asked your mum.
Adrianna beamed "Oh what a great idea. You know mum, the pair I have been wearing today are my softest. They are so warm and cosy. I think they would be the best ones."
You couldn't believe she had suggested that you should sleep in her dirty socks but your mum seemed to think Adrianna was doing it out of kindness rather than a desire to humiliate you.
"But mum can't I at least have clean socks." you complained.
"Stop moaning. Your sister is thinking of what will be nice and comfortable for you." your mum said with a stern look on her face.
Your sister smirked as she pulled one of her socks off her foot and placed it in front of you. You could smell her feet immediately but both she and your mum looked so intimidating that you didn't dare say anything. Then, all of a sudden, Adrianna reached down and grabbed you. Her fingers wrapped all around you and, although you squirmed to get free, her grip was so strong that all your struggles were useless.
"Here you go 'little' brother. Try it for size." She said as she lifted up her sock and dropped you in. She placed you back down on the bed-side table and you lay there with just your head sticking out of your sister’s sock.
" Aah, you look so cute! It makes you look even smaller lying there in Adriana's sock. But you are going to need a mattress "" said your mum laughing at you.
"I know just the thing." she said smiling as she reached down to pick something off the floor. She sat upright and suddenly she dropped her gigantic slipper next to you. You recognised her fur lined moccasin-style slipper but it was now almost twice as big as you.
“Here you go sweetie. Mummy’s slipper will be perfect!” she said as she picked you up and placed you inside. She must have been wearing it just before, as it still felt warm from her feet. The smell from your mum’s old slipper combined with the smell from Adrianna’s sock to make your whole ‘bed’ smell of sweaty feat. Adrianna was loving this and grinned as she looked down at you.
“Well. Aren’t you going to thank us for being so nice to you?” she asked in a mocking voice. You felt humiliated lying there in their used footwear, but also, as you looked up at your giant mum and sister, you felt so small and intimidated. You knew that you had to stay on the right side of them or life would be really difficult. So, instead of complaining about the smell, you forced yourself to show some gratitude.
“Thanks very much. It is very warm and cosy. I am very lucky that you are both looking after me.” you replied humbly. The smug look from your sister made you feel certain you would have to be very respectful of your sister now she was a giant to you. Your mum also seemed to like the fact you were showing appreciation for your make-shift bed and smiled down at you before moving off and getting ready for bed.
After a kiss from your mum you tried to settle down to sleep. Despite the smell, Adrianna’s sock was very warm and soft and the fur lining to your mum’s slipper did make a very soothing mattress. You lay in bed thinking of what life would be like at such a small size but soon drifted off to sleep.
The next morning...

The next morning, your woken up as your mom begins to put on her slipper, but wuickly she rememebrs you and takes the sock and you out. She pulls you out of the sock and surprsingly you didnt shrink that much if at all. You were probably still around 5 to 6 inches in height.

even though you hadnt shrunk more during the night, everything still looked huge and imposing and you couldnt feel any smaller or more helpless than you did right now.

You mom held you in her gigantic hand as she said, " Good morning sweetie." her loud voice nearly knocking you back. " Did you enjoy your night's sleep? Was your sister's sock comfy? " she laughed a little as she pointed out where you had slept.

" It was just okay mom." you told her.
"Are you sure, I doubt it smelled too bad, but whatever. Im going to get breakfast started so I need you to..."
111111111111112.title: Your mum wakes you up

1111111111111122.content:
You tried telling her that Addy's sock and her slipper really did smell bad, but she just told you to be thankful that they didnt just keep you in addy' sock while she was wearing it, or anywhere for the matter, there were plenty of worst places that you could've been kept.

She told you this and you became annoyed and scared, you may end up sleeping in worst places if you didn get back to normal in a while.
"Im going to get breakfast started so I need you to keep still while you stay in mommy's..."

Where was she going to keep you while she made breakfast?
1111111111111122.title: Where's she gonna Put You?

11111111111111221.content:
"I don't want to go back into your stinky slipper mum!" you shouted.
"Well I was going to put you in my pocket but I think you need to appreciate your position more." she said sternly. "I thought it was very nice of me to let you sleep in my slipper and all you can do is complain!"
With that she took off one of her slippers and placed you face down on top of her foot. You were powerless to stop her as she positioned your head at her toes. She then slid her foot back into slipper so that the top of her slipper pressed you down to her feet. If the smell last night was strong, this was almost unbearable. She hadn't showered yet and so you were engulfed in the smell of her sweaty toes.
"And you might want to show me some gratitude if you want me to let you out of there any time soon" she said loudly.

You knew she wouldn't be able to hear you and you couldn't move your body. What did she want you to do? As if to answer your question, your mum pushed her big toe up, pressing it into your face. You realised she wanted you to kiss her feet. You gave it a light peck but your mum continued to push it against your face . It was beginning to hurt a little so you decided to put more effort in. You began to lick her toe as much as you could, to make her feel you were showing the gratitude she expected. At last the toe lowered slightly releasing the pressure from your face.
"That's a good boy. Show mummy that you like the smell of her feet."
You felt so humiliated licking your mothers feet but you knew you had to continue. You kept on licking with all your strength and could hear the occasional giggle from your mother. She was enjoying this and didn't seem to want it to stop. After what felt like an age, your mum suddenly withdrew her foot with you on it. She reached down and picked you up. You were stood in the palm of her hand and felt so tiny.

"So. What do you say about complaining?" she asked you with a stern look on her face.
"I'm really sorry mum" you said dropping to your knees. You really didn't want to go back in her slipper.
"And how was your bed?" she pushed you.
"It was great mum. I am so lucky." you replied, knowing that you had to show her you had learnt your lesson.
"Good boy. Well as you like it so much, we will let you use it again tonight. What do you say?" she continued to press you.
"Thank you so much mum." you said to show you knew what was expected of you.
"I think you know your place. You must show us big people respect little one." said your mum who was now smiling.
Next..
11111111111111221.title: in her slipper?

choices: You finish up all your breakfast
You try but can't finish all your breakfast
111111111111112211.content:
Your mum set you down on the kitchen table and sat down in front of you. Even sat down she towered above you and you thought about what she had said. She wanted you to show respect and not complain about what she decided for you. This could be difficult to take if you stayed this size. In front of your mum was a plate of her breakfast. She was having pancakes and syrup. They looked delicious and you were really hunrgy but they were far to big for you.
"Can I have something to eat please mum." you asked.
"Of course Sweetie. You can share some of mummy's breakfast." she replied with a smile. She seemed to like referring to herself as mummy.
"Thanks a lot mummy. I am very grateful but I am not sure how am I going to eat it" you said as you looked at the huge pancakes.
"I know. This is going to be difficult. I am not sure you can get your mouth around normal size food. We might need to crush it up for you." she explained as she cut up a huge piece of pancake and placed in in her mouth. That one mouthful was more than you could possibly eat and emphasised how much bigger than you your mum was.

You looked at her waiting expectantly as she chewed a mouthful. You didn't want to push for her to sort out your breakfast but you were getting so hungry. You were suprised by what your mum did next. She lifted up a spoon and spat some of her mouthful of pancake into the spoon. She then place the spoon down in front of you.
"That should make the pieces small enough for you to eat sweetie." she said with a big smille across her face.
You looked down at the spoon which was filled with mushed up pancake and a lot of your mum's spit. IAlthough you liked pancakes, this did not resemble pancakes at all and glistened with her saliva.
"Come on honey. You said you are hungry. Eat it all up for mummy. I hope you are not going to complain after I shared my breakfast." your mum stated.
You looked up at her. She was looking at you expectantly and you knew she would not be happy if you didn't do as you were told. You didn't want another punishment but it seemed so horrible to be eating your mum's chewed up pancake. You decided it was best to do as she said so knelt down and started to scoop out some of the mush. You put the first handful in your mouth. Although the overall taste was similar to pancakes but the texture was slightly slimey from your mum's spit.
"Good boy, Now finish it up" your mum said. Good boy was a phrase she was using a lot. It was the kind of thing you say to a pet and made you feel really small. Was your mum starting to see you as a little pet?
Next..
111111111111112211.title: She made you some breakfast

choices: You kneel down and kiss her feet
1111111111111122111.content:
You were really feeling humiliated having to eat your mum’s spat out food. It made you feel so small but you were too intimidated by her size to argue back to her. She was just so big and powerful compared to you. She towered over you and could make you do anything, so you decided to try and keep her happy. Each mouthful reminded you how little and helpless you were, as you forced to swallow your mum’s spit. You ate all the food and your mum smiled down at your obedience.
“Well done little one. I am glad you are learning to do as you are told.” She said with a smile. “Now what do you say?”
“Thank you mummy” you said in an attempt to please your mum. She seemed happy with your response and her huge hand reached down to grab you and lift you up off the table. She held you up to her smiling face and you were amazed at how big she was.

“Now mummy has some things to do” she said as she lowered you down and placed you in her dressing gown pocket. You did not have time to complain and this made you realise how tiny you were to her. She had casually dropped you into the deep pocket without asking, like you were some possession.
You felt her move around the kitchen clearing things up and were thrown around in the pocket by her movement. After a while, you were lifted out of the pocket and placed down on the floor. You saw that you were back in her bedroom and in front of you were your mum’s giant feet, encased in the slippers you had slept in the night before. She kicked off the slippers and flexed her giant toes in front of you. You felt intimidated by the size of her feet and the familiar smell of her feet filled you nostrils.

“So Davey, I think I would like a little massage before I get dressed. Be a good boy and give me a foot rub.” your mum commands you as she places her gigantic foot in front of you. It was so big compared to you that it sent a shiver down your spine and you immediately obeyed your mum. You put all you effort into rubbing her feet and she seemed to appreciate your hard work, moaning in pleasure at the feeling.
“Davey, you are so good at that. You are going to be such a good pet!” she said without thinking.
“Pet?” you ask ,“Is that what I am to you now?”
“Sorry Davey, but you are so little to me now, it is hard not to see you that way. I mean you need me to look after you and you have to do what I say. So I guess it does make me more like your owner.” she explains. “Now give my feet a kiss and tell me you know your place.”

Your mum seems to be loving the total power she has over you. You look up at her smiling down at you. She is an absolute giant to you and you fee like a little doll in comparison to her. You consider what she has said. She is right that you need her to feed you and look after you. You also realise that you do have to do whatever she tells you because she is so powerful compared to you. You feel so frightened of how big she is.

Next...

you decided to do what she said, she say grining down at your tiny body see you kneel to her made her snile, just knowing you will do anything she says to do.....

you were just about to kiss her feet when you heard "stop" you looked up at your mom, confused as to what she would say next, "since I know you will do anything I demand, you can kiss my cunt" she grinned knowing you would most likely say yes.
11111111111111221111.title: You kneel down and kiss her feet

choices: Spending the day in my boot
Spending the day with your sisters
11111111111111221112.content:
You can’t believe that your mum is starting to see you more as some kind of pet. She looks down at you from above expectantly but, whilst you feel afraid of her size and power, you decide you are not going to just accept that you are her pet. You shake your head and turn to run away towards the door. You look back to see your mum smiling and shaking her head, amused at your actions. She slowly rises to her feet and immediately towers even higher above you. Fear spurs you to run on, even though you already know you have made a mistake. You hear her booming foot-steps approaching behind you, each one slightly shaking the floor as you run.

“Well my tiny little baby. I think it’s time for mummy to put you to bed. Now, where shall I put my cute little boy?” she said in a baby voice that made you feel even smaller than you were.

111111222111.content:
Your mum placed you down on her bedside table and told you to get ready for bed. She was so big and intimidating that you obeyed immediately stripping down to your boxers. She smiled at how quickly you did what she said and then reached down to the floor. When she sat back up in her bed she was holding her slipper which she placed next to you on with a huge grin across your face.
“This is just so funny. Do you remember what we were talking about the other week?”
As you looked at the gigantic slipper in front of you which your thoughts drifted back to a couple of weeks back....

You had just given your mum a foot rub and she had asked you to go get her slippers. You had come running back to your mum and knelt down to place them on her feet. You liked looking after your mum because she did so much for you.
“Gee mum. You just love wearing these slippers, don’t you!” you said as you put the first one on her foot.
“Well, I am always running around after you and they just feel so soft and comfy” she said as she took the other slipper from you.

“See. Feel how nice the lining is against your skin” she suggested as she held the furry inside of the slipper against your cheek. The fur did still feel soft, despite the fact that they were in constant use by your mum. You could smell your mum’s feet but it was a smell you found familiar and almost comforting. You closed your eyes and rested your face against the slipper in her hand as if pretending to sleep.
“Wow. It is really nice. It is a shame they don’t do great big versions of them. They would make a great bed. Much more comfortable than my hard bed.” You joked and your mum laughed.
“Yes or maybe if you were smaller you could just borrow mine. I could wear them during the night and you could sleep in them at night-time.” She continued the joke.
“Yeah, that would be awesome” you replied, a little too enthusiastically. Your mum laughed even harder.
“Gosh Davey, you must really like my feet to actually want to sleep in my slipper” she mocked

You tried to back-peddle. “Well..umm.. I guess if I was that little, I wouldn’t have any choice”
“Well you’re definitely right, you would have to do what I said. But I think you really want to sleep in my slippers don’t you!” She continued to wind you up.
“Wouldn’t you mind the smell?” she said as she shifted the slipper around from your cheek and held it in front of your nose and mouth. She was surprised when you didn’t struggle to move your face and actually took a deep inhale.
“They smell fine mum” you said deciding it was too late to try and pretend you didn’t like it. This just spurred your mum’s mocking of you on further
“Oh Davey honey, you are so cute. Even though you are bigger than me, you will always be my little boy, won’t you. Look at you, enjoying the smell of my old slippers and wishing you could be small enough to sleep in them.” She said laughing. ...Suddenly. your mum’s booming voice brought you back to the present moment.
“Well it looks like your wishes have come true” she joked with a big beaming smile, “why don’t you try your new bed out sweetie. I bet you can’t wait to climb into mummy’s smelly old slipper”

You could hardly believe what was happening. Next you...
111111222111.title: She reaches down and picks up one of her slippers

You wake up the next morning
1111112221112.content:
You suddenly feel so small looking at your mum’s giant slipper and then back towards your huge smiling mum. You start to back away shaking your head but soon realise you have nowhere to go on the top of your mum’s gigantic bedside table. The drop to the ground is like 30 feet to you. Your mum smiles at your look of fear and reaches over to once again pluck you up in her hand. She holds you up to her face in the palm of her hand to speak softly to you.
“What’s the matter honey? Don’t pretend you don’t want to sleep in mummy’s slipper because I know that you do” she says smiling. You are sure she can remember everything from a few weeks back and so there is no point denying it.
“I do mummy, it’s just I feel so little that it is a bit scary” you reply honestly.

“Aww. Is my little tiny boy scared? Don’t worry little one. Big mummy will look after you. You will be able to stay with me all the time at this size. I can keep you in my pocket during the day and you can sleep in mummy’s slipper at night. I will feed you and take care of you so you don’t need to be afraid. You just need to be a good boy and do what mummy says and it will all be fine” She says smiling.
“What do you mean mummy?” you reply wondering what she is referring to.
“You have to remember that I am a giant to you and I will be making a lot of decisions for you. Where you sleep, what you eat, where you stay during the day and just about everything else. I will be more like your owner and you will be like my little pet.” She says with a grin. You start to worry where this is all heading.
“But mum what if I don’t want to do what you say?” you ask her
“Well, you are so little now, you need to make sure that you do whatever I say. You will need to earn your keep as well” she replies.
“Doing what?” you question her.
“Well. I think you are an ideal size for taking care of my feet. You know how I love foot rubs and I can show you how to give me a proper pedicure. You will be my little foot boy and pamper me in return for me looking after you.”
“But mum...” you begin before she shakes her head and holds a finger to your face.

“Now little one. Don’t talk back to your owner.” She mocks you and grins “and don’t try and pretend you don’t like tending to my feet. You always gave me lots of foot rubs when you were big. And even though you always did it when I had my eyes closed, I did notice when you sometimes gave my feet a little kiss as you rubbed them. You can do that a lot now to show me how much you appreciate me looking after you”
You thought back to all the times when you had felt somehow compelled to give your mum’s feet a kiss as you rubbed them. You didn’t know why you had done it but she had never said anything before so you thought she might not have noticed. Now her you are standing on the palm of your mum’s hand. She is like a giant to you and you are so small and helpless that you need her to look after you.
“So, my little pet,” your mum spoke again “do you accept your new place in life?”

Your mind races with thoughts about what to say. You decide to follow your instincts and accept that your mum is right. Perhaps you were meant to be her pet and that is why you always enjoyed looking after her. Now you would do that all the time.
“Thank you for taking care of me mummy. You are right. I am lucky to have you look after me and I will be a good pet for you” you say as you kneel down in her hand. She beams at your obedience.
“What a good boy!” she says with a grin. “Now, time for bed little one! I know how much my little pet can’t wait to get into mummy’s slipper!” and she places you down into her slipper.

You settle down into the slipper for the night. It is just as you imagined it would be. It feels so soft and cosy as you lie on the soft fur lining and the smell of your mum’s feet engulfs you. You can tell you will sleep well and feel warm for the night. You shift your head to take in a deep inhale and your nostrils are filled with the smell of the slippers. It is a familiar combination of sweaty feet and perfume and you smile. You look at your mum whose giant face is smiling down at you from above.

“Oh sweetie. You look so cute in there. Sleep well.” She says.

Next...

Although part of you is scared about how small and helpless you have become, there is also part of you that likes what is happenning to you. Your mum has become a huge giant to you and she seems so big and powerful that you just want to keep her happy. You settle down in her slipper for the night. The smell of her feet surrounds you but it is warm and cosy in the fur lining and you soon fall asleep. The next morning you wake up to the feeling of movement and when you open your eyes you see that your mum is moving the slipper of her bedside table and placing it on the floor. She moves it so quickly that it is like being in a roller-coaster for you. When it finally stops on the floor you get up onto your knees in the slipper feeling and look up at your mum. She is sat on her bed and is smilling down at you.You are relieved to see that you haven't shrunk any more but she is still so huge and intimidating looking down from high above you.

"Well good morning, little one. Did my tiny pet sleep well in mummy's slipper?" she jokes at your humiliating situation
"Yes mummy. It was very nice in there. Thank you so much." you reply and your mum laughs.
"Oh, you are so funny. Look at you thanking me for letting you sleep in my smelly old slipper. You really seem to have accepted your place my little pet." she continues to mock you.
"Yes mummy. I want to be a good pet for you" you continue to grovel to her.
"Good boy. Now show me how grateful you are!" she says as you lifts one of her feet and places her toes onto the back of the slipper you are in. You know exactly what she wants and waste no time in showing her that you want to please her. You move forward on your hands and knees towards her giant toes. Her big toe is much bigger than your head and you begin to kiss and lick at the tip of her toe. She giggles at the feeling before shifting her feet to place another toe in front of your face. She repeats this will all her toes until you have kissed and licked all ten.
"Thank you so much for looking after me. I am so lucky to be your pet" you shout up to her.
"Oh my cute little pet. I am going to enjoy having you little." she purrs before reaching down and picking you up out of her slipper.

"I have a coffee morning with some friends today. Maybe you can come with me in mummy's pocket." she says as she puts on her robe to go down for breakfast. She casually drops you in the robe pocket. It is a soft fleece robe and you find it very comfortable in there although you are thrown around a little as she walks down to the kitchen. You can hear her making breafast when suddenly you hear the voices of your sisters coming into the kitchen.

“..in my pocket” she says as she drops you into the pocket of her blouse. You rest against your mother’s chest and although you are thrown around a little, you are comfortable. You can’t believe that you are so small that you can easily fit in her pocket.

You hear your mother get in the car and drive to her friend Sheila’s house. Sheila is a very pretty 38 year old mother who you find very attractive. She is only 5’ 2’’ tall and in the past has joked with you about how she preferred it when she used to be able to look down on you. Sheila’s daughter, Sky, is the same age as you and just as pretty as her mum but is only 5’ tall. You did date for a few months but in the end you decided to break up because she was a control freak. She always wanted you to do what she said and when she didn’t get her way acted like a spoilt Princess. You do not want either of them to see you in this state as you know they will be thrilled to see you so little.

When your mum arrives, you listen to the conversation between your mother and Sheila.
“Hi Sheila. Where is everyone else?” your mother asks.
“It is just you and me today, Ann.” Sheila replies.
“To be honest, I am glad because I have something amazing to tell you about.” Your mum continues in an excited tone and you know exactly what she is talking about.
“Wow, me too. Let’s go in and sit down.” Sheila says sounding just as upbeat as your mum.

You feel your mum move inside and sit down as you continue to listen in on their conversation. Your mum explains what has happened to you and describes it in great detail, including where you slept and how you seem to be accepting your new place in life. You can hear Sheila laughing at your situation and are surprised she accepts what your mum is saying without question.

“This is amazing because exactly the same thing has happened to Sky. She was having her breakfast and before she even had time to get dressed she shrunk down. I have to admit that I love having such as little girl. They are much more obedient when they are so little.” Says Sheila with a giggle.
You can’t believe what you are hearing but are kind of relieved that someone else has shrunk too. Having someone the same size as you will make life seem a bit more normal.

“So, you have got to let me see Davey.” Says Sheila enthusiastically. Your mum reaches her gigantic hand in her pocket and plucks you out to place you on the floor in front of them both. Sheila beams down at you from high above. You think about how you used to be so much taller than her and now she is an absolute giant to you. She stands up to loom over you even more. You can’t believe how big she looks as you crane your neck to look up at her smiling face. In front of you are her feet which are in a pair of open-toed sandals and they now appear enormous to you. It makes you feel scared of how powerful she is to you.

“Aww. He is so cute and tiny. I just love it. Well, don’t I get a kiss Davey” she grins.

You understand what she means and are so scared of her that you step forward to plant a kiss on her toe. She laughs out loud from above and then moves each of her toes to your face so that you have to kiss all ten.

"Alright, now I want you to give them a good rub and then you could go." You rolled your eyes, trying to hide the fact that you were terrified of shrinking even smaller in front of your sister.

You rubbed your older sister's feet, even though it took only a few minutes( it would take much, MUCH longer if you were smaller...) to do one foot. Clara pushed your head using her foot, with her sole on your cheek and her toes on your eyes and forehead, she pushed you aside, playfully.

"Stop it Clara!" You stopped massaging her feet.

" Why. Are you feeling SMALL? hehe." Clara laughed. Suddenly, you began to feel dizzy. With Clara's, bare foot still in your hands you noticed it was getting larger.

You were shrinking! How small were you once you stopped shrinking?
1111311.title: Be a Nice Bro

11113111.content:
The dizziness subsided and Clara's foot seemed....slightly bigger. At least you thought it did. Could it actually be bigger? Maybe it was all in your imagination. You looked up to Clara's face for reassurance beyond her sole. Her smile was all you needed to confirm your fears. You stumbled back in a panic, yelping as you turned and rushed out of the room. Behind you Clara was laughing, in all reality she wasn't sure whether or not you were actually shrinking as your big sister she just loved to tease and taunt you. Hence she let you run off as she moved her feet back to her bed to begin painting them, it was nice to at least get a good foot massage out of it all.

You on the other hand, were much more sure about your shrinking as you ran out to the hallway. Glancing down to your room, you heard a yawn coming from your younger sister's room as Abby's shadow appeared in the doorway. You couldn't let Abby see you like this. Quickly as possible, you raced down the stairs. At the landing, you heard the click of the door knob as someone began to enter the house. Your mother, a neighbor, one of your friends, it didn't matter. You needed to get out and think this through. You sprinted back into the house, through the kitchen and out into the background. You'd be alone out here, you could think this over.

Your backyard wasn't anything special. A rectangular patch of grass with a few trees, a small patio, and an underused swing set that Abby occassionally played on. It was backed up to a small ditch between your house and your backdoor neighbors. Heaving a sigh, you walked out, stopping by a tree just beside the ditch, then slumped against it, sliding into a seated position. You closed your eyes, catching your breath as you tried to clear your head and figure out what was happening.

SCHLORP

Your eyes opened as you heard an odd squelching noise coming from somewhere. You sighed as it seemed to stop, probably just a frog or something. You closed your eyes and began to think. Maybe this was all just in your imagination.

SCHLORP-SQUACH-SCHLORP

"Heya, mister," Came a girl's voice from before you.

You nearly yelped as you opened your eyes, only to find your backdoor neighbor, Kelsey, looking down at you, hands on her hip. You looked her up and down, confused for a moment. Kelsey was probably around 10, though you weren't absolutely sure. She was a tomboy, that much you could see. Her platinum blonde hair was cut very short and marred with dirt. She currently wore overalls and an orange t-shirt of some kind. Looking down, you quickly saw that she was barefoot, further more her feet were caked in mud, courtesy of the ditch between your houses which had flooded the previous night.

"Oh....Kelsey..." You replied, sitting up a bit, trying not to stand and show any possible height differences.

"Hey, Davey, wanna play?" She asked, sounding bored.

"Uh....thanks, but..." You began before beginning to fill dizzy, yet again. There was no doubt about it....you were shrinking. Kelsey stood before you as you dwindled down once again.
11113111.title: Resting in the Backyard

choices: Want to play in the mud too?
111131111.content:
You start to decline Kelsey's offer, but before you can finish, your stomach twists and turns, and a strange sensation overtakes your body. You see the overall-clad girl before you rise meteorically to the heavens, as well as the grass and trees and... everything. Not smaller! Kelsey leans down as she watches you dwindle, her bare toes squelching curiously in the dirt as her grime-caked toes soon grow to take up your entire field of vision.

"Whoah." You hear her say incredulously, peering down at your tiny form. You gulp nervously between the sprawling roots of the tree.

Kelsey's face breaks out in a toothy grin as she giggles excitedly, giving a little hop and a squeal of disbelief. Her filthy feet slam down, spraying dirt and mud around like a warzone. "Wooow! I didn't know you could do that! We've gotta play now!"

The Titanic Tomboy reaches a grubby hand down, fingernails caked with dirt, scooping you up like a bug off the ground. Her warm, dirty fingers clasp none too gently around your tiny midsection, smearing the dirt on your face.

"K-kelsey!" you say, muffled quickly as she bounds off in the dirt to lord knows where, muddy feet pounding the dirt.

SCHLORP-SQUILCK-SQUARP -

You are shaken in the young girl's filthy fist, before the fingers part revealing an excited grin peering down at you.

"HEYA MISTER!" Kelsey says loudly, hot breath washing over you as her huge mouth gets too close for comfort. You can't help but clap your hands over your ears, which causes the giantess to giggle even more.

Her feet splash down in a small mud puddle, not quite dry after last night's rain. This girl needs a bath, you think to yourself. You dangle between her spread fingers as she carelessly holds you like you're some insignificant toy she just found. which, to her, you basically were.

You peer between the dirt-smeared fingers to her feet, miles below, as she leaps into the shallow mud puddle with a unsettling squelch, wriggling her toes in the dark wet muck. You hear her giggle in satisfaction, pawing at the puddle with her filthy, rough feet. mud squelches up between the gaps in her toes as she scrunches them in the mud, enjoying it so much she almost forgot about you watching her calloused soles get even filthier in the gunk below.

"ooh! Sorry, did you-"

"Hurry it up, bug! Your big sis is getting impatient," Clars's booming voice called down from on high, sounding like the loudspeaker at a sports complex.

You approach her foot yet again and reach up your hand, but quickly pull it away as sweat the size of basketballs begins rolling down the doughy flesh. You'd drown if you tried to massage her foot with that. You back away a couple of inches, a motion that does not go unnoticed by Clara.

She doesn't give you time to formulate any sort of arguement as her hand clamps down around you looking you in a vice like grip.

1111311211.content:
You couldn't stand the smell. You were fairly certain some of these clothes were over a week old, judging by the stale smell of sweat and worse wafting off the fabric. You refused to just stay here, and so, after a lot of hard work, you managed to dig your way out from under a pair of Abby's sweat-stained panties. As you walked down the leg of her discarded jeans, you began to think on your options. Considering Abby was still at soccer practice and your mother was out grocery shopping, your best bet was still Clara. Hopefully she'd be a little less upset when you got back. You'd even be willing to try massaging her feet like she had wanted you to.

Eventually you made it out of Abby's laundry. The trek across her, rather messy, room after that wasn't too hard. You did have to avoid the occasional chip bag or fetid sock, but soon you're able to crawl under the door and make your way out into the hallway. Looking around you saw all the doors to the bedrooms on this floor, that was to say, your's, Abby's, and Clara's. Your parent's and brother's rooms were downstairs, meaning Clara was probably your best bet at this point anyway. Her door was ajar and you could see her on her bed, texting.

It was a long trek from Abby's messy room to your older sister's comparatively cleaner one. It reminded you of running the mile in gym as you jogged through the short carpet. By the time you got into Clara's room, you were practically out of breath. You felt eyes on you, looking up you found Clara glaring over her phone at you. At first you might have felt relieved at her gaze, then you felt the mixture of annoyance and malice it carried as Clara stood up. In only three steps, each of which caused the ground to rumble below, she was standing before you. A split second after, she had caught you in her tight grip, bringing you up to her face.

"I don't think you understood me before," Clara said, her tone harsh as she squeezed you in her grip, "I said I wasn't going to help you, but I meant I didn't want to deal with you or even see you."

"P-please, Clara," You say, squirming in her grasp.

"No," Clara says interrupting you, "I'm done with you little bro, so I'm going to..."

11113121.content:
You start walking out the door.

"Oh no you don't!" she says.

Just before you get out, Clara grabs your left leg and jerks it backwards, causing you to loose balance and fall onto the floor. She immediately jumps on top of you and pins you down in a neck hold. You try to get up, and you manage to, but it's much harder than you thought it would be. It seems as though your strength has shrunken with your size.

You throw her off of you and into a dresser, but she's prepared for such a move and bounces off the dresser, jumping back toward you. She wraps her arms under your arms and pins you again. This hold is much more difficult to get out of, but you're still able to do so using all of your strength. You get up and pin her to the ground this time. She tries with all of her strength to get out of it, but you're still stronger than her.

"Give up?" you say.

"Never!" she says, as she pushes again with all of her might, but you still manage to keep her down.

"You're not going to win." you say, but just as you finish speaking, you get a splitting headache and feel a vibration throughout your body. It causes you to flinch a little, but it fades quickly, and you go back into your holding position.

"Now give up, Clara. I'm still stronger than you." you say.

"Oh yeah!?" she says.

Once again, she starts pushing against your hold. What is she stupid? She's already tried this. Slowly she adds more and more strength to her push until she reaches what you're sure is her limit, and you smile, but your smile fades immediately as you realize it's not her limit at all. She adds even more strength, and more, and more. You hold on tightly, completely straining your muscles, but her push keeps on getting stronger. Eventually, it gets too strong for you and she breaks out, pushing you away from her and causing both of you to roll away from each other.

You both sit up apart from each other, breathing heavily, but she is the only one who is smiling.

"How...the hell...did you do that?" you say between breaths.

She laughs between breaths and smiles some more. "Why...don't you...stand up and find out?" she says, slowly getting to her feet.

Wondering what the hell she's getting at, you stand up to look her straight in the eye, but to your surprise, you end up looking directly into the bottom of her breasts.

Not good.

"Heh heh heh, looks like you're strength is in short supply, eh big brother?" you hear her say.

Holy hell. The top of your head doesn't even reach her shoulders anymore. She's definitely bigger than you now, in every way. You look up between her breasts at her smiling face and gulp.

"Or should I call you little brother?" she says, giggling.

She walks over to your door and stands in front of it, hands on her hips.

"If you want out of this room, you'll have to go through me." she says. She giggles a little before continuing.

"Bft...heheh...but that shouldn't be hard for you. You are 'still stronger than me,' right?" she says, "Why don't you prove it. Let's fight again."

You look up at her, warily. She has to be a foot taller than you now. Her arms are just as thick as yours are; they might even be a little thicker, and by mass alone she outweighs you at this point.

And she wants you to wrestle her.

Wow.
11113121.title: walking out the door

choices: Fight her, you might have a chance.
111131211.content:
"Well, little brother." Clara says, "Do you still think you're 'stronger' than me."

She glares at you with a predatory look of glee. She's so tall, now. Her body looks like a friggin tank compared to yours. There is no way in hell you're gonna be able to wrestle her, but else can you do? She gets down on one knee to make her face level with yours, which makes you realize how humiliating it is that she has to do so to be level with you. Her smile widens as she pretends to look you over and gets back to her feet.

"Yup, you're definitely stronger than me." she says, feigning fear, "I don't know how I'll ever be able to win against you." She giggles at her own joke.

You look at her, dumbfoundedly. She doesn't even think you're worth fighting anymore. She thinks you're completely worthless. When she sees your reaction, she bursts into full on laughter, grabbing at her knees and closing her eyes...

... leaving herself wide open for a surprise attack! If she keeps on laughing, you just might be able to pull it off. If you can gain enough momentum, you'll be able to tackle her to the ground, then you can run past her before she has the chance to catch you.

You gulp. If this doesn't work, you're done for. You prep yourself for a split second, then immediately charge at her, trying to gain as much momentum as you possibly can. She continues to laugh her ass off, completely oblivious to your actions. You gain more and more speed as you approach her. You brace yourself for the impact.

BAM!

You tackle her right in the stomach, and she falls over onto her back, the wind completely knocked out of her. You quickly jump over her body. She tries to grab at you but misses.

"Hey." she says clumsily, trying to take a breath, "get... back here!"

You run down the hall, taking one look back at her before turning a corner. She is already getting up. You'll have to--

All of the sudden... no... not now, not right now, anytime but right now! a wave of pain goes soaring through your body, making you scream in agony. You must be shrinking again. The pain lasts much longer than any of the previous ones. You close your eyes as the pain envelopes you, then it stops. A moment passes. You open your eyes.

Clara's face is right in front of you, and it is taller than you are. You gulp. She smiles.

"Well well well," The warmth and wetness of her breath wash over you with each word she says, the sticky smell of her saliva penetrating your nostrils. "that was a pretty good attack, little brother. You actually knocked me to the ground."

Her giant head backs up enough for you to see that she is sitting down, crosslegged. Her body is the size of a small building now. All you can do is stare. She lightly taps at the middle of her stomach, which sounds louder than a car crashing to you.

"Got me right here, didn't you. Good Job." she said.

She slowly brings her socked foot to the ground and slams it down right in front of you. The world shakes. She does the same with her other foot. The world shakes again. She slowly stands up as you try to keep track of her face, which is getting farther and farther and farther way. Impossibly far, farther than a skyscraper, farther than a god, farther than you could ever imagine. When it finally stops, all you can do is stare. Your body freezes, your muscles loosen, and a warm yellow liquid begins dripping out of your pants.

She smiles down at you.

"You want to try that tackling technique again." she says, "I'm sure it'll work just as good this time."

You fall onto your butt and stare. She brings her face down, so that it's a few feet away from you. She has an extremely dangerous look on it.

"Or are you ready to listen to me?"
111131211.title: You fight her. You still might be able to do it...

1111312111.content:
Despite the fear you felt at your very core, you couldn't give up. You couldn't surrender yourself and let Clara win. Yes she was now far bigger and much stronger, but you wouldn't run away from this challenge. Even though you were still afraid, you'd give her all you had.

With a deep sigh and shaky legs, you carefully make you way back to your feet. You see the Clarazilla looking down at you with a mocking smile. She's so arrogant, so self assured she'd win. She clearly didn't see you as a person anymore, just a means of entertainment.

That pissed you off. You were a goddamned human being! Not some twisted sister's plaything! Your eyes became as sharp as daggers as you glared back at your older sister. A newfound resolve filled your very being and your legs ceased their trembling. You were going to win no matter what.

"I'm going to win." You whispered. You looked her dead in the eyes and shouted it to the heavens. "I'm going to win!"

Clara must've heard you as she proceeded to laugh. "Ha! At pipsqueak like you is going to beat me? Get real, you couldn't even defeat a mouse at your size. The only thing you're good for now is being an itty bitty man servant. So accept that and give up."

"NEVER!" You shouted up to her. Clara smile soon faded and her mocking eyes turned furious. It would seem she was no longer in the mood to play. That was just fine with you. One way or another, you were taking this bitch down. Even if that meant you were going down with her.

"So be it. Then come at me!" Clara growled.

Clenching your fists, you closed your eyes, and charged. "AHHH!"

You began punching Clara's supersized toes as hard as you could but with very little affect. A your new miniscule size, your blows couldn't even make her flinch. Clara eyed you with little more than annoyance before flicking you away with her big toe.

You soared through the air and landed hard on the wood floor. You couldn't believe how strong she'd become. No that wasn't right. She was always this strong, it was just now you were weaker. You needed an edge, a weapon. "Think! What can I use?"

While you crawled around thinking, the sound of thunderous footsteps drew ever closer. "Really? You though a few punches would win the day? Get serious will you. You can't win."

The way things were going she was right. Unless you found an edge this fight would be over in no time flat. You continued to search until it seemed fate decided to smile down upon you. A pent up paperclips was just lying in the center of the hall. You ran up to it only to find it as heavy as a real sword. Well at least you could lift it.

Now that you were armed you were feeling more confident. All you had to do now was give Clara a good old prick. Before you could however, a shadow began to loom over you. You cautiously looked up to see a foot coming down on you. With speed you never knew you had, you managed to dive out the way.

A part of you couldn't believe your luck. The other part was beyond angry and hurt that Clara actually tried to squash you under her heel. She really didn't see you as a person anymore. Fine! Then you didn't have to feel guilty later about what you were going to do. Quickly you rose to your feet and jammed the paperclip into your sister's foot.

You smiled in satisfaction when she yelp in pain. You actually managed to wound her. The moment was short lived though as she began to swing her foot to shake you and your weapon loose. Her plan worked as you were sent into the railing of the hallway steps.

Your body was on fire from the impact with the hardwood. The only thing good that came from it was the pain let you know you were still alive. "At least all this pain tells me that I'm still alive."

You looked back to Clara who just finished rubbing her foot. You looked closely and saw the faintest amount of blood. That was good. That meant she wasn't as unbeatable as she thought. "That's it you little punk! When I get ahold of you, you're going to wish I'd squashed you!"

Right as she was about to grab you, you swung you body backwards and began to slide down the rail. You breathed a sigh of relief as you were just out of her reach. But now you were faced with a new problem. You were speeding out of control to the bottom of the stairs!

"OH SHIIIT!" you screamed!

Fate again seemed to be on your side as your crash landing was dulled by a pile of pillows at the bottom of the stairs. You began to laugh at your good fortune. You recognized these pink pillows as the same ones your mom told your little sister to pick up that she never got back to. If you survived this you had to remember to thank Adrianna.

Right as you got you bearings a loud boom that was like an earthquake knocked you off your feet. You rolled down the mountain of pillows and took cover behind a nearby plant. You peaked from around you cover to find Clara had jumped the stairs straight to the bottom. The pillows did the same for her as they did for you.

"Damn!" you cursed.

Clara looked for any sign of you only to fin none. She tossed the pillows around and even checked the bottom of her foot for you just in case. It would seem you managed to hide from her and could take a moments rest.

"Davey?! Come out come out wherever you are." Clara called. She was honestly starting to scare you again. Was she really treating this as some sort of twisted version of hide and seek? "You know I don't like hide and seek little brother. I wanna play search and destroy instead."

You gulped. Things were getting more out of hand than before. You had to think. She was giant and you were tiny and could shrink again at any time. You couldn't take her head on, which meant you needed to use the environment. The only question is where to go that would give you the most advantage?

To your left was the living room and to your right was the kitchen. Both had their own pros and cons. One space was large and filled with furniture and decorations while the other was cramped and filled with all kinds of cooking tools.

"Damn it all! What do I choose?!"
1111312111.title: Never Give UP

choices: You've had enough of this! Argue with your sister about how unfair this is.
11113122.content:
You sigh heavily. You absolutely don't want to do what you are about to do, but it's obvious that Clara knows you're shrinking. She might even have something to do with it, and it doesn't sound like your shrinking is going to end anytime soon.

You painstakingly turn around to look at her. Your "little" sister is much more intimidating when you have to tilt your head up to see her eyes. She gives you the most predatory smile you've ever witnessed. At your normal height, it would probably make you laugh because of how unfitting would be for her to give, but right now it makes you feel even smaller than you actually are. You try to act unbothered by it as you start speaking.

"A-alright, Clara. I'll do it." you say, failing to feign casual annoyance.

"You've made a wise decision, 'big' brother." she says.

She closes your door and locks it, then she sits down on your bed and starts untying her shoes.

"Come over here. Sit down." she says, gesturing you to the foot of the bed.

You regretfully walk over and sit down. She kicks off her shoes to reveal two very dirty, very wet socks, and almost immediately, you can smell the odor of her feet. It's horrid. She notices your reaction and smiles.

"I've been working all day today, so my feet might be a teeny tiny bit sweaty. I hope you don't mind." she says mockingly.

As she slowly pulls off her socks, the odor's strength and magnitude multiply alarmingly. Within seconds, you can't help but make an "Ewww!" sound and turn away as the smell of Clara's sweaty feet penetrates your nostrils. It has to be the worst smell you've ever smelled. It practically stings your nose hairs. How could such a beautiful teenage girl's feet smell this bad?

"Don't like the smell of my feet, huh? Well, you'd better get used to it, cause you're going to be smelling it for a long time."

Before you are able to even think of a retort, you get an incredible ache in your head, causing you to scream and shut your eyes in pain. This is not good. You must be shrinking slightly again. You feel your whole body vibrate intensively, and as it does this, the putrid smell of your sisters feet gets stronger and stronger and stronger. It takes a good five seconds before the pain finally stops and your body relaxes.

"Kgh...Bph...Bwahahahahahaha...oh my god...oh my god! Look how small you are. Holy...your as small as a---NGh...mph...phaaahahahahahahaaa."

You quickly open your eyes and notice to your horror that Clara's foot is now half as big as your body. The smell feels like its penetrating your entire being now. You gag and start coughing immediately, unable to handle it.

When your now much bigger sister finally stops laughing, which takes quite a while, she sits up and looks down at you, giving that same predatory smile she gave earlier, only this time it's a thousand times more threatening because she is literally five times as big as you are. She could literally do anything she wanted to you, and you wouldn't be able to stop her.

"Hey, look on the bright side. Now you can give my feet a much more thorough massage." she says.

She puts one of her feet directly into your face making you throw up. She giggles a little at your reaction, before continuing to speak.

"You'd better get started now. I'm not going to help you until you've fully massaged both of my feet, and who knows how much more you'll shrink. Who knows how much harder it will have to be."

This is ridiculous. Is she serious!? How could she even think that you'd be able to massage her feet at this size!?

"Clock is ticking." she says, giggling a little.
11113122.title: going back to Clara

111131221.content:
"No!" You manage to shout after a moment, using both hands to try and push Clara's sweaty sole away. You were unsuccessful but it made your point.

"Excuse me?" Clara asked, cocking her head to the side and crossing her arms.

"Clara! I'm sick!" You shout up at your amazonian older sister, "Now hurry up and take me to a doctor's office. I'm not massaging your disgusting feet or being your slave. If you won't take me, I'll just go ask mom to."

You may have gone a step to far, but you felt that Clara had to be put in her place. Fear also motivated you considering you were only half the size of Clara's admittedly big feet. Regardless of rational, you hoped off the bed, expecting that your big sister wouldn't help you. Embarrassingly enough at less than two feet in height, the bed was taller than you. Groaning as you hit the floor, you began to walk towards the door. About halfway there you remember it was locked and were just about to request that Clara open it.

That's when something hit you in the back. It was warm, damp, and unbearably heavy. In an instant this new weight brought you face first into the carpeted floor of Clara's bedroom, grinding you down. You quickly realized it was Clara's foot as her toes drummed on your head, getting sweat into your hair while her heel pressed against your waist, ensuring you couldn't move. She ignored your muffled cries into the floor.

"To bad for you it's just us two at home. Mom's running errands and Adrianna's off at soccer practice," Clara noted, her toes scrunching up and flicking you in the back of the head, "But since you don't want to rub your BIG sis's feet, we'll have to find something else for you to do."

As Clara spoke, she tugged a silk scarf free from her bed post. Bending over, she lifted her foot and immediately wrapped the scarf around your upper body, forcing your arms to your sides. She bent your legs back and wrapped the scarf around them before tying it tightly, forcing you into an immobilized state of being hogtied. Lifting your wrapped up form like she would a purse, she tossed it back at the foot of her bed.

"Now then...what to do with a useless little brother," Clara chastised, standing over you with a finger tapping to her chin in contemplation. She soon grinned deviously as she decided to....
111131221.title: Enough is Enough

choices: You Get Started With Her Feet
111131222.content:
You slowly approach your sister's giant foot and kneel down in front of it. At your size you'll have to massage one toe at a time. You tentatively extend your hand toward her biggest toe, which is almost as thick as a basket ball to you. It is drenched in a horrid combination of sweat, grime, and sock fluff. Feeling it slightly, you realize that the grime is incredibly sticky; if you were to grab it too hard, it would probably be stuck on your hands forever. You'll have to be careful.

"What's taking so long, Davey? You haven't even started yet. I guess I'll have to give you a hand." Clara says.

Without any warning whatsoever, she grabs the back of your head with her giant fingers and shoves your face directly into the grime in between her toes, forcing a great deal of it into your nose and mouth. You try to lift your head out, but Clara's hand keeps you from doing so.

"Ah ah ah, not yet, Davey. You can't be lazy when you're giving me a massage." she says.

She pushes you harder into the grime, making you loose the ability to breathe. You can't stop her at all. No matter how hard you try to push back, her fingers completely overpower you.

"There you go. That's it; get a real good taste." she says.

She finally lets go just before you faint from oxygen loss, and you fall onto the bed, taking a deep breath of air. Your whole head is completely covered in her grime. You painstakingly try to wipe it off with your hands and arms, but you just end up covering them sticky sweaty grime too.

"Now get started, unless you want to taste my feet again." Clara says as she giggles at how easy it was to hold you down.

You decide to do this as quickly as possible and grab onto your sisters big toe with both of your hands, squeezing it as hard as you can. The grime gets all over your already stained hands, but you don't care. You just want to get this over with. After about five minutes of squeezing and cleaning with all your might, you move on to the next toe, doing the same thing, and so on. By the fourth toe, you are already starting to feel tired.

Clara begins to giggle again, which can't be a good sign.

"Davey...I can barely feel that. Is that really the best you can do? I think you're being lazy." she says.

You look up at her, completely flabergasted at what she has just said.

"I want you to start over, and this time actually try." she says, half giggling.

"I have been trying! I've been using all the strength I have in my hands!" you say.

"Well, heh heh, I'm sorry Davey, but I can't feel it. Maybe you should use your whole body instead of just giving me your hands." she says.

"That's ridiculous! You're being completely ridiculous. I'm not going to start o--" you start to say, but she stops you mid sentence by pushing her foot into you and slamming you down into the bed.

She slowly pushes you deeper and deeper into the bed. Your rib bones start giving in, and a few of them snap, which makes you scream, but she doesn't stop. She slowly adds more and more weight, until you can't even breathe.

Then, after what feels like a lifetime of pain to you, she finally lets up, and you start breathing heavily. The look of absolute anger on her face makes you want to shit your pants, but her voice is surprisingly soft and smooth, almost sing songy.

"Now is that how you talk to your sister, Davey?" she says.

You quickly shake your head.

"What are you going to do now?" she says.

"I'm going to start over on your toes, and I'm going to use my whole body to do it." you say. The words come out of you automatically, as if you're not even in control of them anymore.

"That's a good boy." she says.

She brings her foot back towards you, not even noticing it knocking you over.

"Now get started." she says firmly.
