He could seek help from one of his relatives but it'll probably take a while to get any of their attention and wasting all of that inside his own home just doesn't sound exciting. He turns around and sees that his window was open, maybe he could try to seek the attention from someone outside and the thought of that sounds like a real adventure.

He spots a piece of paper and a small ruler on the floor, he decided to use those to make a paper plane. He ran towards them and begans to work.

It took almost forever to create this plane but he managed to get it done by now. Since the paper was very light, he has absolutely no problem carry it as he climbed his bed to the window.

After a good ten minutes of difficult climbing, Davey got to the edge of the window. At this point, he couldn't help it but found the view fascinating. He could see the houses, cars and even a few people across the road. He wanted to just sit here a little longer and enjoy the view, but he can't stay here much longer, he must find someone to help him. He feels the winds blowing and held his paper plane and gluped "I hope I'm light enough for this."

He squeezed his eyes shut and makes a leap of faith. Did he made it?
11123.title: Beyond The Window

1113.content:
An hour passed since the strange, blue mist had come into your room. You had gotten bored of playing the game, so your turned off the system and you were getting ready for the day.

You had brushed your teeth, took a shower, changed clothes, basically done your usual morning routine, when your older sister bursted into your room.
" Whoa! Clara, what's up?" you aked her,
" Come down stairs.. Hurry!" Clara took you by the hand and dragged you down stairs.

She stopped once she reached the living room, the same blue mist that had gone in your room earlier was just moving around the the top of the couch.

You looked at it, not knowing how to react, when suddenly, the blue mist shot out a strange ray that hit both you and your older sister. You were knocked out as soon as the strange ray hit you.

You began to wake up, you rubbed your head, you had allen on something hard, your back was hurting right now, but suddenly all the pain went away. You looked around and realized that you weren't in your living room anymore.

You tried to figure out where thew hell you were, when you saw Clara over by a corner,looking up amazed, you joined her in looking up and saw that you were still in oyur living room, but only it was a whole lot bigger! You estimated you and your sister were less than half an inch tall!

You were shocked, you were guessing your sister was the same.

You managed to say, " Clara! What the f*@k just happened?"
What happens next?
1113.title: The Blue Mist has made it's Return

11131.content:
As you and Clara tried to remain calm and figure out what to do, when suddenly the ground began to shake, you and your sister were knocked off your feet, the shaking was followed by a powerful, loud pounding/smacking noise.
" Is it an Earthquake?" Clara asked you in a fearful tone.
" I don't know!" you replied.
You had no idea what else besides an earthquake would make such an impact, when you saw a pair of towering legs and feet walk in. You looked in horror at this giant, you craned your head up and you were shocked to see it was your own, 'little'(maybe not little anymore) sister, Addy! You ran over to Clara and told her who it was. She was equally as shocked. Adrianna continued walked in your direction, what do you and your older sister do?
11131.title: No Longer the Little Sister to Either of You

111311.content:
You and Clara couldn't believe how huge Adrianna was, you two went running away out of fear. You slide under the couch and dragged Clara with you. Both of you sat there, silent, you two were scared silly at the sight of your younger sister being this gigantic.
" Addy is gigantic!" Clara shrieked.
"I see that. What do you think we should do?" you asked her.
" i think we should stay under here and wait for mom." Clara told you.
You agreed with her and you just stayed there. You two saw the titanic, dirty bare feet of your sister walk by. The smell drifted through your nostrils, you pinched your nose as the smell of your sister's feet was overwhelming. Clara covered her nose and said in disgust, " Does Addy ever f@cking wash these things?''
Adrianna walked to the door and opened it, she then walked outside. What do you think she's doing?
111311.title: run and hide

1113111.content:
You had no idea what Adrianna was doing, however, just a few moments after she stepped outside, she came back, but this time, you saw another pair of feet enter, actually, in fact, it was two more pairs, which meant that Addy had let two more people in.

You walked, slowly out from beneath the couch, to take a look at who just came in. You were able to see that they were ......, and they were just as big as Addy.

You called Clara to come out and see how big _____ were, but when she came out next to you, Adrianna's gigantic bare foot landed right next to you.
But before we get any further in the story, who walked in?
1113111.title: Whose at the Door?

111312.content:
“We have to get her attention!” Screamed Clara. “Maybe she can take us to mom!”

You couldn’t help but agree, Addy was a caring young girl with much love for you and Clara. Under these circumstances, there’s no was she wouldn’t.

The two of you begin running towards Addy, screaming her name and waving your arms.

Addy on the other hand had no clue of her two older siblings shrunk on the floor. Instead she proceeded to what she planned to do in the room: collect discarded laundry on the floor for her mom to wash. She got down on her hands and knees and began collecting the socks off the ground. This was perfect, she was now closer to the both of you.

You and Clara arrive at her jean covered knee resting on the ground. “Should we climb?” Clara hesitatingly asked. But you knew addy wouldn’t be kneeling for long, you both needed another route.

Addy put her head lower to the ground to search under the bed for other clothing. That’s when you noticed her braid resting on the ground..

“That’s it! Grab onto her hair and we’ll be closer to her ear!” You shout. Hesitant but overall willing, Clara agreed and the two of you booked it towards your little sisters massive blonde braid.

Once there, the two of you jumped and grasped the think ropes and wrapped your legs and arms around them. As if on que, Addy rose from her chore, dropped the clothes into the basket, and walked out of the room along with her two micro passengers helplessly swinging violently from her braid.

Clara continued to scream hysterically, almost immediately regretting the decision. You however were determined to reach Addy’s ear. “Clara! Shut up and climb!”

The two of you climbed up the woven braid of your little sister like a climbing wall. You were a football field length away to her ear when suddenly you heard another voice.. you mom!

She had just asked Addy a question. Then you heard Addie say “no way!” .. oh no..

“Hang on!” You scream to Clara, clutching the hair with fear.

Addy followed her aggressive answer with a violent shaking of her head, whipping her two siblings around viciously. You and Clara both scream and are flung from the hair..

Where do you both land?
111312.title: Incoming braid

1113122.content:
Next thing you and Clara knew was that you were flying through the air separated from each other. The hair of your little sister had flung you right off and into the unknown. After several seconds of flailing and falling, you finally landed on a soft surface... Addys shoulder. You looked around at the lime green landscape of your sisters Aeropostale shirt.. most likely a hand-me-down from Clara when she was addys age.

https://poshmark.com/listing/Lime-green-...

Speaking of which, were was Clara? You looked around the landscape you stood on, Clara nowhere in sight. You look up to the towering monument of your little sisters‘ head, completely unaware of your existence. Suddenly you heard it.. a faint scream. Clara. Squinting, you see movement on Addy’s bare neck right by her shirt collar. It must be Clara. You began running alongside the seam of the shirts shoulder, hopping over the folds and rolling hills of the shirt.

You had to get to Clara before she gave herself a heart attack.
———
Clara was not having a good time. From the sight of her baby sister towering over her to desperately holding onto dark, thick, rope like hair she had braided many times before to now laying sprawled out on her sisters vast neck, frozen and grasping a small neck hair. She began screaming Addys name and clinging to a hope that she’d hear her before feeling her. But of course, there was not a response from Addy who was now making her way to the couch. Out of nowhere came a tingle.. Clara had felt it before..
———
You felt it too. That tingle was the same tingle you felt when you and Clara first.. shrank.
It happened in a flash. Your half inch body quickly diminished to 1/100th of an inch and you now found yourself within the fibers of the small canyon-like shoulder seam of Addys lime green shirt. “Oh NO! ADDY! CLARA! SOMEONE!” you squeak out, your voice barely making it off the shoulder. You kept running towards the neck.. a landscape in the horizon angling up like a mountain slope.
———
Clara didn’t register what happened quick enough before Addy began to plop down onto the living room couch, sending her tiny speck of a sister into her shirt and down her sleeve, toward her hand miles below. The fall was a dark and scary one for Clara as she screamed thoroughly, bouncing off the inside of the sleeve of the lime green prison that allowed little light to peak through the threads, and through Addys subtle arm hairs. She finally came to a rolling stop at the cuff of Addys long sleeve and on top of her wrist where Clara easily blended in with the tiny moles that lay about. She was now tremendously tinier than before and much farther away from being able to reach Addy’s attention as she stood on Addy’s hand that rested in her lap as she watched TV.

Clara wanted to sit, give up and cry.. but what good would that do? She looked over to see Addy’s thumb was just above the zipper of her jeans. Clare could climb up them, leap from the button onto her shirt, and trek upwards.. maybe and hopefully finding her brother along the way! It was settled, Clara ran to the thumbnail of her little sister and with a single leap, landed on the closed jaws of Addys zipper - each metal latch the size of a small kitchen. Just ahead she saw the her first landmark.. the zipper tab, the size of a semi truck.
———
You had been close enough to had seen Clara fall down Addys shirt. You figured she had made it out the bottom somewhere and you were desperately hoping Clara wasn’t hurt. You had to go save her. You needed Clara to get the both of you out of this mess.
Out of the canyon seam, you run towards your sisters front side, navigating the woven threads of the shirt that have become more prominent in your latest shrinking. The ground slowly declined until you were finally looking down Addys front to see her small chest, hands resting in her lap, and legs hanging over the side of the couch as she watched something on TV, not giving any thought or having any clue of the specks struggling on her body.

You begin climbing down.. completely opposite of your original plan but you had to find Clara. Using the threats of the Aeropostale shirt you finally made it to the giant protruding letter “A“ in Aeropostale on the front of Addys shirt. You couldn’t believe it, it was bigger than the Hollywood sign’s letters. You decided to rest inside the A for a few moments.
——-
Clara had just made it over the zipper of Addys jeans and now stood on the giant metal button. She was beyond grateful that Addy had chosen to tuck in her shirt today, it made the transition from jeans to shirt much easier. With another leap, Clara began climbing up the shirt and towards Addys chest.

Suddenly loud booms began to fill the room..Clara turned her head just in time to see Addys friends, Jayden and Ellie barging into the room and one of them was about to give Addy a hug!

Who was it?
1113122.title: Expedition Addy

choices: You and Clara continue on Addy
11131221.content:
“Oh no no NO!” You scream as you watch the continent sized preteen Jayden rushing towards your position within the giant white, printed A on Addy’s shirt. Addy had jumped up from the couch to greet her friends leaving you scrambling for a loose string from the stitchings of Addy’s shirt to grasp so you didn’t fall.

Clara Screamed as she realized the landscape of Addys jean button tilted. She quickly grabbed hold of the edge of it leaving her hanging as Addy suddenly gotten up. Behind her, Jayden opened her arms and embraced Addy.

Before you knew it, the mountain of a girl was smashed up against your perch and slamming you into the wall behind you. It was impossible to move, but you were uninjured. Luckily.

Clara screamed to try to get one of the trios attention. She was lucky that Jaydens embrace didn’t effect her in the slightest other than the causing of Addys sudden arising. She looked over to Ellie, the young blonde who was near and sitting on the couch. She was eye level with the jeans button that Clara held onto desperately but was not even sort of paying attention . “Ellie! Ellie I’m here! Look over here!” Clara screamed, but like every attempt so far, it went unnoticed.

Miles above, you felt the pressure easing as the girls released their embrace..
11131221.title: Jayden

choices: Into the girl’s bowl of chips below
111312212.content:
You could breathe again. As the landscape of Jayden moved away, you were able to grab the loose threads of the A once again and catch your breath after almost being sandwiched by two pre-teens, unaware of you and Clara’s plight.

After releasing from their hug, your mom walks into the living room. “Girls, I’m running to the store quick. If you see Clara or Davey, let them know because I haven’t seen them yet.”

“Ok mom” said Addy said.” Can we have a snack?”

“Sure, just grab what you want from the pantry.” Your mom says as she closed the front door behind her.

“I can go grab some chips!” Said Jayden as she skipped out of the room and towards the kitchen, leaving Ellie and Addy in the living room.

Their booming conversation was muffled noise to Clara who had pulled herself over Addy’s metal jean button and now hiding behind it. It was massive, almost the size of your average public pool. Looking up, she saw Addy’s shirt, her multiple shirt buttons (maybe she could use those to navigate her way up..), the giant letters on both sides of her chest that read “AERO” and then Addy’s neck that met her jawline that moved as she conversed with Ellie, her nostrils that periodically flared and her eyelashes behind her cheek bones. Clara planned her route. “If Davey is smart, he will wait for me on Addy’s shoulder...” Clara said aloud.

With a grasp on the yellow threading of the jeans, Clara ascended. Now on the waistline of Addy’s pants, she gained balance and looked out and craned her neck to see the titanic Ellie chatting mindlessly and waving her hands about some drama at school. Addy moved her hands to her hips which shook the foundation Clara was on. Clara immediately grabbed the tucked in shirt and began climbing the fibers like a giant rope climbing wall. At this size, Clara could see every little bit of dirt and hair wedged into the shirt fibers from over the last day... maybe longer depending on how often Addy washed the shirt.

It felt like forever but in a matter of 5 minutes, Clara was at the base of the shirt buttons that ran down the front of Addy’s chest. Hands trembling from fatigue but adrenaline maintaining a balance, Clara reached up and grasped the first button. It was a lot easier to grab and hold onto compared to the rope like shirt fibers that were starting to callas Claras hands and fingers. With a hand on the string that threaded through the button holes and held the button to the shirt, Clara climbed and hoisted herself up. “Great. One down.. t..twenty more to go!?” She said aggravated. This would have been much easier if she and Davey had stayed at a centimeter tall back on Addy’s braid. But now, at 1/64th of an inch with these shirt buttons the size of hot tubs, it required more strategy. Clara moved onto the next one.

You finally felt rested enough to continue your journey. You look over the edge of the A and see Addy’s chest, and then legs stretching all the way down to her socks planted on the floor below. You hadn’t really thought this through, how do you possibly climb down? What if Clara didn’t even make it? What if.. what if she fell to the floor and got crushed? You smacked yourself with your free hand. The thought made you sick, and there was no time for negativity in this situation. She’s down there somewhere, and you needed to find her. Turning your head, something caught your eye that gave you a stupid, yet brilliant idea. Addy’s shirt buttons.. you can use them to climb down. “If Clara was smart, she would have stayed put down there and waited for me.” You said aloud. Not that anyone would hear you at the moment.

Before too long, Ellie came back in the room smiling and with a bag of nacho cheese chips and a big bowl. “Bon Appetite!” She said cheerily.

You were on the third button down from Addy’s collar when you heard a faint voice call out, “d..Davey!?” You looked down to see none other than Clara, five buttons below you. You were beyond relieved. “Clara! I’m coming!” You yelled, clinging to a button. The two of you met in the center of your little sisters shirt. Once on top of the same button, you two embraced.

“When we shrank smaller, I fell down her shirt, then I had to climb her pants and then back up.. I’ve tried screaming for all three of them, they can’t hear us.. Davey, we’re nothing but specks of dust!” said Clara.

“Clara calm down, we -“ Davey began

“Calm down??” Clara retaliated. “We are microscopic dots on our unaware little sister!” Her eyes were blackened with running mascara.

You put your arm around her. You had to be a man here. If you were hysteric like your instincts called you to be, survival would be impossible.

Ellie and Jayden were already several chips in. Addy began eyeing her shirt. “Do you guys think this shirt is getting too small? It’s a little tight..“ she asked.

“Hmm maybe a little bit.” Ellie responded. “Why don’t you unbutton a few buttons, it may be more comfortable.”

Addy shrugged her shoulders and did just that.

Through the booming voices, you and Clara both clearly heard all of that. Suddenly and giant hands of Addy came into view as they closed in on the very top button of her shirt. And worked it until it flung open to show a white tank top underneath.. the hands then came to the next button, and then the next.

“Addy, no” you whimpered. “Clara climb down, hurry!”

“ADDY! ADDY STOP!” The both of you screamed as you frantically climbed down the middle of the shirt. It was no use, you both simply were not able to cover enough ground in time. The massive fingers of your younger sister closed around you both and undid the button you were both clinging to, the whipping force of the button coming unlatched flung you and Clara from Addy’s body.

You were both once again in a free fall. But where do you land?
111312212.title: You and Clara continue on Addy

choices: yes, you anc Clara are too scared to get her attention. Go Hide
no, you two go to get your mom's attention
11132.content:
You and Clara were shocked, but then you heard giant fcootsteps, and they were coming towards them. The ground shook like an earthquake, knokcing you off your feet. Clara was starting to panic and you tried to calm her down, buit as the monsterous footsteps continued to move towards you, you couldn't help but start to panic as well.

You two then saw what had been mimicking the earthquake, it was your own mother, except she was now a gainetss that looked to be at least 1000 feet tall from your view point. She took a few steps, with her gigantic, colossal sandaled feet smacking the floor .
" Holy crap , our mom is huge!" you said.
" What do you think we should do!" Clara asked.

You told her that it would be best to get her attention, but then her sandal covered foot came crashing down just a few paces away from you and you two split running faster than you can saw anything. You dove behind a pair of discarded boots while Clara hid behind the leg of the coffee table.

Your mom walked over to the couch and sat back and relaxed as she turned on the television to a soap opera. She took off her sandals and kicked her bare feet up onto the coffee table.

Clara was just a few feet away from your mom, still behind the coffee table. Clara was daring enough to begin moving closer to your mom, you thought, 'what is she doing?' even thought it was quite obvious that she was trying to get your mother's attention.

You ran from behind boots and slid to behind the sandals. Your mom was paying no attention to the two tiny kids running around the floor, she wasn't even paying attention to the tv, she was readin some magazine. Right now, you could tell that she would be sitting there for awhile so you guys could get her attention, but are you too scared to?
11132.title: Gigantic Woman

111322.content:
You and Clara jumped up and down trying to get your mother's attention but it was fruitless. You were too small and she was too big to make contact. You both saw your mother walk over to the couch you were very close to and decided you should try and climb her and make it to her ear where she could hear you hopefully. Claire thought this plan was nuts but too was your situation and finally relented into giving it a try. You and Claire began your climb at your mothers giant foot and the first thing you noticed was the smell of stale sweat.

You took off your shirt and covered your nosgle like conditionse trying to block out the scent because you knew you needed to get this done. With some effort you were able to jump up and grab a foothold onto one of your mother's indents on her toe. You reached out your hand to help your sister and you were finally off. Luckily for you your mother was sitting still and seemed to be watching a movie of some length. You estimated it would probably take a few hours to reach your destination but you weren't sure. You and Clair climbed the skin reaching for indents and pores along the way.The detail in your mother's skin was amazing at this size but you couldn't pay attention to that you needed to get to her ear.

After 2 hard hrs. you and Claire had finally reached her calf muscle which to you bulged out with veins and hair you would never had noticed at normal height. You decided it was best to use the tiny hairs on her legs as climbing aids. Claire was almost out of breath but you guys couldn't afford to take any breaks.

You continued your long climb trying to help your sister anyway possible. The heat was intense and your arms were quaking with fatigue,but you needed to keep trudging along if you had any hopes of making it to her ear before the end of the day.

After another couple hours you and Claire reached the pantyline of your mother and had a decision to make. You really didn't want to have to travel across your mother's privates or butt to reach you destination but you knew you had to. You had to put aside the thoughts of the grossness of it and man up. You and Claire kept climbing under her pantyline and had a crossroads to decide on. You could go through her vagina which was not really trimmed and have to fight through the bush and jungle like conditions or you could go the far stinkier but less thick portion of her ass. You looked at Claire and you both decided it would have to be her.....
111322.title: no, you two go to get your mom's attention

11133.content: At your newfound height,you and Clara begin to recenter yourselves,to regain your composure and find a way out of this mess,when you notice something a bit off.Clara usually sat at 5'7,and always came shy of your 5'10 frame,yet,at your newfound height,Clara wasn't only just taller than you,you only came up to her
11133.title: Clara began to grow,but by how much?

Clara is comepletely in control,there really is nothing you can do.(Readers Choi

You, Davey, were sitting on the table at the front of your school, you were just talking to your buddies and school didnm't start for another 15 minutes. Everything was normal, until one of your friend's spot a strange, shiny rock on the grass. He went to go pick it up and brought it back to the group, you noticed that it was almost a perfect rock, it just gave you, Davey a bvad feeling.
Suddenly, the school bell rang and your friend's lef to go to class, you were leaving to, but you put the strange rock in your pocket before you went to class. You went to your locker and grabbed your books before heading off to your first class of the day, which was _________.
You went to class, but as your walking towards _____, you feel weird, like if you were dizzy mixed with being sleepy. A you got to class, you shrunk exacly one inch, but you didn't notice, but you would eventually during that class, which was....

Davey arrived at his gym class. He quickly changed into his gym clothes and continued on with his daily routine. Everything was fine, until he began to run the laps. He felt odd once agin. He was about to pass up these three girls, but as Davey was running he began to shrink. He shrunk to ___ in height.
How tall was he?
1121.title: Gym shrinkage

choices: You feel very dizzy and begin to shrink
11211.content:
As you passed up the group of three, admittedly good looking girls, something seemed odd. A few of them seemed a bit taller than usual, not by much, but still taller. Chalking this up to fatigue, you pace yourself a bit, moving into a slower jog. The three girls pass by and gym continues as normal for the most part.

Finally after you've finished the mile, you're able to head back to the locker rooms. You weren't the most athletic but you still managed to finish before most of the class, even despite your slowing pace.

As you walk towards the locker room...
11211.title: Finishing Small

112111.content:
"Ugh...my head..." You groan as you make your way towards the locker room entrances.

A pink stick figure in a dress leads to the girl's rooms and a blue stick figure leads to the guy's side. As you walk towards the two entrances, your vision flickers in and out, blindly you push open the door and stumble through. You blindly wander till you hit a locker door. As your eyesight returns, you see an unfamiliar pink-hued locker in front of you.

"I'm in the girl's locker room!" You mentally scream.

Hurriedly you turn to leave, hopefully before a half naked girl mistakes you for a pervert. Unfortunately as you turn towards the door, the distance is no longer a matter of feet, but a matter of miles! Looking around you find that everything is a hundred times larger than it should be, you've shrunk to almost six inches tall.

Your panic grows even greater as the sound of dozens of feminine voices grows greater in volume outside the door. You quickly glance around for a place to hide before running toward.

Anna. Anna is your 18 year old twin. Often called “Amazon Anna” she towers over everyone at an intimidating 5’10”. Her butt is MASSIVE, thicker than your body. She also sports a pair of DD cups. 112111122211.content:
You let a out a deep breath, confident that you went unnoticed. You feel a strange headache, and the locker suddenly feels bigger. Oh no, you shrink again! You lost another 4 or 5”, putting you at around 4’7”.
Lulu would absolutely destroy you if she found out where you were. You hear her heavy footsteps approach. She is directly in front of you and you see her massive rack as she changes her shirt. Then she reaches for the handle on your locker. You hold your breath. She waits a moment, and then yanks it open. You tumble out and land on your stomach at her feet. “What the...” she cries
You try to get up and scramble away but she firmly grabs your collar. “What’s a little perv like you doing in here? Hey, don’t I know you? Nah.” You realize that she doesn’t recognize you as her friend. “Lu I’m sorry it just-“ you are silenced as she puts a finger to your lips. She lets you go and you look up at her face. You're scared none the less, because you're well aware that feet, no matter how clean, carry close to 3 trillion bacteria, so the likelihood is that you'll get unbelievably sick from the contact. You put on a brave face and stick out your tongue.

How does it taste?

11431212122212.content:
" Im not going to do it! Im a human and you shouldnt be treating me like this. Now go get your sister!" you yelled, trying to act intimidating, which was hard to do when your under 3 feet in height.

" I dont think that was such a smart idea Davey." Seirra said as she raised her foot.
she pushed you to the floor with her massive foot and then pinned you to the floor. You tried to get up but Seirra would just apply more force.

Seirra smiled as she pressed her toes and toenails into your chest, somewhat mocking the fact she held you down so easily. "You should've just kissed my toes and gotten it over with, but now, your gonna have to..."
11431212122212.title: Refused to

114312122.content:
Having pointed out the disappointing amount you shrank, at least compared to the shrinking that takes place in movies and comics, you were taken by surprise as Sarah's rather large hand covered your mouth, preventing you from saying anything else. Now you and Sarah regularly play around like that anyways, and you see her physical interactions with you to be flirty, but after shrinking that small amount, this act suddenly became very intimidating.

"Yeah, I know it only shrank you a few inches, but that why I will just have to shoot you again." Sarah smiled playfully as she pulled the trigger twice more. The shots hit your chest and you could do nothing as you shrank smaller and smaller. The repeated shots must have caused a greater change to occur as you dwindld down to 5 foot even. Sarah removed her hand as she covered her own face to hide her laughter.

"You are just so cute now! You're barely any taller than my little sister." Sarah giggled as you now stood speechless in front of your, at least in your perspective, amazonian friend. "What? You don't have anything sarcastic to say? Cat got your tongue?" Sarah teased.

"Thus is incredible, but I don't really feel comfortable st this size, what if someone else see's me, or..." You began to express your concerns before Sarah interrupted, "Davey, maybe your just scared that I could do anything I want to you now, and you could do nothing about it?" Sarah grinned suspiciously as she placed both, very large hands on your shoulders, pressing down a little to emphasize the new strength difference between you two.

What happens next?
114312122.title: Sarah shoots you again

1143121221.content:
Sarah shoots you again without you realising and all of a sudden your looking up at Sarah.

What have you done Sarah? Well Davey I have decided to shrink you down to the size of a new born baby.

Why? Because I wanted to and I thought it would be good to test what it would be like to be a mum.

She then picks you I up and automatically puts you in her hip and walked over to a bag and then laid you on the floor and puts a pink diaper on you and a onesie/romper suit.

You know you can't do anything about it so you ask Sarah, how long will you keep me like this Sarah?
1143121221.title: Sarah does someting else

11433.content: May is a 15-year old girl of Korean descent who you met a few years ago and have been a good friend of for several years. She is quite well know. For being mischievous and plays a lot of pranks on her friends and her family. She has short jet black hair and typically wears jeans, a graphic tee, and flats. She has an 18 year old sister named Kim, who works at a local bakery, and a 10 year old sister named Jade, who plays softball. Her mother is a business woman who is currently on a long trip and has left Kim in charge.
11433.title: Another Friend

choices: The TV is in a different location
114331.content:
You stood before May's house, a two-story suburban home down the street from your's. You had just rang the doorbell and were currently waiting for your friend to answer. Earlier that day she had called saying her house would be empty while her mom was away in business and her sisters were over at friend's houses. She had also asked you to come over and you couldn't resist. Although knowing May, she probably had some kind of prank set up for you.

"It's open!" May yells cheerfully from inside.

You open the door and find that your intuition was correct. A cup of water, ringed to the door by a series of strings fell on your head, dowsing your shirt. Across from you May broke into a fit of giggles.

"Hey, come on that's the third time...." You say exasperated, May woff to the kitchen, her black flats clicking on the tail.

After drying you sit down, something feels a bit off though....

What is strange?
114331.title: A Prank on Entry

choices: Half your original height, roughly 3 feet
1143311.content:
You sit down on the couch and lean back, finally realizing what's wrong. Usually your head rested on top of the couch's back cushion. Today for some reason your head was level with it. A sudden feeling of nausea hits you before you can figure out what's happening. Lying down you close your eyes until the feeling passes. When you open your eyes, you're much smaller than before.

How small have you become?
1143311.title: That Shrinking Feeling

choices: May, back with snacks, about to plop down on the couch
Jade, home early, staring right at you
11433112.content:
As you sit up you realize you're about the size of a doll and stranded on your friends couch. The TV remote in the distance seems slightly taller than you, putting you at around 4 inches. You look around for anyway to get down when suddenly you hear thunderous footsteps, shaking the very earth.

You look up and see...
11433112.title: Only 4 inches

114331121.content:
Looking up, you are treated to the image of an Asian titaness, carrying a bag of potato chips in one hand and a few soda cans in the other, standing before you. In utter awe of her sheer scale and how amplified her normally minor features, such as her breasts, are, it doesn't dawn on you that the girl is turning around to take a seat. Not until, like an oncoming denim meteor, you see her shapely ass, curves amplified by tight jeans, descending towards your very position do you realize te gravity of the situation.

With a soft plop, May comes to rest on the couch, excited to enjoy another day of TV and video games with a friend. Though looking around, May sees no sign of Davey anywhere. Thinking he must've run to the bathroom, May pops open the bag of chips, cracks open a cola, and relaxes as she starts up the TV. At least she tries to relax, squirming back and forth, grinding her rear against the couch cushion, trying to eradicate the lump beneath her.

Meanwhile, you were being out through unbearable torment. May was normally a rather petite girl, but at 4 inches to her 5'4", her weight was bone crushing. In fact you were vaguely sure you might've at the very least gotten a rib or two bruise when she dropped down on you. Still even then the torment wasn't over, evidentially May had felt your form, unfortunately rather than getting up and checking the object about the size of her ass check, she began twisting her ass around, painfully dragging the denim hugging her curves across your body, leaving painful scraps and bruises. In resoonse you begin to struggle and squirm about, trying to give May a swift pucnh in her gigantic posterior.

This struggling apparently works as you feel the weight of May lift off you. As a bit of light filters in, a hand quickly darts in after it. Tanned fingers wrap around on of your legs and you are dragged across the leather seat, and into the outside world in a flash.

"Davey?" Calls May's voice as you meet her gentle almond colored eyes, each studying you quizzically.

"May! I shrunk! Help!" Is all you can think to yell to the giantess as she holds you upside down, forcing you to crane your neck to see her clearly.

You get a bad feeling in your stomach as May's confused expression changed to a smile you've learned to associate with her planning a prank. You faintly wonder if she was the one who shrunk you, maybe as a joke. Though if that was the case, she probanly would've known you were on the couch before she sat down. Eitherway you quickly find that you'll be stuck at this height a while longer as May speaks.

"Don't worry, Davey," May began, her tone dripping with mischievous intent, "I'll help you.......after I pull a quick prank on one of my sisters."

You could see the gears turning in May's head as she lifted you up and began walking through the house towards a distant room. As she walked she held you close to her face and whispered.

"Of course, since I'm a nice person, I'll make you a deal. If you can escape before the prank begins, I'll help you. Otherwise, you'll have to wait till the prank is over for any help."

Almost as soon as she finished explaining the "rules" to you, May had reached her destination.

Where is she and which prank is May planning?

1. She is in the bathroom where her big sister, Kim, is showering before work. May plans to use dental floss to tie you to Kim's thong. You will have to escape before Kim finishes he shower.

2. She is in her little sister, Jade's room. May plans on burying you in Jade's hamper beneath her dirty clothes. You will have to escape before its time to do laundry.
114331121.title: The Prankster

1143311212.content:
May grabs you in her hand and sneaks off to Jade's room. She lifts up a sock from the top of Jade's laundry pile and drops you into it.

Do you escape the fuzzy confines before Jade comes, or are you trapped within the dark, putrid cell of the little girl's sock?
1143311212.title: Dirty Laundry

choices: Dropping you in a bag with her softball gear
114331122.content:
As you look towards the sound of footsteps, you see a pair of small tennis shoes tromping across the floor. You raise your eyes up a pair of muscled tan legs to a pair of short shorts. Past that to a dirt-smeared t-shirt. Further up you see the chubby young face of Jade, your friend's tomboyish younger sister, her amber eyes were locked right on to your tiny body.

At first you think she's looking at something else, hope probably being a better word, you'd seem what she did to bugs. However your worst fears are confirmed when she continues walking towards the couch and, with a swing of her hand, picks you up.

You're held in front of her face in her sweaty palm, foul Dorito-filled breath washing over you. She's just about to say something when she hears her sister out in the Kitchen. You feel sick as Jade's hand begins to move.

What is she doing?
114331122.title: Jade, home early, staring right at you

1143311222.content:
You squirm in the clammy palm of the 10-year-old tomboy, her hand stuffing you in a place you find worse than hell - her bag of softball gear. The zipper blacks out the light, bu through the little holes your see the wasteland of dirty cleats and socks, fetid panties and bras - the smell burns your eyes.
You slip on a patch of dry sweat and land -
1143311222.title: Dropping you in a bag with her softball gear

11433112221.content:
(Originally by Steamgear)

Slipping in the old sweat, you found yourself rolling down through the smelly fabrics, past an unwashed uniform and towards the very bottom of the bag. You roll along a foul-smelling cotton surface, cotton fibers reaching out to grab you as you go. You stop suddenly, unable to move, to your absolute horror, you realize that the sock fibers are wrapped around your arms and legs, essentially binding you to the sock. Worse still, the sock is inside out. Looking down it, you find in the dim light that while once white, the inside of the sock has slowly faded to grey and a few holes have developed. The unbearable stench of sweat and dirt from the preteen owner also tells you it hasn't been washed, maybe even for weeks.

"Jade, you just got back, where are you off too?" You hear May call after her sister, her voice muffled through.

"Oh? I'm just off to ________" Jade replied, with a malicious grin.
11433112221.title: in a crumpled, dirty sock.

choices: Jade suits up in her full softball gear to "practice."
Jade dumps you out of the bag and does something else.
114331122211.content:
As you struggle against the dirt-streaked fibers in the hot swampy bag, you hear Jade's reply. "Just off to an extra softball practice!" You double your struggles at the thought of enduring Jade's feet through an entire softball practice, but then you realize she's probably just lying.

"What? They have those now?" May says, wondering out loud. "Okay, well, don't be too late. You can bike back, right?"

"Yep!" Jade says, doing her best to suppress an evil grin. She dashes out the door, dirty uniform and cleats rolling about in the dark, stinky hell pit as she ducks outside, peeling back the zipper with a devious grin. She grins down at you excitedly, and wordlessly reaches in with her grubby fingers to flip the sock right-side in, sealing you in the confines of her unwashed softball sock. With a light of forbidden mischief in her young eyes, she looks all around her before bunching the sock up against her uniform, old, clammy sweat clogging your air inside the preteen's dirty gear. It looked as if she didn't want to talk to you yet, or see the need.. perhaps you were just a bug to her, after all.

Jade zips up your prison again, letting you marinate in the stew of her softball reek, and hops on her bike to head to a park not far from the house. She planned to have plenty of fun with you there.
114331122211.title: An extra softball practice.

choices: Jade turning the sock inside out and putting it on
A fall into the mud on the sole of Jade's cleats
1143311222111.content:
Glancing around at the park, the playground, the trees, the softball field, Jade let out a happy sigh. Turning her gaze towards the park bathrooms, she entered the girl's room, locking the door behind her, just to make sure she wasn't disturbed. The park had gone to great lengths to make sure its bathrooms were always clean and gleaming. Bright florescent lights shined down on the spotless tiled floors and walls. Jade made sure to quick check each stall, making sure she was alone before she dropped her bag to the floor. The force jostled you around, moving her sock up against the underarm of Jade's uniform, trapping you between the two overpowering odors.

"Well darn....my team didn't show up," Jade said, her smile audible as she continued to pretend she just had another practice, "Guess I'll be practicing all by myself, all alone, just me and a bug or two," She added, looking down at her bag with deviant mischief in her eyes.

You struggled in the bag, trying to remove yourself from the stinking, hot prison. The cotton fibers of Jade's dirty sock served well to keep you trapped though. Your struggles were interrupted by the grind of a zipper as Jade opens her bag, an evil grin greeting you as the face of the giant-sized Asian preteen is revealed. Ignoring you for now, Jade reaches in, grabbing a seat of white underwear that was visibly stained in sweat. Stepping away, you heard the rustle of fabric as the gril began to change back into her unwashed clothes. A few seconds later a hand reached in, grabbing her pants, soon followed by another grabbing her uniform, allowing her sock to roll down the pile.

The force of the sock rolling deeper helped dislodge you. You found yourself dangling from a single thread that had looped around your left foot. Below, you smelled the stench of dirt, mud, and grass. Glancing down, you saw Jade's cleats, upended to show you the underside. The soles were caked with soft earth that filled in the area between its imposing rubber spikes, each as big as a house. You had second thoughts about trying to escape, but they quickly vanished as the long sock began to rise up, its owner ready to finish getting dressed.

As the sock rose into the air, you began to struggle. You're struggles were rewarded by....
1143311222111.title: "Extra" Softball Practice

11433112221111.content:
You can hear a mischievous giggle as Jade wraps up her very thinly veiled sentence, having finished tugging on her old softball uniform save the dingy footwear rolling about the bottom of the dank bag. You dangle from a dingy sock fiber above an expanse of cleat as Jade tugs the sock free of the humid bag, only to flip the huge cotton expanse inside on itself. Your world shakes, dirty cotton and poked holes rushing each way and rasping against you and itself as, finally, the tumult comes to a rest, with your cotton expanse becoming a softball prison.

You feel a uncomfortable dampness all around. Since Jade's worn-out socks had only been off her hot feet for a matter of hours, and only then in a bag of equally sweaty, hot gear, they hardly had time to even dry off in the humid environment. So you were treated to a luke-warm dampness that permeated the fabrics and even now had begun to fill the air with a slight cloying stink, the holes in the sock doing little to disperse it. Below the dangling expanse, you see Jade's light-brown feet resting on the bathroom floor, a gaping maw of a dingy softball bag complete with dirty cleats and a discarded sock resting on them - but that isn't nearly as terrifying as what you see above you.

At the end of the sweat-streaked, greying tunnel of this ten-year-old titaness' sock, was her grinning face. That wasn't the terrifying part, however. That came when the Korean tomboy's face was slowly but surely replaced by a looming sole, blocking out the light form the florescent above. Still clammy from her bike ride, the light brown toes wriggle exictedly as they slide down the impossibly long tunnel ,rasping sock fuzz between the slightly dirty toes.

You look frantically for any escape, only seeing the grey toeprints of a little girl's softball efforts made manifest. The fabric stretches and creaks as Jade's eager foot looms, and you quickly run out of both distance and fresh air as the clammy surface gloms onto your tiny body. the skin is warm, the slight layer of sweat cool as it touches your arms and pushes you against the damp fabric at your back, pinning you to the ball of the athlete's foot as she tugs, hard. But don't worry. The footsweat wouldn't be cold and clammy for long, no... soon it would be very, very warm.

"ooh... This is gonna be a really good practice, I can just tell!" says jade, suppressing a giggle as she tugs on another sock, lowering you towards your new home below. You can't see the dirty cleat opening to receive your captor's "small" foot, but you can feel the heat and musk that rests inside it. The light that illuminates your captor's dirty sole vanishes, replaced by a cheesy stench of softball feet and the sound of tying laces. Pressure skyrocekts, pinning you against the soft, dirty wrinkles above, hard, sweaty insole below.

Jade giggles, schrunching her toes in glee, drunk with power in that way only a child can be as she grinds her new bug into her sole.
11433112221111.title: Jade turning the sock inside out and putting it on

choices: Finds you stuck to her toes
Fails to spot your tiny form
114331122211112.content:
Jade's foot slams into the dirt, hard. A thousand steps per lap, five laps to a mile. She runs quickly, with large, long strides, savoring every step. Her passenger was tiny, hardly noticable in the depths of her shoe. But this wasn't the first time she'd dropped a bug in her shoe; she knew how to recognize the squirms and twitches as the creature struggled for air. Still, this one was leaving a different impression. It was smaller, softer, weaker than she was used to, blending into the feel of the frayed sock and dirty sole. With concentration, Jade can sense the little tickle on her sole as she moves along the track.

She wonders how long it'll survive.


"Ahhhh!" you screamed, interrupted as another step pushed you into the girl's skin. The pressure was bad. The heat was terrible. The smell was horrific. The sweat was unbearable. Each factor alone was enough to ruin your day. Together, they threatened to end your life.

You left her foot drag against the ground as she made a hard turn, forcing the rancid air from your lungs. As her leg lifts again you gasp out into the darkness, sucking in the humid environment as best as you can. You were no longer glued to her sock, having been torn free within the first few steps. Instead you bounced around in the millimeter of damp space between the ruined fabric and her damp skin, desprately searching for one of the torn holes from which you could escape. So far you've had no luck, as each of her steps takes just seconds before grinding back down onto you. Her skin is soft with youth and rough with use and you're given the whole tour, from her plush wrinkles that squeeze and pull at your limbs to her titanium-like heel that pounds you like a hammer on a nail.

As her run drags on, you begin to notice her energy running low. Her steps become shorter and hit softer, and she begins to favor the front of her foot. You find your bounces acting less randomly and notice yourself slipping forward. Slowly, but surely, you were headed towards the meat grinder of her toes. Helpless, you tried to scream again as you left the ball of her foot and plunged towards your demise. You tumble forward as her step soars onward, just in time for her big toe to smash into you.

The toes are a runner's greatest tool, you know. Her big toe is a spring board, flexing down and pressing hard to propel the whole body forward. You left it crash down, hard, and as it sprung it flung you right towards its family. The other four toes keep the runner balanced, acting together to stabize the step and keep her moving. This means that a runner's toes are never still, even relative to the rest of the foot. They're shifting, grinding, spreading apart and coming together as they try and maintain the miricle of a biped's posture. If something small, like you, were to fall between them, it'd be subjected to a constant hell of motion. Indeed, you were pushed around against your will, twisted and contorted by the micro motions Jade subconciously made with every step. Finally, after the beating of your lifetime, you found peace as you were stuck on the only still place in the front of the shoe: Between her toes.


Sweat was pouring down Jade's face. The day's hotter than the news had promised, and this run was quite the commitment after the earlier practice. Her mind wanders away, thinking about school work and cute boys and tonight's dinner. Jade passes her eighth lap, and remembers the bug in her shoe. She slows her run and focuses down in her shoe, trying to feel a struggle.

Nothing. Jade, now worried that the bug has already expired, turns around and heads back to the locker room. Once there, she quickly slips off her cleat and sock. She runs her eyes along her foot, glancing over the pale brown skin. She notices lots of dirt and sock material stuck to the glisening appendage, but no bug. Moving to a bench, she sits and looks again. Her toes strech in worry. Could she really have already lost it?

Finally, after minutes of searching, she:
114331122211112.title: Sole Training

choices: holds up a sweat-stained black sock.
Slips her bare foot into the tennis shoe with you stuck fast.
1143311222111121.content:
Jade peers over the glistening sole of her dirty foot, nose crinkled at the odor rising off her young feet.

You however, had it worse. The pounding, searing heat coupled with the waterfalls of tomboy sweat were worse than any hell you could have pictured. you could hardly move an inch, compacted like dirt or toejam between Jade's hyperactive toes, incapable of the struggles she longed to feel. Luckily, your dark and swampy work is ripped open to the air, ,and you gasp it down greedily, anything but the stale sweat and reek that was building in that horrid cleat. The sock fibers gave way to the titanic face of your young captor.

She peered over the filthy landscape of her foot after setting it on the dusty floor, then her eyes lit up like christmas lights. Oh no.

"No way.." jade says incredulously, followed by a giggle. Her face lights up with sadistic glee, finally having found a bug tough enough to torture for as long as she wanted. You still were unsure if she knew what you were and was just pretending, or if she really thought you were just a bug. Another deep giggle, and the toes spasm around you, glistening with sweat as Jade grins down at her new toy.

"Practice is over... time to change ~" She says, seemingly aware of your presence. You see glimpses and flashes of clothing as Jade strips down to her undergarments, noticeably sweaty and marred with dirt and dust. She digs out her clothes from earlier, having put them in the same dirty, sweaty bag as her old gear. The dirty t-shirt, denim shorts, and a pair of worn out tennis shoes leave the bag, replaced by her unwashed, even dirtier softbll gear.

Zzziiip~!

Jade tugs the jeans past you, your light going out and returning , the shirt slipping on, the sneakers set below.
"time for a little change of scene!" jade says, and
1143311222111121.title: Finds you stuck to her toes

choices: Thankful for what you've done, Jade let's you free into the house
Lustful for more, Jade tries to keep you for tomorrow's fun
11433112221111212.content:
Jade smiled into the wind as she biked home. She'd done the whole bug-in-shoe torture routine a thousand times before, and it never got old. It helped that she kept finding new types of bugs to play with.

She focused on the squirming under her feet as she pedaled, embracing the waves of pleasure that rode up her body. It was a trooper, that little bug. When she first saw it on the couch, all pink and small and soft, she figured it be one of those squishers that popped after just a few steps. Jade liked squishers, otherwise she wouldn't have bothered heading back out to the park with the little insect, but her favorites were the survivors, the ones that took her beatings and kept on fighting.

This one was a good bug.



You'd vomited up the salty contents of your stomach at least three times since the biking started. Each pump of the ten year old's legs spun you around, her burning sweat letting you roll despite the continental pressure. How a girl this young had callouses was beyond you, but by the end of the ride you'd been pounded down by her hammer-like heel to the point of delirium. Her transition to walking was almost a blessing. As the all too familiar motion of footsteps became your world again, you felt yourself slipping back between the grinding toes that nearly killed you before.

Somewhere far away, you heard voices, a conversation, muffled by the ever present scratching of skin on shoe. Was it May? She was your friend, she'd help save you from Jade's hell!

"May! Please, I'm in your sister's shoe!" You spit the sweat from your mouth, struggling to climb the girl's toes. An inner strength you didn't know you had comes forth, and you pull yourself up onto the flat top of Jade's bare foot.

"May, I need your help!" You yell through the darkness of the shoe, eyes searching for a sign of hope. May would hear you and you'd be rescued and returned to a full size and never have to look at a foot again and...

Jade's foot lurched, and you hurdled back beneath her sole, screaming the whole way down.




"Hey Kim," Jade said as she entered the living room. Her oldest sister was lounging on the couch, rear firmly planted on the spot where she'd found the bug earlier in the day. I did that buggy a favor.

"Hey sis," Kim replied, looking up from the tv. "How was practice?"

"Good." Jade was distracted, feeling the speck crawl up her toes. "You, uh, make dinner?"

Kim nodded her head toward the kitchen. "There's some chicken left over in the fridge. May and I've already eaten."

Jade took a step towards that direction. The bug slipped off its perch, sliding down the side of her foot. She closed her eyes, savoring the feeling as the speck fought against the skin of her arch. Maybe she wasn't so hungry right now. Instead, she headed off to her room, plans stirring in her mind.

"Huh," Kim said to herself, watching the girl climb the stairs. "She seemed off." Shrugging, Kim resumed her show.
11433112221111212.title: Back to Square One

choices: Kim, the eighteen year old eldest
114331122211112121.content:
Jade was cruel, but she wasn't heartless. She derived incredible pleasure from the bugs she found, but she knew it was living hell for them. So she had a policy, one she put in place the first time she discovered a victim still squirming after a long day of walking: If you survived the torture, you were free to go.

Jade watched the bug twitch on her now shoeless foot, a tiny spot of pink stuck to the tan expanse of skin. "Alright buggy, you did good. You're free now." Carefully, she plucked it between two fingers. "Don't let me catch you again, or I might just keep you!"



You had run halfway down the hallway before you realized that you were naked. Your clothes, they must have been shredded during Jade's run. It was lucky that you weren't too.

How small had you ended up at? Jade's toes, usually so small and petite, engulfed your frame during the run. It had to be less than an inch, maybe even less than a centimeter. Otherwise, there was no way a ten year old's foot could overpower you.

Shuddering at your newest memories, you stopped moving and slumped over against the wall. What were you to do now? You were a speck, a little bug that bent to the whims of the world. Jade could have killed you, and she was the smallest and kindest of the family. If May or Kim saw you, and saw you as nothing but an insect, you would be dead before you could blink.

Still, you had to try. Lost, both in regards of what to do and of where you had ended up at, you headed down the hall, entering the nearest door. It was a bedroom, and the mess on the floor quickly revealed:
114331122211112121.title: Parole

choices: Kim returns to retrieve her flats that May had borrowed!
1143311222111121212.content:
You stumble into the doorway of the monolithic room, taking in the fibers of the carpet like a massive forest. Strewn about you at various heaps on the floor were the odds and ends of a teenage girl's room - some snack wrappers that nearly made it to the trash can, some socks and graphic tees, and a pair of flats and converse high tops in a lazy heap near a massive pink bed.

May's room. 15, petite, and mischievous. She might have a lot of fun performing pranks with a new tiny person.. or, you shudder, on one.

You make your way through the carpet, giving the high tops a wide berth after your most recent torture at her younger sister's soles. May's feet couldn't possibly be as dirty as Jade's were, you hoped. But it still wasn't an experience you longed to repeat. Those shoes were easily twice the size of Jade's sneakers, and they dwarfed your puny form. So you decide to go for the bed when -
1143311222111121212.title: May, your childhood friend

choices: Fallen, nearly broken, to the floor.
11433112221111212122.content:
Boom boom boom

You spin around, facing the giant door as it swings open. Kim's head peaks around the doorframe. "Yo, sis, can I get my... oh, not here."

She opens the door and steps into the room. You'd thought she was tall before; now, with your ant-like perspective she was a goddess, bare legs reaching towards heaven, bare feet large enough to crush you right to hell. She looks around, glancing about May's room until her eyes settled... right near you!

She smiled. "There you are!"

Was... Did she mean you? You begin to jump up and down, screaming with all you had, ignoring the aching, throbbing pain that had previously consumed your body. "Kim! I'm down here! It's me, Davey!" In an instant, she was at you, a single step slamming down right next to you. You tumble to the ground. Her presence was simply too much to bear! Dust blows into your eyes as her other foot catches up, shaking the earth as it settled down on the other side of you. You wipe the tears from your eyes, struggling to stare up, up, up towards Kim, failing to make out anything beyond the expanse of her thighs that end abruptly in distressed jean shorts.

"Kim..." The feeble call leaves your lips as Kim begins to crouch, shifting her weight onto the balls of her feet. You flinch as her crotch drops suddenly, and are unprepared for the gust of wind that follows. "KIM!" you shout, tumbling for just an inch or two. Eyes watering, you quickly pull in your surroundings; in the distance, Kim's hand, grabbing at the pair of flats that you'd noted before, and up close, to your horror, was Kim's dirty sole, hovering over your horizon. You'd been flung even deeper beneath her, and now there's no time to waste as you scramble back to your feet, flinching at the reawakened pair in your ribs, doing your best to not see the tan sky above you. You didn't know where to go, you didn't know how far to run, all you knew was that you couldn't stay here, you couldn't get stepped on, not again, not by her, please god not again. Sobs rack your body; you know it's futile, you know you can't escape, you know what's about to happen. And, just as you expected, Kim stood up, her feet flattening out on May's carpet.

She steps on you. She doesn't know, of course. She doesn't mean it, and certainly didn't try. But that doesn't change the facts. That doesn't change that you are currently nothing, nothing but a crumb, a crumb that is being ground into a fine powder under her hard, dry, filthy heel. Kim stands up, her flats dangling from her right hand while she swipes through her contacts with her left. Her weight is constant, a force per area that's distributed over the smallest of surfaces.

You want to cry. You'd kill to be able to cry, to shout, to do anything, just to prove to the world, no, to yourself, that you existed beyond this pain. Because right now, that's all you are. Every bone and muscle and organ in your body was pushed to its limit, and then some, smothered under this teen girl's weight. There were no words in your mind to describe this, no flowery language about agony and aches, it was just pain, pain at the end of every nerve, pain at the beginning and end of your consciousness. Faintly, beyond the crushing infinity of Kim's sole that tried to drive you through the ground, you could feel your lungs burn, airless, function-less. Just another pain to add to the pile, the idea of suffocation beyond your ability to comprehend. You couldn't even fight, not against this. She was a force of nature, and you couldn't even find the strength to wriggle a finger against her. Bones began to creak and crack, and parts of your body you didn't even know you had began to cry out for this to stop.



"Hey sis," Kim said a few minutes later, after relocating to the living room.

May looked up from her phone. "Hey. You see Davey around?"

"That your dweeby friend?" Kim asked, slipping her flats on by the door.

"Mmhmm, that's the one. He was here a few hours ago, but disappeared suddenly and now he's not answering his phone."

"Huh, that's no good." Kim shrugged. "He'll probably show up eventually. Anyways I'm heading out for a bit. House is yours, Jade is upstairs, food's in the fridge. See you in the morning."

May nodded, going back to her phone. "Alright, thanks sis."

Neither girl knew how close the subject of their conversation was, as you had...

choices: "Hmm.. I wonder what it looks like?"

114331122211112122.content:
The preteen titaness stifles a power-induced giggle as your struggles prove in vain, sliding you back down the light-brown, glistening skin of the young girl's newly bare foot in the worn out sneaker. You make out some muffled conversation, and your cries for help are stifled by the rasp of bare toes on sneaker insole. Jade quickly answers her elder sister's questions, and darts up the stairs, her feet baking you in the enclosed sneaker, her hot, calloused foot slamming down on you as she pounds excitedly up the stairs.

Maybe this was a rare kind of bug! She thought to herself. This one didn't squish like the others did, at least not yet... Maybe she should see how long it would last!

Jade's gargantan arch wrinkles above you, beads of perspiration eeking out of the girl's skin and steaming up the small pocket of stale sweaty air you were currently pinned under. You rest on the battered, damp and hot insole, begging for freedom.

Jade jumps on her bedspread, sending you bouncing about the grungy, swampy prison of her sneaker and sole. Her toes wriggled excitedly, mangling you between the soft sweaty folds between them and the hard, dirty callouses below. The stench made your eyes swim, your mouth burn, your stomach heave. You were drenched, the young girl's foot smothering you was slick with her softball sweat, the foot sockless in a hot sweaty sneaker as you choked on her oppressive scent. Cheesy and sharp and musky, you struggled to breathe in each fresh breath of this steamy hell as Jade's mind raced with ideas of what to do with you, toes kneading your poor tiny body as she thought. Squelching from the slick toes deafened your eardrums as jade says.
114331122211112122.title: Lustful for more, Jade tries to keep you for to...

choices: You are stuck to Kim's hand.
You remain flattened to Jade's dresser.
1143311222111121221.content:
Her fingers, damp from the swamp she pulled you from, opened apart, dropping you onto the rough wooden surface of her dresser. Gasping like a fish, you sucked down the Jade-free air as quickly as you could, pacing yourself with retching coughs that voided the sweat from stomach. The sky went dark as Jade leaned over you, replacing the sky with her face.

You wanted to hate her. Every functioning fibre of your body shouted to you, "Fuck this bitch who chucked you in a shoe and walked on you like dirt!" Yet, her face, blown up to IMAX proportions and beyond, was completely innocent. Her wide eyes with irises twitching tried to pinpoint you, to link your tiny, disheveled form to something she recognized; her lips twisted in a grimace as was sucked into thought. Your heart drops as you realized she really didn't know you were human; you were still so far away from salvation, it hurt.

She stood to her full height, dozens and dozens of yard above. A memory pops in your head, of you ruffling her hair and calling her a shorty. It seems terribly distant.

"Don't worry buggy," she said, a hurricane of force battering your useless body. "I've got a magnifying glass somewhere!" She turned and was gone, with speed that didn't equate with her overwhelming size.

Still, this was it, your rescue. You smiled at the thought of the little princess saving you, who always played the brave knight during babysitting. Your eyes closed. The day had been a fucking nightmare, and all you wanted to do was rest. But footsteps returned, shaking the dresser beneath you.

You look up, expecting to see the cute brown eyes expanded to an even greater size by the magnifier. Instead, a slender palm with five long, manicured nails rushes down from above. You suck in a breath to scream, just as the lotioned flesh engulfs you.



Kim strolled into her youngest sister's room. Seeing it empty, leaned against a nearby dresser; her palm pressed flat against the wood, her fingers tapping on its surface. "Jade!" she called out into the empty air. "Jade, did you want any of the chicken?"

The closet nearby swings open, the ten year old tumbling out onto the floor. "No thank you sis." Her eyes focused in on the dresser, a look of surprise on her face. "Oh no, Kim you can't be there! You'll crush Mr. Buggy~!"

Not feeling up for another 'imagination game,' Kim crossed her arms and moved to the door. "Alright, if you're still feeling well enough to play with imaginary friends you're fine."

She missed her sister furiously scanning the dresser top for a little speck as she headed back to the living room.

You walked closer to her but stopped as you got near her toes which were digging into the sand. At your diminutive size, her toes were each the size of houses in comparison to you. The little girl was a mega giantess who could crush you with a mere touch yet in place of fear you felt an odd excitement to this whole situation. The sounds of rocks being crunched and rolling filled the air as the 9 year old gigantess buried her titanic toes into the rocky terrain. You thought it was safe to get close again as her toes are no longer wiggling about and she is relatively still.

You walk forward until you are directly under the girl's immense body when suddenly the ground under shakes and the rocky pebbles of sand crumble about as the girl's toes are lifting out of the sand from under you! You buckle your legs and land on the ground on all fours for balance as you seem to lift into the air. The rocks around you seem to fall off the surface except for a few and it is clear that there is a hard surface you are on top of that was under the rocky sands you were walking on. The hard surface was a bright pink color and had a smooth texture. As you looked around you saw several gigantic extremities surrounding yourself, they looked fleshy and on top of them had a hard surface with the same bright pink. That's when you realized that you were on top of the girl's toe nail!

The girl simply flexed her toes up from under the sand and then she placed them back down on top of the sand. The movement of her toes colliding with the ground caused so much shockwaves that you fall from your position from on top of her toe nail and right in front of the feet of the young goddess of a girl. The girl sees a tiny glimmer of something move out the bottom of her vision and she reflexively looks down to investigate. There she saw a tiny speck that she usually wouldn't care anything of but she observed a little further to see a very tiny figure of a..... small human?

You continue to stay in awe at your predicament. You can easily escape this at the touch of a button but you are intrigued at where being encountered will take you. You could play off the fact that you are easily able to control your height dimensions and see what the girl’s reaction to such an odd event but who knows what risk lies ahead? The choice is however always with you.

11522122.content:
Enamored by the sight, you hardly notice the 7 year old return with the water. You're forced to attention as her voice rings out over the beach.

"Lizzy! I got the water. What now?" The littler girl struggled under the weight of the bucket, more dragging than carrying. The older child, apparently Lizzy, started up from her seated position. It was quite the spectacle from your perspective.

The massive toes squirmed free from the sand, shaking off rivers of rocks the size of your torso. The muscles in her feet tightened, and the whole appendage lifted into the air, dropping sandy boulders down as Lizzy pulled her feet out of the moat. Two massive feet marks were left in their wake, and you think you spotted the half squished remains of a sand-flea sink into the settling rocks.

An impression has been made in your tiny little head. These girls are not to be trifled with. Yet, here you are, squatting in their castle moat like a bug-sized bum. You made your way to the wall of the moat, figuring that it was time to make your leave.

"I'll pour it. You're not strong enough." Before you'd even started the ascent, the girls broke back into your reality. A quick glance showed you a horrible sight: the two girls were fighting over the bucket of water. At your size, the fight looked more like two planets colliding.

"No! You're not mommy!" The younger one's foot swept the ground as she struggled to maintain a grip, causing the moat walls to crumble down onto you. You stumble out of the way as the rock-avalanche tumbles over your hiding spot. It's not safe to be this size here; either a foot will land on you, or you'll be drowned from water spilling from the bucket. You reach for the watch, but another quake knocks a rock into you. The device slips from your hands, sinking beneath the shifting sands. You start to dig for it, pulling chunks of shell and rock from the pile, but a shadow is cast over you. You look up in horror, and watch as:
11522122.title: Ready?  Fight!

So, back to the story.

You were at the local mall, sitting at the food court with your girlfriend, Ashley (more on her in other chapters). You were just snacking on some fries when you began to feel a little weird, but you didnt let her know that, so you just stopped eating the fries and took a sip of the soda pop.

" Hey Davey, I was looking into getting some new shoes so after we finish here, we're going to the payless." Ashley told you. You didnt really care, you had nothing to do and spending time with your girlfriend was better than doing nothing, even if you were going to a bunch of dumb-ass stores.

"Jake? What happened?" Ashley whispered, trying to not to make a scene.

You had to get help, so you began running towards Ashley, or more specifically her feet since they were the closest thing to you.

You were under the bench that she was sitting on to put on her shoes, she still had the sandals she was trying on and you saw her feet, her gigantic feet slipping in and out of the sandals playfully. This was a time you wished that your girlfriend wasn't so playful.

You remember from experience that Ashley's feet were very ticklish, to the point where she really wouldn't let most people anywhere near them. Even you as her boyfriend (and a bit of a foot fetishist) really only got to touch them a few times. You thought it to be quite a shame too, because her feet always looked so nice... essentially perfect, albeit size twelves might have been a bit large for her small frame (she was 5'3"ish at your best guess)... though you tended to like large feet, so hey, you weren't gonna complain anytime soon, and certainly not now, with each of them being twice as long as you are tall (a woman's size twelve, for reference, is 10.75 inches long). So, for attention getting purposes, tickling the feet seemed like a great idea... and, for sake of enjoyment, it also seemed like a good idea, so hey.

...might have wanted to think it through more...

Your girlfriend feels something rubbing at her feet, and naturally gives a little kick at it as a basic reflex. However, this little kick is plenty enough force to send your smaller, much lighter self flying backwards into a shoe box, and getting your self knocked out.

...Maybe not your best idea...

11531121.title: Tickling. Will it work.

choices: A Clothing Store or the Bathrooms
115312.content:
You awoke, slowly but surely to the sound of thunder, or so you thought. Even before you opened your eyes you heard a loud constant booming from all directions. The world shook beneath you as you felt the ground, it felt like cold, smooth tile with a few hints of dirt. You opened your eyes to find a blur of movement to your left and right. As you came too, however, the blur became clearer and your eyes opened wide in horror.

On all sides, were dozens of giant shoes walking this way and that, boots, sneakers, sandals, all that you could think of walking around. A quick look upward, showed, beyond a metal overhang, the titans that owned the shoes, mostly girls it would seem. In a panic, you looked around. Store names like Hot Topic and GameStop, the occassional ficus along the walls, the deafening din of the crowd, and the overhang above. Putting two and two together, you realized you were at the nearby Westfield Mall, apparently shrunken to a mere inch in height and stranded under a bench,

You didn't know how you got here, what had happened, or who might be responsible. The last you remembered you were just laying down for a nap back home. That didn't matter now though, what you needed to do was find help. Looking around, you decided to head towards _______.
115312.title: Middle of The Mall

1153121.content:
Running to one side of the bench, you found there were a lot less people racing too and fro here. Considering there wasn't any store built directly in front of the bench, it was probably the safest bet, since you'd have the least traffic to move through, or potentially be crushed beneath it.

To the right, you saw the edge of the food court. A collection of tables encircled by various fast food restaurants. This might actually be a very smart option to take, despite the number of people milling about. You could easily slip in through the backdoors of a Panda Express, Chick-fil-A, or Auntie Anne's to seek help from employees. Barring that, you'd have plenty of time to scale a table and get the attention of whoever chose to sit down.

To the left, you saw the arcade, a bit of a dated addition to the mall, filled with flashing lights and bright screens. It probably contained everything from DDR to air hockey, but had considerably less people. There was only four or five to start, plus a group of girls probably around your sister's age walking in to investigate the place. That meant less chances to get stepped on. Plus there was a lot of things to carefully scale so you could get someone's attention.

Taking a moment to think you decided to head for the ______.
1153121.title: The Food Court or Arcade

choices: Go for the loner in the corner!
Wait for the group, or scout out the Skeeball!

After a long and difficult march, you find yourself beneath the neon flashing lights of the Arcade. The people inside seemed to be your usual clientele, a group of boys hovering around the shooting cabinets and taking turns, a couple girls playing skeeball, and a lone teen girl in a hoodie sulking in the corner near an space shooter cabinet.
The group of approaching girls seemed to have slowed down since, taking their time approaching that arcade - which gives you a choice.
