115312121.content:
As the explosions of the shooter get more and more intense, you dart over to the girl who appears to be weighing her options at the Galaga cabinet. Looking intently at the high scores, absentmindedly playing with a roll of quarters in her hand. You take in the scene.

She was clearly in her late to mid teens, certainly not 18 by the looks of her. She didn't care much for appearances, judging by her baggy grey hoodie covered in who knows how many smudges, the jeans with obvious wear, the long brown hair looking a little unwashed. Your view, however was increasingly more and more comprised of the giant black sneakers below, ratty laces spilling over the tops as the jeans fell like a denim waterfall on the tongue of the shoe. This was your chance! Get her attention!

The girl breaks open the roll of quarters. You don't have much time before she'll have no attention to spare for you. What do you do?
115312121.title: Go for the loner in the corner!

choices: She's getting pumped- another leg shake sends you flying!
1153121211.content:
Collecting your nerves, you see an easy avenue laid out before you. The frayed fibers of the jeans had been rubbing against the floor all the wile while the girl paced and sighed at the arcade game. The moody teen's attention was your best option, and the falling-apart cuffs of her jeans your best bet to get it. When she pauses, you make a run for the dingy sneakers, jumping and grasping at the dirty denim atop.

Success! You grasp the girl's jeans like your life depended on it, several inches off the ground. Not bad.

You scale your way up the slightly musty fabric, denim speaking of days without a wash and dust, dirt and snack food settling into the fibers. No matter. You couldn't turn back now. The threads of the jeans near her shins were worn even looser, easy handholds for something the size of a bug. So that's where you set your sights, clawing up the baggy tower of tween jeans. The leg shook.

The girl bent down, quarter in hand, your progress being impeded at only just above her ankle! You curse your luck, as one, then two quarters clink into the machine. The denim shakes, and you look down. A vast, dirty landscape of worn sneaker greets below, and you see a wave of toes wriggle through the leathery material atop them. Gulp. Best steer clear of those stompers.

You steel your resolve, and claw up the jeans, and:
1153121211.title: Scale the jeans!

choices: Somehow manage to keep your grip?!
11531212111.content:
You cling to your perch at the side seam of her jeans, almost making it to her shin as the quarters clink. almost...

The girl bounces in place, collecting her wits. The jeans bounce with her, swinging you around to the rear of her calf. Not good, you think.

Menu options are fiddled with, the game and the teen revving up their engines. But she pauses, leaving you staring down - jeans, folded over the back of a thick skater shoe, dirty linoleum floor below, soda spills and rock hard certain doom all that are there to greet you should you fall. What was she doing?

You get you answer, and you get it in the form of a second sneaker rising up in your peripheral vision. Huge, black, dingy - a wad of gum fused to the thigh rubber sole as the toe nears you. Did she feel you? Impossible! the fabric of the jeans alone is way too thick to even get your fingers totally through, and you didn't weigh anything to register as dangling on her leg! The rubber looms. you see in glorious detail the scuffs and gouges in the old material, filled in with dirt, dead grass, and what you suspect is a dead ant. You see it head down. Relief!

But it doesn't last. The toe of the sneaker rests on the heel of the first, and slowly, painstakingly, you see a heel wriggle free beneath the sea of denim. The white whale crests - well, you assume it was white, once. The pale ankle gives way to the hem of a darkened, grey sock. time and no washes had left the sock a shadow of its once clean self. As the heel pops free of the tight shoe with a rasp of fabric, you see the foot arch up, resting on the ball as it slides out of the sneaker like a gigantic beast. You see the back of the sneaker just out below you, the insole worn to nothing below the tween's foot. The heat radiates up like a vent, smacking you in the face with the cloying musk of hot, stale sneaker. The second sneaker approaches, grinding its toe up and down the arch of the girl's dirty sock. Up, down, up, down. The rasping of the sock against the worn rubber is loud, even for you, scratching giving you a very clear picture of how much force that foot can exert.

She had an itch.

And you had a dangerous view. The smell makes your hand fly to you nose by instinct, she must not have bathed in what, three days? It made your stomach protest as the sneaker finished relieving that itch. The dirty sock was pulled down by the scratching, you notice - right before being pulled back up by a hand above, baggy sweatshirt sleeve trailing along - just baggy enough to catch your back- and with only one hand, you can hardly be expected to keep your grip- The hot, damp mouth of the thick sneaker looms below as you pinwheel your free arm for balance. Of course, you -
11531212111.title: She's getting pumped- another leg shake sen...

choices: She pulls her foot out, feeling something in the shoe
She's still clueless to your presence
115312121111.content:
The insole has no give. It's hard and damp, and your crash landing jars every bone in your body. Yet there's no time to recover. Above, roughly cut finger nails scratch across her gray sock as she continues to itch, a deafening sound that reminds you of your frailty. Fingers the length of ocean liners soar against a foot the size of an island, and you're nothing more than a speck.

And then she's done, and a wave of frayed fabric rushes over you. You're helpless against her, snagged by the sock and dragged along the thin insole. The sky has fallen on top of you. You struggle, kicking and screaming and even biting into the rank threads, but after only moments her foot presses down harder, squeezing the little space left into nothing. The sweltering air, thick with moisture, is rationed to you by minuscule movements and shifts.

Your lungs burn, your bones ache; soon, you fear you'll succumb. Her weight could turn you to paste, her sweat could drown the life from your lungs, or her odor could poison you to death.

She moves again, the web of threads above pulling you along with her. You roll along her sole as she slides her foot, screaming as your arm is nearly wrenched from its socket. She's moving, that's for sure, but does that mean salvation? Or will your hell only deepen in the near future?
115312121111.title: Down and under

1153121211111.content:
The filthy sock drags you along the worn, warm putrid insole, fibers scratching along your face. Your breath choked as you finally met clean air as the girl inspected her sock. Looking for any sign of what was irritating her. You however were now face to face with the giant doe eyed teen. Her green eyes scanning over you, wait were they...

"The fuck is that?" She squinted, her rancid breath flowing over you, clear pieces of previous meals lining the cracks of her teeth. "Is that an ant?" She leaned in, you tried wriggling as her green eyes scanned over you...

Terrified beyond belief at what she might do with your miniscule form... Watching her mouth open as she said...
1153121211111.title: Meeting Maya

choices: The thread pulls apart in your grip! Down you go!
115312121112.content:
You cling on, tightly, your grip on the frayed denim the only thing separating you from the humid abyss below. A second chance. You gaze down at the pounded-in imprint of the girl's heel, the insole all but eaten away by wear and foot funk. Nothing could live long in that stale, foot-steamed swamp of a shoe. You resolve to climb up and get her attention.

You swing one arm back up to catch another frayed thread of denim, and -
115312121112.title: Somehow manage to keep your grip?!

choices: Only one way to find out: Try!
Oh no, too late! Her foot is already on the move!
1153121211121.content:
It tears loose. The strand you grasped at was apparently already barely hanging on, even your pathetic weight tore it loose. The jerking motion from your body weight being dropped by the detached strand tore at the other thread you were already hanging onto, and it tore nearly all the way. You were now dangling by one arm on a very loose thread of denim. Any shift in body weight could tear it and send you plummeting into the teen's horrid skate shoe below.

You remain still for five whole seconds. That's when you've decided that if you don't do anything, the girl will shift in some minute way that will tear the denim and send you to your doom. So you have to at least try. Maybe it will hold just long enough for you to grip another sturdier strand.

You shift your body weight in an attempt to swing closer. Your mind has no time to process the tearing of this strand, it only knows one thing: You fell. Well, it knows another. You fell somewhere terrible.

It feels like there is a haze surrounding you, a humid, smelly environment that promises to suffocate you in due time. Rough black walls rise up in a circle in front of you, and behind you...well let's not speak of it. A tunnel with an atmosphere that only gets gradually worse. Her socked toes rest on the back rim of the sneaker, occasionally wiggling. As revolting as the inside of the shoe is, you have a much greater fear of the dingy sock, containing the source of all this befoulment that surrounds you. To think, this suffocating atmosphere is the result of a teen girl's unwashed feet. It's times like now that the true consequences of being so small really hit home.

But you don't want to be stuck here. Surely you can climb out to safety?
1153121211121.title: Scratch That: Plummet

choices: The toes pounce and drag you underneath them.
The toes slide right over and leave you pinned under her arch.
11531212111212.content:
As you slowly get your bearings in the hot indentation formed by the massive girl's heel, you look up to behold the dingy, grayed sock of the teen titaness. splotches of discolored fabric and a pounded-in footprint decorate the bottom of the clearly unwashed sock, but the sight definitely took a backseat to the smell. The tattered black walls of the sneaker rise up, dwarfing you in the carbon copy of the giantess's sole that had been worn into the damp insole from who knows how many years of wear and tear.

The humid, swampy environment clouds your thought process, and the foot rears up like a massive off-white whale, preparing to dive back down into it's humid ocean.
Your legs act without thought, spurring you to a standing position as the spongy insole squeezes out stale sweat under your minuscule weight. The light gets dimmer as you are treated to the greying fabric blocking out the dim arcade lights, bare sole peeking through some of the threadbare parts on the ball of her foot. You run, starting to slip and slide as your bare feet carry you down to the toe section, noting with disgust that the floor and walls get slicker and wetter as you go, and the heat multiplies along with the cloying musk of unwashed teen girl feet. The mighty, deafening rasp of fabric on fabric comes ever closer as the girl above finished tugging back on her sock, and sliding her monolithic, rank sock back into it's dingy home. It approaches like a massive dirty tidal wave, toes wriggling like the heads of a hungry hydra as they claw through the battlefield that is her soggy insole.

The sweaty sock rears up like a lion, and unleashes a gust of hot, stale feminine foot funk that makes your head swirl and your nostrils burn. With that wave of musk, you barely notice what happens when :
11531212111212.title: Oh no, too late! Her foot is already on the move!

115312122.content:
Taking shelter besides a cabinet displaying a prominent "Out of Order" sign, you caught your breath as you glanced around. You were right next to the entrance, which meant you had a close look at the approaching stampede of young girls through the glass walls that lined the front. They seemed to be preteens with an unusual collection of pink sandals, tennis shoes, and boots being the only thing you could see. Running straight for them didn't seem like the safest plan considering there were at least six of them and getting trampled by all of them would spell disaster. Of course, considering there were six of them, that meant six sets of eyes that could possibly notice you.

Glancing towards the Skeeball table in the back of the room, you could see the two girls seemed to be competing with one another. A long rope of pink tickets extended from each machine, coiling on the floor like cartoonish snakes. On the other end of the arcade was a prize counter, and it occurred to you how much they could probably get with that many tickets. Unlike the approaching group, these two were older, looking like they were in college, likely 21 or so. Considering how much they were giggling, they were probably having a girl's day out and would probably be here for quite a while, so they might be a safer option.

So....who do you choose now?
115312122.title: Choices, Choices...

1153122.content:
Running to one side of the bench, you found there was a rather busy set of shops lining this side of the mall. There were also a lot less people walking, with most of them entering the stores to browse at their leisure. It'd be a safe bet to say there'd be no shortage of people to notice you.

Immediately in front of you was a clothing store, the name of which you couldn't see. Judging from the mannequins in the window, it was some sort of women's clothing store, but considering the humanoid figures wore a range of outfits ranging from sensual lingerie to casual school clothes, it was difficult to determine what kind. The racks inside presented a similar mix of clothing as well as a mix of women. Provided you could avoid getting crushed on your way in, there would be plenty of people to notice you.

Off to the side a bit was a safer option, marked by a stick figure woman in a dress, the lady's restrooms. It was a bit of an invasion of privacy, but at this height you'd take help where you could get it. The occasional woman walked in or out, shopping bags in hand, but otherwise it seemed a bit secluded. Once inside, you could find a quiet place to climb up higher and get someone's attention without being mistaken as a bug. Hopefully though, they wouldn't think you were perving on them.

Weighing your options, you eventually made your way towards ______.
1153122.title: A Clothing Store or the Bathrooms

11532.content:
Angie flicks a lock of golden hair out of her face for the fifth time as she tries to get a good look at the damage you've done. She's a pretty sharp girl who can hold her ground well in a battle, but unluckily for her, you happen to be a little bit sharper. One more move, and you'll have this game in the bag.

She slides her bishop forward to block your queen, which is exactly what you want. Your eyes glint gleefully as you reach for your knight to move it into the winning position. Your mouth readies itself to say that oh so beautiful word that all winners say.

"Checkmat--"

Before you can finish, a foreign arm flies across the entire chessboard, shoving all the pieces onto the hardwood floor. You look up to see a girl with black hair and big blue eyes.

"Marisa!? What the hell did you do that for!?" you scream.

Marissa smiles innocently and giggles a bit. "Oops, sorry."

"What do you mean 'oops?' You did that on purpose!" you say.

"Davie, I think it really was an accident." Angie says.

"Whatever," you say, getting up from the couch, "I've gotta go to the bathroom anyways. I'll be right back."

You stomp your way to the bathroom, but before you can grab the doorknob, the door swings open, and Erica stares at you through her little glasses.

"Is something wrong?" she says.

"It's nothing." you say, "I just need to go to the bathroom."

You quickly move past her and close the door.

You let out an angry sigh. You know for a fact that Marissa's being a liar because she's lied to you plenty of times before. Why did the other girls have to trust her so much? She was way too good at doing that innocent puppy dog look.

You reach for the toilet to flush it, but the second your hand touches the flusher, a shockwave of energy rushes through your body, making you fall to your knees and shut your eyes in agony. The shock surges through your body for a good minute, before it finally slows down and stops.

You open your eyes and look up to see...
11532.title: your cousin's

choices: Marisa is walking into the bathroom.
Angie is walking into the bathroom.
115322.content:
Woah, this is freaking trippy. Either you're having some kind of crazy fever dream, or you're actually kneeling on one of the tiny square tiles on the bathroom floor. Jeez, it looks like it's bigger than you are. You laugh to yourself. It has to be some kind of hallucination or something. You rub your eyes, stand up, and look forward, expecting to see yourself in the mirror.

Instead, you see more giant bathroom tiles, a whole bunch of them going off in different directions. Okay, that's odd.

You rub your eyes and look again. Same thing, tons of giant bathroom floor tiles going off in different directions. Each direction leads to some kind of enormous white wall hundreds of feet away. Your mouth starts to dry. This hallucination is lasting far longer than it should.

You turn around to see if it's any different behind you and you see another giant white wall, but this one is much closer than the others, and it looks kind of different. It's much more shiny, and it kind of curves upwards and outwards as it gets closer to the top, almost like a...

...toilet bowl.

Holy. Hell.

Your heart rate skyrockets as you stare at what can only be the most colossal toilet you have ever seen. It looks too big to be possible. Taller than the highest skyscraper, yet wider than a baseball stadium at the top.

This can't be real. It has to be some kind of visual trick or something.

You start walking toward it to see if you can touch it, but realize immediately that it's even bigger than you thought because it's a whole football field away from you. You walk toward it anyways.

It gets even more colossal as you get closer. By the time you actually get close enough to touch it, you can't even see its overall shape anymore.

It feels cold when you touch it.

And that's when you reallize that it's all real. You're really standing next to a toilet that is literally a thousand times larger than you. You must have shrunk down in size somehow. Your kneels wobble and you fall onto your butt. This is a whole lot to take in.

Your thoughts are interrupted by a loud, low booming sound coming from what sounds like miles away. It makes the whole world shake a little. It's followed by another boom, then a really loud squeaking sound.

Someone's opening the bathroom door.

SQUEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEK BBOOOOOOOOM! BOOOOOOOOOOM!

You look toward the bathroom door to see that
115322.title: You're 1 inch tall.

1153221.content: Marisa thunders into the bathroom with her large feet, you gasp in awe as she enters, her brown curly hair and tan skin sparkling with water as she blinks her long eyelashes. You gasp at her very slender thighs as she stretches liberally. Then she uses the
1153221.title: Marisa is walking into the bathroom.

11533.content:
You were currently at McNaley's, a local restaurant chain that was essentially a McDonald's ripoff with slightly more variety to its menu. You worked part time here most weekends along with two other employees.

-Kim Warner: An 17 year old cashier. 5'2" with brown hair, blue eyes, B-cup breasts, and a pleasantly plump ass. Kim sees you as a rival, since you take shorter breaks and always seem to get more customers. Because of this she is rather vindictive to you, despite being very friendly under normal circumstances.

-Miley Price: A 23-year old manager working to pay through college. 5'9" with black hair, high C-cup breasts, and an athletic figure. Miley is a very hardworking individual who doesn't accept any slacking off. Due to your good work ethic, Miley really seems to like you, perhaps a bit more than you think.

It's currently midday, not that many people around. You're working hard _____when your stomach begins to feel a bit woozy.

What are you doing?
11533.title: Part Time Worker

choices: You lose a few inches (Still pretty unnoticeable)
115331.content:
You stood behind the register, proud and triumphant that you had finally managed to get Kim on cleaning duty while you waited on customers. Sure the majority of your customers was screaming brats, but it was better than cleaning the toilets, or worse yet the ball pit. Plus it was usually Kim that got you stuck doing those things, this time you beat her at her own game and for that you were happy.

Kim glared at you as she sulked off to the play pen, wash cloth in hand. You could swear she mouthed "I'll get you" as she passed.

Regardless you were quickly pulled away from petty vengeance and back to your job as a couple of college age woman ordered. You rang up a burger, one order of fries, a personal pizza, and two sodas before sending it back to the kitchen where Miley was working the grill.

As you walk back to the register to await the next customer that enters, your stomach starts to groan and your vision blurs.

What happens?
115331.title: Working at the Register

choices: You haven't moved, but you've shrunk to an inch in height
You're lying on a cot in the employee break area
1153312.content:
As your vision blurs more and more, your head begins to pound. You feel yourself falling, blackness overtaking you. You pass out before you even hit the ground.

You awaken sometime later, completely confused as to where you are. Slowly however the environment becomes clear.

Where are you?
1153312.title: Out Like a Light

11533121.content:
As you glance around you see the familiar tile floor of McNaley's. You find it odd that no one would notice an employee passed out. As you look up you see Kim, or rather her deep purple panties beneath her black uniform skirt. You manage to take your eyes off them and look up further.

Kim appears to be working the register waiting on a teenage girl and her younger sister from the sounds of the voices. Everyone's voice seems strangely loud for some reason.

You stand up, intending to give Kim an earful for leaving you on the ground, only to find that you're not as tall as before. You used to tower over Kin but as you stand up you see you don't even come up to the top of her grey flats.

You begin to panic realizing you're probably only an inch tall and stranded in the middle of a restaurant. You need to find help and quickly. Kim is right in front of you, she may be a rival at work but surely she would help you. On the other hand there was Miley in the kitchen, though that seemed a more dangerous route. Either way you should make a decision soon, before someone steps on you by mistake.

Who will you go too?
11533121.title: A Company is Only as Strong as its Smallest Worker

choices: Kim is walking to the break room
Kim is reaching down to scratch an itch
115331211.content:
Kim is right here, why wouldn't you get help. Besides, she has to help you if you're only an inch tall.

You immediately cross yelling off the list of ways to get Kim's attention. Besides the noisy din of the restaurant and your diminished voice, if Kim did hear you there was a pretty good chance she'd think you were a bug. Instead you decide to climb her to a point where she would recognize you.

You gaze up the length of Kim's form, trying not to ogle at her underwear. You want to plan out your route beforehand to minimize any decisions you would make hundreds of feet in the air. You can start by hoisting yourself on to her grey flats, then climb her black knee high socks to her knee. From there you'll grab onto her skirt and climb on the outside up to her yellow shirt, a staple of the McNaley's uniform. At that point it's just a short stretch to her ear where you can call to her and get help.

With this in mind you approach Kim's shoe, thankful that she generally stands still. It takes a couple seconds, but you finally manage to pull yourself on top of her shoe. With that task out of the way, you eye her sock for a moment before approaching it.

Loose fibers make for good handholds, though you find yourself feeling sick as you first climb up. Just below, in the tight confines of Kim's flats, rises the thick stench of salty foot sweat. Thankfully the rest of Kim's sock isn't even damp. You quickly ascend the sock, ignoring the fading smell and adhering to the mantra "Don't look down." You climb the sock much quicker than you thought possible since the cheap cotton made for a convenient ladder.

You now stand perched on the edge of Kim's sock, her knee immediately behind you. You fight the urge to survey your progress and instead look up towards Kim's hanging skirt. It's a good inch above you, so you may have to climb on top of Kim's kneecap to reach it.

You give a slight gulp and feel as though you might lose your nerve. Before you have a chance to consider climbing down, everything begins moving.

What is happening?
115331211.title: Climb Kim

choices: Kim looks down and sees you
1153312112.content:
As her leg shifts subtly, forcing you to grip the edge of her sock, Kim's monolithic form arches slightly. A well manicured fingernail reaches out, probing for an itch. Behind it you see Kim is still looking forward, talking with a customer.

You duck down as her sharp fingernail nearly bisects you, it settles just above you and scraps about a bit before retracting. It then moves down, forcing you to inch the the side as it comes down right next to you. Almost immediately after it moves closer, forcing you to shimmy along the narrow edge of Kim's sock. She's trying to scratch an itch and unfortunately you appear to be the itch.

What will happen?
1153312112.title: An Itch to be Scratched

choices: Miley tells Kim that she's closing up early since they're understaffed
Miley tells Kim to clean the PlayPlace in your absence
11533121121.content:
The customer far above you stepped away from the register and you watched as Kim's monolithic form arched over to better scratch her itch. Your eyes locked on each others and Kim's bemused expression of hard work slowly shifted to a grin of pleasure and superiority.

"Well, well, well, looks like a little bug, we can't have that in an eating establishment," Kim said with a snicker as she pinched your body between two fingers and lifted you up to the counter.

"Kim! It's me! Davey!" You call up to Kim.

"I know it's you, bug!" Kim replied in a loud and harsh whisper as she held you cupped in her hands.

"You have to help me," You tell Kim, worried that she won't comply.

"Oh, I'll help you," Kim replied with a smile that betrayed intentions contrary to what she claimed, "I'll even do your job for you, since you're too small to work. I do expect you to pay me back in full though," Kim explains with a smirk.

Before you can question what she means, let along flee, you hear the voice of your boss, Miley, beckoning Kim. Your co-worker quickly tugs back the collar of her short and drops you into her warm, but dark bosom, before walking back to her boss. Meanwhile you tumble down into the forbidden crevasse, desperately and futilely seeking purchase on the smooth flesh. Eventually midway between Kim's breast you stop, stuck in an admittedly uncomfortable position. Outside you her the faint voices of Miley telling Kim to do something.

What has she told Kim?
11533121121.title: The Work of Two

choices: Lucy returns to the Playplace, letting Kim retrieve you
Lucy finishes her lunch and heads home, taking you with her
115331211212.content:
“Kim, I can’t find Davey anywhere,” You heard Miley shout form a distance, “Do me a favor and clean up the PlayPlace!”

You snickered down between Kim’s breasts, you couldn’t help it. Even in your current predicament, at the mercy of this titaness, you found it funny that she would now be forced to go through with the most loathsome and disgusting duty possible. She had even told you she was going to be doing your half of the work while you were her captive, but you bet she hadn’t counted on cleaning up whaever gunk kids had left in that maze of plastic tunnels. Unfortunately it would appear that Kim had heard your snicker, however minute it may have been. Her breasts came slamming together, forcing the air from your lungs for a split second as Kim squeezed. As the walls of flesh became less constraining you heard Kim talking, her voice quiet and directed towards you, it was also dripping with fake kindness.

“Well now Davey, I’d hate for you to get hurt while I’m cleaning so I’m going to be leaving you somewhere to wait for me,” Kim said, punctuating it with a bit of a snicker.

Soon the crack of light coming from above through Kim’s cleavage is bloated out as her hand reaches in and its fingers clamp down around you. As you come out into the light of day, you see a blue shelf infront of you, lined with box-shaped openings, a sign reading “Please Take Off Shoes Before Entering.” The shelves had only three or four pairs of shoes, you noted, mostly sandals and flipflops, you did however notice one pink and white sneaker, which was missing its twin. Unfortunately, you quickly found its twin being gripped in Kim’s other hand. As she quickly brought you over the opening of the shoe, you saw the grey outline of a girl’s foot indented into the insole. Without warning, Kim let go of you, sending you tumbling down onto the hot white fabric of the insole. As you struggle to get to your feet, your world begins to shift and shake as Kim shoves the shoe back on the shelf. You end up falling on your back in the heel, forcing you to stare up at Kim’s evilly smirking face from the shadows.

“Don’t worry Davey, I’ll be sure to get you when I come back,” Kim said in a voice that made you doubt the sincerity in that statement.

Kim’s face swiftly disappeared as she left to go about with her job. As you finally began to wrap your head around the situation, you were hit with the oppressive odor flowing like a cloud of smoke from deeper in the dark shoe. You quickly used both hands to cover your nose as the combined burning stench of dirt, sock lint, and sweat began to pry its way into your nostrils. You shock your head as the fumes began to invade it, giving you the kindling of a headache. Shrugging off the foul smell and its effects, you begin to plan your escape. Even at only an inch tall, the walls leading up to the opening and separating you from freedom weren’t that tall, a good jump and you would be out and hopefully away from Kim for good. Unfortunately, there was one thing you didn’t account for, at least not until you heard a group of girlish voices approaching the shelf you were on. Only by the time your prison once again shock around, throwing you on your back, did you figure it out. The Playplace closed when it was being cleaned!

The owner of the shoe had returned, alongside what were either her sisters, friends, or complete strangers, eitherway she was going to put her likely stinky foot into the shoe Kim had left you in. As you get up for the second time, you managed to catch a quick glimpse at the girl. She had to be around ten or so, maybe a year or two older, her freckles made it hard to tell. She had short auburn hair and from what you could see was wearing a jean skirt and a My Little Pony t-shirt. You also soon discovered she was wearing white socks as her foot raised up to enter the hole above you, presenting the girl’s sole, covering in dirty cotton. Your instincts to survive kicked in as the girl’s foot lowered with inhuman speed, you took off like a shot, running deeper into the shoe as the overwhelming stench of the toe area burned at your nose. As you were almost to safety, you tripped falling face first into the rough insole, getting a free rug burn in the process. That pain was quickly forgotten though as the ball of this mystery preteen’s foot collided with you, grinding you between moist cotton and stinky rigid insole fabric. You coughed and gagged as the sock pressed your face against the floor, forcing you to taste it. A taste akin to burnt rubber and mud infiltrated your sense of taste as the rest of your senses were being violated.

Outside of the shoe, the girl was completely oblivious to your plight. She was Lucy and she had been having a lot of fun playing around with all the other kids in the Playplace before that big girl had told them to clear out for a few minutes. Lucy hoped that the Playplace would open up soon, otherwise she would have to go home after she ate her lunch. Now bored, Lucy simply went back to her table, where her mother waited for her.

As Lucy sat down, you felt the pressure of her weight lifted off of you. This ten-ish-year old was anything but heavy at normal size, but her weight became that of a cement block when you were being stepped on at this size. Trying your best to breath as little as possible as your were subjected to this girl’s malodorous feet, you were also subjected to a horrific thought. Kim might never get you back, if this young girl felt you in her shoe or left before the Playplace opened back up, you’d be away from familiar territory. As awful as being at Kim’s mercy sounded, you weren’t exactly sure what this girl might do to you if she finds you in her shoe. She could get made and kill you. She could just think you’re a doll or a toy and keep you forever. Worse yet, she could be the kind of girl who likes tormenting bugs and come up with sadistic ways to play with you. Eitherway, you didn’t have a lot of say in what happens at this point, all you could do is wait, hold still, and silently curse Kim for being such a bitch.

After a few minutes you got your answer when…
115331211212.title: Kim's Idea of a Waiting Room

1153312112122.content:
You squirm, trapped under this massive little girl's moist sock, Shoved down onto the hot white fabric of the dirty insole. She hungrily finished her chicken nuggets and looked with glee back at the playplace, her malodorous toes wiggling in excitement, whacking you around and subjecting you to facefuls of grimy sock fabric, the only thing separating the stinky behemoth from rubbing on you directly.

Lucy saw the playplace was still being cleaned and pouted. She'd have to go home now. Her sneaker tapped on the floor, the hat stifling your poor lungs with preteen foot funk. Lucy's unwashed tootsies would be your company for a lot longer, it seemed.

As Lucy kneaded the thing in her shoe, rubbing your tortured tongue down the sweaty insole, dragging you down her young sole into the musky depths of the toe section.
1153312112122.title: Lucy finishes her lunch and heads home, taking ...

choices: She's going to clock out and head home
She's going to clock out and go to Miley's house
She's gonna take a break before starting another shift
11533121122.content:
With the casual motion of scratching her leg absentmindedly Kim completely eliminates all of your hard work as the nails scrape into her skin shifting it and knocking you lose. A sense of defeat set in as you fell down, tumbling against Kim’s sock. Out of fear and desperation you attempt to stop or at least slow your descent rapidly attempting to get a grasp of the sock. Only you aren’t able to, all you get for your efforts is friction burn.

You’re determined not to go splat on the floor and force your hands into the cotton of the socks stitching. Though it doesn’t stop your descent at all as a tread becomes undone and starts to tangle around your body gradually slowing down. Finally, you come to a complete stop… just beneath her ankle and trapped by the loose thread leaving you stuck close enough to the vinegary scent of Kim’s sweaty foot.

You barely hold back your lunch between the disgusting smell and Kim constantly shifting her feet. You struggle and struggle but can’t break free of the thread, you even scream in vain to get her to notice you. Alas, she was still oblivious to your existence as she carries on her shift.
Hours pass and you swear the smell had only gotten worse as time went on. Probably didn’t help that it was a bus shift was a lot of customers and body heat. You take the time to imagine the image of her feet marinating in those flats and cringe.

As the rush of people steadily declined, that must have meant Kim’s shift was coming to an end. She began to move but with only a limited view forward it was hard to tell where between the roller coaster motion of her movement.
11533121122.title: All Tied Up

choices: You only shrink down to 5'5" and leave the tunnel
You shrink down to 6" and are trapped in the tunnels with the girls
115332.content:
With no kids around for a time, you've been stuck with the incredible disgusting job of cleaning out the PlayPlace, an indoor playground made up off winding tunnels, slides, a trampoline, and a ballpit. Kids would leave their shoes at the entrance and come to run around screaming in the germ-filled plastic jungle. (You had twice found a used diaper in the ballpit) Kim had switched your name in for cleaning duty for the rest of the month as a part of her typical retribution.

Your stomach ache passed quickly passed, but something felt somewhat off. Regardless you go back to cleaning, eager to get done and thoroughly wash your hands. As you work, a mother comes in with two bratty looking kids trailing closely behind her, one around 8 or 9 and the other being preteen.

You aren't done cleaning yet and the two girls are eyeing the playground like little sharks. You don't know what to do, so you just keep trying to scrub out what you hope is brown tinted gum from one of the tunnels. As the two girls break away from their mother can come charging towards the slides and tunnels, your stomach ache flares up again, this time accompanied by blurred vision.

What happens?
115332.title: The Worst Job

choices: You make it to the end, the girls crawled down another tunnel
A hand forces you to the ground and an excited voice says "Hey I found a toy!"
1153322.content:
You shakily get to your feet as you find yourself at the size of a Barbie doll, with the sounds of two bratty girls loudly echoing through the maze of dirty plastic.

You don't have much time to think so you end up just running. You know that only two things lie in the direction your running in; The Ball Pit of Nameless Horrors and The Trampoline of a Thousand Sweaty Footprints. Both of these seemed preferable to becoming the two to a pair of preteens. Right now your only hope was to get to Miley, since knowing Kim, she might just toss you back in the Play Pen out of spite.

The sounds of giggling grow closer and you can hear frenzied crawling pound on the plastic, just as your heart pounds on your chest. The closest thing to a light at the end of the tunnel draws into view, but you're not sure you'll make it.
1153322.title: Six Inches and Running Scared

11533221.content:
The pounding gets louder for only a moment, before fading away to background noise. You slow down. They seem to have taken a turn, leaving you alone. How lucky.

Actually, luck isn't a fitting word to describe anything in the maze of plastic tubes. Parents let their kids into the playplace because they assume it's clean. In reality, it's one of the filthiest environments on Earth, a breeding ground for diseases and a dump all sorts of trash. To give credit to the employees, they do their best to wash up. It's a difficult job to fit in the tubes and clean them, especially with new filth being deposited daily.

Now, you were smaller than a barbie doll and trudging through it. The plastic floor shined with a thin layer of moisture, unnoticeable to a normal sized person, but impossible to ignore for you. Unfortunately, you knew it wasn't from a polish or a cleaning fluid. It was simply sweat, spit and snot from the kids, turning the air humid and the floor sticky.

And of course, there was a fair amount of extraneous debris laying around. A chewed bit of gum was smeared along the wall, a mushed up McNugget was laying in a nasty heap, and the front half of a blue princess sock was lying across the tunnel. How do you even rip a sock in half?

Vaulting over the mutilated fabric face of some unknown princess, you manage to reach the light, the end of the tunnel... A giant plastic bubble window is stretched across the end of the tube, letting light into a fork in the path. It's not an exit, but a continuation of the maze. Somehow, somewhere, you got lost in the tubes. At full size, they were easy to navigate and move through. Now, you were completely lost.

There was no point to sitting around and moping; it'd only be so long until another brat stumbles upon you. The path diverged in two directions, up to the left, and down to the right. It made sense that going down would lead you back to ground floor, but these playplaces were not designed to be straight forward. If you went up, you might find a slide that'd take you out even quicker.
11533221.title: Maze runner

choices: They keep going but miss your location
11533222.content:
A sharp blow connects with your back pinning you to the tunnels floor, and causing you great pain. The weight the kid places on her arm is too much and you begin to have trouble breathing, the last thing you recall is the sound of the a child's laughter and the words "Hey I found a toy!" before losing consciousness.

Minutes pass and you finally come to, though not by the most pleasant means. You're swung back and fourth as the two kids fight over you still in the tubes. "Give it to me Tracy!" the 12 year old grunted as she tried to pry the "toy" from her kid sisters grasp. "No way Lacey I found him he's mine!" Yelled the 9 year old as she made a dash toward the slide leading out of the tunnels only to be tackled by Lacey knocking you loose from her grasp and falling down the slide. eventually landing in the poorly kept ball pit.

"Look what you did Tracey now we lost it" "You tackled me its your fault Lacey" "Whatever, let's just go and find it already". Down in the ball pits you've landed at the bottom with only large colorful plastic spheres taking up your view. You're thankful to be away from those demons for the moment. It's the first time you've gotten a moment of silence since this whole shrinking problem occurred. Just then the girls land in the ball pit knocking you into a new direction when you stop you feel something moist on your back. Struggling to turn around you see you landed on a lost previously used retainer spit and all.

You would've been disgusted if the fear of being discovered by those two wasn't so great. They dig through the ball pit until one of them makes it to your general direction. A large sweaty socked foot lands squarely on you as one of the children begins digging through. You pray they don't notice and leave you.
11533222.title: Sibling rivalry

choices: One of the employees comes to clean the pit.
115332221.content:
Her sweaty foot presses you down for only a second before lifting off quickly. From above, you hear her shout, "I think I found it!" The balls begin to rustle and part. The sight of her hand was just as impressive as Moses parting the Red Sea.

You flinched, instinctively frightened of the hand. Reasonable, since each of it's grimy, poorly clipped nails was the size of your head. You weren't letting her get you, not if you wanted to live. Except, there was nothing for you to do. The balls that were easily moved by her were massive obstacles to you, and you didn't have any tools and weapons, except...

At the last minute, right before her hand found its mark, you grabbed the retainer and held it up like a shield. A real Captain America here, you are. The fingers grab it from you, and faster than you thought possible the entire arm retreats back up. You wait...

"EWWW!?!" A scream erupts from her. Actually, from both of them. The balls go tumbling around and flying as the two girls panic and try to get out of the pit. Their screams, loud at first, soon fade away as they run to their mother.

Chuckling, you can't believe you'd ever be happy to find a retainer in the ball pit. How drastically your life is changed. Time to get some help.

It turns out, getting help is easier said than done. The balls are shorter than you, and moving one threatens to collapse more from above, making moving extremely slow. You begin to move between them, fitting your body into whatever crevice it fits into. You're not certain you're actually getting closer to the exit; in fact, you're pretty sure your moving in circles. Even if you make it to the side of the pit, how do you plan of getting out? You can't climb a smooth wall like that. It looks like you'll have to wait for someone. With any luck, you'll get their attention without being walked on.
115332221.title: Retaining safety

choices: An engine running, they're going home!
The mother digging though her purse for something!
115332222.content:
Up above Lacey continued to dig frantically for her lost toy, and hopefully sneak it out away from her younger sister in the process. She kept this pace up determined to have her prize. Down below and the bottom of the ball pit you were still pinned down, with the menacing foot right on top of you still sweating on top of your body.

You're in hell and felt humiliated. Being pinned down by an unknowing preteen being watered down by her foot sweat and not being able to do a damn thing about it. At some point you started wishing she'd notice you so you'd at least get away from the retainer. Suddenly her massive toes began to press down on you, and began flexing and spreading. Her toes started examining your body wiggling around in an attempt to identify what you were.

This feeling wasn't at all unpleasant it felt more like being tickled but smellier, and damper. Finally Lacey stopped, after her foot examination she recognized your shape and reached down to grab you. Your vision was then greeted with light, the sound of games and children's laughter and the smell of cheap food. Lacey had found you and had no intention on letting you go.

The girl looked over to see her sister on the far end of the ball pit still looking for you paying no mind to Lacey. She carefully made her way out of the pit and to her mother sitting at table currently engrossed in going though some texts with her purse sitting beneath her seat. The mothers name was Mary she was a 6 foot tall curvy woman, and a single mother working for an ad agency.

Lacey started crawling beneath the chair and opened the purse. You figured she was going to hide you in her mom's purse a place where her little sister had no chance of accessing. And your assumption was right she placed you in the purse after moving some personal objects aside leaving you again buried alive. With that finished Lacey returned to her sister confident she got away with the perfect crime.

You were tired and bruised, and figured your best course of action at the moment was to take it easy and rest and regain your strength for whatever ordeal awaited you next. You soon doze off.... only to awaken hours later to the sound of....
115332222.title: Getting away with you

choices: The family's closing in on there home
1153322221.content:
The sound of the family car engine roars as the three women begin to pull out of the parking lot and make their way home back home. While the mother was focused on the road as any respectable driver would the daughters were hopped up on sugary drinks and junk food. Meaning they had too much energy for their own good, and kept chatting away in the back about random things.

You awaken groggy and sore to the sound of engines churning, air passing by and the chuckles of two little demons. It was then that you remembered your predicament, unable to move courtesy of the mother's personal belongings literally weighing you down. At this point it truly sinks in that you've been kidnapped and by an actual kid no less. God this was a miserable revelation. Up above the Mary stops at a red light and reaches down her purse for a spare tissue. As she began to dig around her fingers unknowingly rub against your crotch giving you a little erection as her hand changed directions.

The idea that this beautiful older woman giving you a hand job was too unreal and just as hot. Tragically before she finished she pulls her hand out finally locating her tissue. "Oh come on, finish what you started..." you whisper yo yourself as Mary begins blowing her stored mucus into the tissue. As the light turns green she begins talking to her daughters as she discards the used tissue back into the purse.

"So did you two have fun at the Play Place?"

"I did mommy!" answered Tracy

"So did I mom" spoke Lacey "I just wish we didn't loose that cool toy" she said slyly

"Toy?" Mary asked inquisitively

"Yeah mommy we found this cute doll in the play place but, *sigh* we lost it in the ball pit. I really wanted to take it home too" spoke Tracy with a hint of sadness.

"Sorry honey it sounds like you were really attached to this toy. Maybe it'll be there next time we go I mean I doubt they even clean the ball pits" Mary said with a snicker. This prompted giggles from the two girls.

Meanwhile within the purse you were too preoccupied with trying not to get a face full of mucus to take offense from that ball pit comment. The used tissue Mary tossed in the purse landed just above you caught between a make-up brush, a nail file, and what looked to be a newly purchased Ped Egg. Though it was caught it didn't stop strands of mucus and boogers to begin leaking from the tissue and slowly start flowing down like a loogie.

"God how long until I'm out of here already" you ponder as the snot threatens to submerge your face.
1153322221.title: Long road home

11533222211.content:
The snot strain is just inches away from you threatening to envelop your face, warmth still lingering from Mary's naval cavity. "This is it" you thought "It's going to get me! Gross, gross, gross, gross!" As the snot was literally seconds from striking you a sharp turn was implemented courtesy of the driver causing the snot to fling and stick to the Ped Egg.

You couldn't believe your luck, you just narrowly avoided getting a face full of snot thanks to it's supplier. You began thanking whatever God was looking out for you as the car began to slow down. "shit they must be home" suddenly images of being played with by the giant preteen start invading your mind. "Well she can't keep her eye on me forever, especially if she's so dead set on hiding me from her sister. Guess when she leaves me alone or stashes me away somewhere I'll make my move."

While you strategize escape attempts the family begins exiting the car and entering their home. "What about the mom? Should I reveal myself to her? How would I even begin to explain this to her? And would she even help or exploit me for her own sexual desires." So many questions and scenarios were racing through your mind as Mary's purse swayed as she stepped inside her home.

Lacey and Tracy spared no time and raced up to their bedroom most likely to burn off their remaining energy by jumping on their beds and playing with their toys. Mary on the other started making herself more comfortable removing her coat and kicking off her flats giving her bare feet a chance to breathe. Sitting on the living room couch she placed the purse on the floor and picked up the remote turning the television to the OWN channel.

Not too long after, she begins getting engaged on whatever show was airing at the time while her toes play with the fuzzy carpet below. Within the purse the cheesy scent of Mary's soles start to creep in and immediately your eyes begin to water. "I think I'm going to sick, hasn't she ever heard of socks? Or better yet foot powder?

As in response Mary's foot jerks and collides into the purse jumbling everything yourself included. This causes you to be able to move your upper body and finally get enough leverage to knock this crap off of you. You've freed yourself. But what's your next action? Do you play it safe, stay within the purse and sneak away later? Or try to make yourself known to the mother.
11533222211.title: Plotting & Planning

choices: She notices somethings off with her foot cleaner
She's too focused on her show to notice
115332222112.content:
Deciding that any chance of escaping this shrunken nightmare was worth the risk you begin scaling the milfs personal belongings hoping to gain her attention.

Meanwhile outside the purse Mary's show comes to a commercial, and uses this time to leave and re-leave herself in the bathroom. She enters and begins to sit upon the porcelain throne while pulling down her pants and panties and begins feeling a sense of bliss as she empties out her bladder. sighing with relief she brings her attention to her overworked feet and starts to frown.

Having to constantly wear high heeled and dress shoes had taken a tool on her poor feet. In addition to being sore they had begun getting rough, calloused, and often leaving marks reddened marks. While her set of suffocating closed shoes had often caused her soles to sweat heavily and amass a large amount grime and toe jam in them. What she wouldn't give for a trip to the nail salon, the idea of a good foot cleaning and rubdown was as welcomed to her as an hour long orgasm. Sadly between her career and her girls she had no time to for such luxuries.

The best she could do at the moment was to lay back on the couch, enjoy her shows and put her new Ped Egg to work. Ascending from her toilet she pulled up her pants and undergarments flushed, and made her way back to the couch (not even bothering to wash her hands) with new found determination to relax and treat her feet.

As she took her seat she locked her eyes on the TV and saw a special interview is seconds to air where Amber Heard opens up to Oprah on her abuse at the hands of her soon to former spouse Johnny Depp. Mary couldn't risk taking her eyes off the television for a second in fear of missing any juicy info. She began lowering her hand and began feeling around her purse for her Ped Egg.

Back in the purse you make your way up a mountain of personal objects and reach the openings of the purse. Please I need your hel-" Your suddenly cut off as her gargantuan feminine hand plunges itself into the purse knocking you back down, and all around as she randomly rummages through feeling for something. You want to yell but her grip is too strong and it's taking everything you have just to continue breathing. Turning your attention upward you see her eyes are widened and her mouth is slightly open with her tongue occasionally licking her lips. Then she begins to shift, propping the side of her foot up on her knee and bringing you closer to her sole. "Oh God, no" you think.

The tired mother wasted no time pampering her worn-out soles while keeping her focus on the unfolding story being told on TV. A large smelly foot that hasn't had the best care given to it.

Then came time for her toes. Luckily there wasn't a whole lot she did with you there, only rubbing you in-between cleaning away any particle that might have gotten stuck there. Also leaving you with the rawest scent of her feet thus far, and you could swear you heard a few muffled moans coming from big mama while she had you dry humping the skin between her toes. With a gasp she drops you back into the purse. At first you think she spots you, but looking up you see she's still fixated on the special. Before you finish your sentence she holds you tightly with her hand, almost pressing the air out of you for a second, "Rule number 1 bitch-boy; Only speak when spoken to. Now let's get to my place!" She looks at you with an evil smile, she then says...

You think to yourself: "A trip with her socks? That must be... Hell!" Your depressing thoughts about your predicament are then intensified when you see Jessica grab some more rubber bands... She takes two bigger rubber bands and puts them around her foot, she then presses you against her intensily smelly foot, still wearing those worn-out socks.

She then restrains you to her foot with two large rubber bands, and then she takes another rubber band and puts it behind your head and aroud her toes, pushing your face firmly between her middle toe and her index toe. Because of your bondage-restrained position you think it is wise to just obey her, you open your mouth and instantly she shoves the saliva-drenched tissue into your mouth, gagging you firmly so that you can only... Jessica seems to enjoy seeing you struggle and she playfully wiggles her toes, releasing more of her sock's stench.

It is like this every step of the way... After what seems to be several hundred steps you can hear her enter a bus. "Finally..." You think, no more walking... However, as soon as she sits down, she seems to cross her legs and the shoe you are in is now taking all of the excess weight of her legs. This trip seems to take an eternity but after a while...

"We're home bitch-boy, you're gonna love it here!" Jessica says while you hear a door open and close. She sits down and takes her shoes off and lays down on her bench. She wiggles her toes and commands: "Breathe in deeply." You breathe in and out heavily, as if you didn't get familiar enough yet with the smell of those socks!

"I hope you really know my scent! Now, boy, it's time for a game!" She releases the rubber bands that held you stuck to her feet, and twists them around you instead. Like a mummified doll that can only move its face, she throws you on the bench, "but let's first fix your gag shall we?" she says with an evil smile on her face. Out of a large sports bag she grabs her soccer shoes and with her fingers carefully collects some dirt from the sole. She rolls it up like a small ball, then she wraps it up in a small piece of tissue paper. "Time for my signature..." Jessica says and drools onto the firmly rolled ball of dirt and tissue. Once it is soaking with her spit she brings her hand closer to you, "open up, here is a nice treat for you!" You open your mouth and the previous gag falls out, only to be quickly replaced by a tightly wrapped ball dripping with her saliva. She shoves it into your mouth and it makes your mouth gape slightly. She then grabs a small rubber band, wraps it around your head and fits it right onto the ball in your mouth. There is no way you are going to get rid of this thing...

"Gosh I am such an artist! You must really love the fact that I found you, haha!" You hear her sadistic laugh again. She stands up and grabs a big bag of what seems to be sports gear. She takes some things out, a bit of soccer gear and a dozen pair of shirts and pants, though something remains in the bag...

"Hey boy, the only thing left in this bag is a pile of worn socks from all the girls in my soccer-team, mine included. Your task is simple, I throw you in there, close the bag and then you will have to sniff out MY socks." She puts you closer to the bag and you can smell the intense odor of mixed sweat coming from it... being dropped in there would be truly... Sadistic!

Then suddenly she throws you in and you can hear the zipper close. At first you are completely overwhelmed by the smell, it smells like a girl's locker room before they started gassing the place with deodorants... All you smell is sweat, sweat and more sweat. Light slowly becomes dark and within a few seconds the bag is entirely closed. You try to worm your way around, still being completely tied up by the rubber bands and even gagged. All you can do is endure the odor of several girls' sweat that is intruding your lungs.

"Look pal, I know this is gonna be kinda difficult so, say what, I am gonna make some dinner and I'll open the bag in one hour. If you think you found one of my socks, you go and wiggle your way inside it. If I open it and find you in someone else's sock, it will be punishment time, haha!" She picks up the bag and places it in a corner, she then continues, "ofcourse if you actually managed to get inside one of my socks, there will be no punishment time! That sounds like a great reward doesn't it?"

In the midst of the stench you think to yourself, "a great reward?! As if! Looks like her games can only conclude in losing or not losing... Either way, there is no real winning here!"

Jessica then kicks the bag firmly and you are being tossed around in all kinds of sweaty socks. "Okay bitch-boy, good luck. If you want to have any chance in differentiating between different socks I suggest you really put ur nose onto them, hahaha!"

You worm and struggle your way through the bag, the stench is very overwhelming and it is entirely dark. Looks like the only way for you to avoid 'punishment time' is by taking up the advice of your bully and smelling the socks intensily.

One after the other you wiggle your way from one sock to the next and take a big whiff. You place your nose directly onto them and then breathe in deeply and try to memorize the smell. Most of the socks smell way too 'sweet' or 'clean' to be Jessica's. You are certain that you have smelled the same few socks several times, simply because you can't see what you are doing.

The more you think about this the more you realized how degraded your position has become, contemplating about how to find someone's socks using your nose. You think to yourself, "Gosh this... socks!" A small grinn appears on your face, realizing you haven't lost your sense of humor yet despite your predicament.

After a while, you find two different pairs that seem likely to be hers in the very bottom of the bag. Both pairs are more worn out than the others and they have a very worn-out and used odor to them. One of the socks is a pair of shorter socks and seems to be made of nylon, making it thinner and smoother. The other pair seems to be a pair of classic, thick, long and more woolly football socks. Both have a very intense smell of sweat to them!

The choice is yours, in which sock are you going to hide? Which one do you think is Jessica's? The wooly socks (the classic, long, thicker football socks) or the nylon socks (short, smooth and thin socks)? Pick your poison!
11533222211221211.title: You reach sadistic Jessica's home...

...

She taps her foot on the floor, as if to tease you about your current position. "Let's get you suited up properly and then I'll make you do something dirty... I'm kind of in a bullying mood right now!" Then, with an evil laugh Jessica says: "So, let's get to 'punishment time'!"

1332.content:
Dateline: A local Payless ShoeSource, August 20XX

Subject is was called Sean [REDACTED]. He was out shopping for new school shoes for his two daughters, Isabel and Amy. While doing so, he accidentally breathes in [CONFIDENTIAL], causing his size to reduce, randomly changing within a size range of 6 inches to 1/16th and inch. Here is his story:

"Come on girls, just pick a pair or two. Your mom is just around the corner, and she doesn't want to spend all day here," Sean said to his two little angels. They both nodded, and excitedly ran off. Sean sat down on one of the provided benches, and smiled. Those two were the most adorable things. As he waited, he noticed a woman dressed in a business suit running down the aisle. She was carrying a bottle of crystal, which held a green liquid inside. She ran was running right towards him. He looked at the floor. Amy, bless her little heart, had left her ratty old sandals in the middle of the floor.

"Hey miss, you might want to be careful. You could trip." She jumped in surprise, not realizing anyone was there.

"Yeah, thanks. But I have to go." She was looking around, clearly on edge. Was she being followed?

"Are you okay, miss? You don't look well."

As she started to turn around, she let out a scream. Down the aisle was a rather large man, more muscle than anything.

"Give us the bottle," he said, although grunted would be a more accurate description.

He advanced towards them. She started to back away, but Sean was too shocked to move. Was this man going to hurt her?

The woman grabbed at the bottle. Sean didn't notice before, but it had a sprayer on the end. "Stand back," she said, her voice shaking. "I don't want to do this." The man, clearly not impressed, continued to walk towards her.

"I'm so sorry," she screamed as she sprayed the brute. Sean was hit in the blast too, getting soaked with the fluid. He looked up, but the woman was gone. The world began to spin, and everything became dark.

Sean awoke with a pounding headache, and a odd feeling in his gut, similar to vertigo. He looked around, and immediately was alert. The world had grown. The stool had had once sat on now towered over him like a skyscraper. Sean was a quick thinker, and he remembered the spray and the apologetic woman. That must have been the cause of this!

Sean needed to find her, but his eyes locked on a more pressing problem. The brute was shrunken too, and he was just getting up. If that wall of a man saw Sean, who could know what anger he would unleash. Sean's fears began to materialize as the brute peered up, and saw him. He began to trudge towards Sean, anger glowing in his dim eyes.

"Where'd ya go, Daddy?" Both Sean and the wannabe Hulk looked up towards the source of the godly sound. Turning the corner and walking towards them was the colossal form of the 6 year old Amy. Even the moronic mind of the brute could see the danger in each step of the football-field sized pink socks that got closer every breath. The poor brute tried to run, but each step of the kindergartner could cover a marathon. Too far away to hear his scream, Sean only could watch as the foot of his precious little girl lowered onto the former giant. Sean watched as the toes, each bigger than his half-inch tall body, landed on him. His body was no match, snapping in half as the step was completed. The horrific display lasted only a moment, but it felt forever to Sean. It showed him the true horrors of this size, and he understood why the woman seemed so, so sorry.

This emotional conflict was unknown to Amy. She did feel the blood seep through her sock, and since she had picked her new shoes, she took them off. Looking at the bottom of the sock, Amy let out a little cry. She wasn't a cruel girl, and even though it was only a bug (well, to her knowledge), she still felt bad about crushing it. She tossed the messed socks onto the bench, turned around and walked away to go find Kim.

Sean finally snapped out of his emotional meltdown. He needed a plan, and he didn't have one. He could climb on Amy's sandals, which were left discarded nearby. It was dangerous, but if he survived he was guaranteed a ride home. He could also try and find one of his girls in the store. Isabel would no doubt still be looking for shoes, and Kim would be somewhere. Or, he could just wait here until something happens.

As the bag opens, you see Desiree's hand reaching in, hopefully not for you. Unfortunately, any hope of that is dashed to pieces the moment she speaks.

Despite pushing your body all the way to the edge of the bag and attempting to burrow beneath a few bags of M&Ms, Desiree's hand still manages to find you as if it were a heat-seeking missile. Her fingers, cold from the autumn air, clamp down with all the delicacy of a hungry python. You blink several times as you lifted out into the bright glow of a streetlight Desiree stopped beneath. Your first sight as you are lifted out is Desiree's face light up with a smile as she sees a tiny person in her grasp. Your second sight is a blur as Desiree dashes off to a secluded spot in the bushes were she sets down on the cold soft ground before sitting down in front of you. As Desiree puts you down, your first instinct is too run, as fast as you can and as far as you can. This plan lasts only a second, you end up tripping as your foot presses into the soft ground.

"Well, little Davey Bug, what were you doing with all my candy?" Desiree asks as she pulls a Tootsie-Roll out from within the bag that once managed to imprison you.

"Desiree, you have to help! I shrunk in my house, then fell into the candy bowl when I was trying to get Clara's attention. I ended up in your bag by accident. Now, please take me home!" Begging Desiree for help wasn't your first plan, nor was it your best, but it was the only one that you could put into effect.

"Hmmm....Nope!" Desiree answered quickly with exactly what you expected.

"Why?" You ask, surprising even yourself with the calmness in your tone.

"Cause there's so much stuff I can do with you!" Desiree replies excitedly.

"Like what?" The calmness in your voice is gone just as quickly as it came, when you begin to think of the things Desiree could do with you.

"Like smell my feet," Desiree says with a giggle as she begins tugging at the black knee-high boots she had been wearing.

It is only now that you get a good look at the costume Desiree is wearing; a black witch hat, a silky purple shirt worn beneath a black corset-like garment, a frilly black skirt, long socks with stripes alternating between purple and black, and the black knee high, high-heeled boots that Desiree had just managed to pull off with a disgusting squelch.

Desiree dropped both of her socked feet down before you, showing of her socks and revealing that they were actually toe socks. This made it easy to she her toes wiggle excitedly. You look up at the foot which rises at least three times your height into the air. A stiffling scent, a disgusting blend of vinegar and foot sweat feels your nostrils and you take a step back.

"Go on, get closer and take a big wiff of 'em," Desiree commands as she stares down at you happily.

What do you do?

You could see Lily's meaty toes wigglying beneath the moist black silk as she struggled to pull her foot in. You quickly make the decision to duck down at a dry patch of the swampy insole, where the foot's arch would shelter you from Lily's crushing weight. It takes Lily a few thankful seconds to get her foot all the way in, during which you lay down flat in the prone position like an army rifleman. You feel Lily's toes and the ball of her foot slide easily over you, lubricated by sweat, before her foot stops leaving you safely beneath the raised area of her foot.

"Just as planned," you utter, before gagging on Lily's atrocious foot odor, an odor heavily intensified by her stockinged foot.

As you try to move off your stomach into a slightly more comfortable position, you realize a new problem is afoot, Lily's foot specifically. Since these boots must extremely tight on Lily's feet, something you'd chalk up to a early growth spurt, you are rendered fully immobile beneath her arch. While in extreme discomfort due to your position, the rising heat of the boot, the growing foot odor, and the damp feeling of sweat all around, you're still thankful to be alive, had you chosen to hide at her toes you'd likely have been crushed.

Through the thick leather to the side, you hear Lily and Tammy giggle as the excitedly discuss your predicament. As the talk you begin to wonder if Tammy knew about her sister's too-small boots, was that girl trying to kill you? That would be a question for another time as your world suddenly begins to rock as the girls resume their trick-or-treating tour. As Lily's foot swings back you again are thankful yet again, your positioning leaves you with little pressure during each step, but it is also tight enough that you don't slip around. Nevertheless, Lily's cheesy foot smell is making you dizzy and you can only hope to be let out soon.

What happens as the night progresses?

As the night wears on, Lily's tight black boots grow more and more unpleasant for its shrunken guest. The sliky black pantyhose that clung to Lily's moist arch continued to rub you into her tight arch and the yielding insole.

The once-dry patch you had selected as your oasis was now anything but, as the little witch's feet continued to grow more damp and swampy, the humidity gagging you with each breath. You hear Tammy and Lily ring countless doorbells through the thick black leather, looting candy to last them days. The brisk october evening seemed to do little to prevent the little witch's stockinged feet from moistly sweating all night long.

With every block, Lily's tight boots got a little more damp, and the powerful, intense reek of young girl foot got even more cheesy and even more potent in your warming slippery prison. The hours stretch on, the hyperactive feet continue to strain at their too-small leather containers.

About halfway through the night, Lily's feet have managed to sweat clean through the clinging pantyhose, and thouroughly coat the entire boot with a warm, sticky film of preteen footsweat. The perspiring young enchantress's insole was far slipperier than earlier, and you were slipping in and out of your arch-shelter. You slide under looser and tighter caves formed by the wrinkles and taut parts of Lily's foot, sloshing into puddles where sweat had gatheredjnto depressions in the insole. Some of the sweat was clammy, cold, and sticky, while some was hot, slippery, and reeking. ALL of it, though, stunk deeply of BIG little Lily's cheesy feet.

The lubricated stocking had become looser and less consistent as the night wore on and Lily's toes kneaded and pulled on the fabric, and sweat soaked into wrinkles and weighed them down. You are squeezed and pulled into valleys and tunnels of lubricated silky sock, as if Lily's witchy feet were swalllowing you alive.

You were swallowed down under her toes. The pressure was immense, the sock pressed down like a vaccum sealed bag. The wet sock clung to your skin forming a seal , pinning you between the insole and the pale undeside's of Lily's toes. You could see them clearly, as the fabric had been worn thin and clung damply to the ridges of her long skinny toes. You were gasping for air, as the hose squished down around your head, tightly sucking in around you.

This was it. You were going to suffocate in the tight, sweaty leather boot of a little girl on Hallow's Eve.

"NO!" you shouted into the face of your 5 slender captors. You thrashed madly, twisting yourself in rage. Lily's sensitive toes reacted to the tickling throes of your defiance, and wriggled and splayed in reply, then closing around you like a clenched fist. You hear faint girlish giggling as Lily recounts your struggles to Her fairy sister.

Your luck (if you could call it that) had held. The claustrophobic toe of Lily's tight boots had looked like the end, but you had gotten lucky. Lily's wriggling toes had managed to slide your battered body in such a way that your neck and head had slipped through a hole inbetween her largest and second largest toes.
You were alive, but things were HARDLY better here. Your head was shoved squarely in the web of Lily's pale, slightly dirty toes. They squeezedtoghther, pushing your face deep into the glistening crevices of her toe-crotch. Correction : THIS was the worst thing you had ever smelled. Little Lily wiggld your nose between a wrinkle, and you were introduced to the result of her lazy self-hygiene habits. Weeks of school, recess, barefoot-on-the-asphalt running, canvas-shoes-without-socks, hyperactive playtime - all these things are perfectly fine for a young girl to do. But Lily hated showers and baths, andjumped in and out in the space of seconds - and her almost nonexistent foot-scrubbing routine had left a hellscape between her long pale toes.

You are rubbed facefirst into dried sweat from the first day of october, 30 days of lint and dirt, dirt turned into sweaty mud by the hot leather boot, a week's worth of dust, asphult, grime, grit, sticky, clammy, wet and hot, cold and clammy, and utter hell.

Your fface is squished into this maw of nuclear waste, and you are treated toyour first taste of the Big girl's footflesh. The salty,dirty, cheesy taste enters our screaming mouth, laying like a coat of paint over your tongue. You cough up lint and toejam, spit out sweat and mud. You cry at the sickly-sweet salty taste.

"Oh...yeah, you're right...," Lily clearly upset.

"What!" Tammy shouts in annoyance, turning her angered gaze down to you.

"I'm a person! Don't I get a say?" You yell, it was stupid to argue with someone of Tammy's size, but you were angry to say the least.

"No!" Tammy says, her tone sharp and stern, "You're our toy now and you'll do what we want! And the next time you talk back like that we'll punish you for it!"

Rolling onto your back you look up, you manage to glimpse Tammy and Lily's faces above you before Tammy raises her pale foot, a motion that allowed an embarrassing, unintentional look up her skirt before her bare foot obscured your vision.

Tammy's foot delicatedly slides into her shoe, quickly and smoothly. Her foot overtakes you in almost no time at all and you are left buried beneath the preteen's toes. The unexpected tightening, gives a sense of claustrophobia which insights a sudden outburst of squirming.

Hehehehe-hey! Stop! Hehe, that tickles!" Tammy informs between giggles.

Your squirms die down as Tammy's toes stretch, prompting the cessation of her laughter. Suddenly you feel your body slam forward into the toes in front of you, before you're abruptly pulled back against the ball of her foot as a deafening crash sounds out. Tammy's walking, and that was only her first step.

With the shakey environment, which is likely only going to get worse as the long Halloween night continues, you contemplate squirming again. "Well....no, I guess they didn't," You weren't lying, they had smelled fresh with the scent of soap.
