You walk to the edge and look down at how far you are from the floor and gage it to be too far to safely jump at your height. A shadow blocks out all light and you see a distracted lily is about to sit down. You scramble to get away as she lowers herself to sit on the bed.
143232122121112.title: No, Lily reaches down and takes out of the puke.

14323212212112.content:
You recognize the distinctive, sharp smell of dark chocolate. Apparently Lily has quite refined tastes. Searching desperately for any escape, you become aware of a stinging pain in your leg. You can't see anything in the darkness, but it doesn't take too much effort to realize what is causing you pain. You're beginning to digest. You do your best to keep standing, but your strength soon fails and you fall into the thick ooze. You begin to sink into it, and soon feel your face covered by the viscous slime. Immediately, the sensitive nerves of your face begin to burn as the acid takes its toll on your skin. You try to gasp in pain, but get a mouthful of pre-chewed chocolate. You cough and flail briefly before going limp as the chocolate fills your lungs. You have drowned inside of Lily's belly.

The color of the glop doesn't change much as it continues to digest, and it is shortly ejected into Lily's diaper. The eight year old girl gets her sister to change her. As Tammy disposes of the diaper, she takes a glance into it and sees a tiny, bleached skull staring back at her from inside of her sister's poop.
14323212212112.title: Dark chocolate death

choices: Your girlfriend, Ashley, dressed in a Halloween costume
1432322.content:
Just as soon as you feel you're about to vomit in front of this poor pair of trick-or-treaters....the feeling is gone. You bring out the candy bowl, offer the girls a handful, and then close the door after they thank you and leave. After this you are quick to retreat to the couch, resuming your movie as you lie down. You faintly hear Abby, then Clara say good bye as they head out. Unbeknownst to yourself or either your sisters though, the candy had been doing more than just make you sick, you had already unknowingly lost two inches to your total height!

As you continue your movie, yet another ringing at the door forces you to pause. You're beginning to wonder if requesting to stay home alone of Halloween was a good idea, but hey at least it Halloween had fallen on a Friday this year.

You trudge over to the door and yank it open to discover...
1432322.title: A Passing Feeling

14323221.content:
You open the door and see a young Hispanic girl, looking around eight years old. She's dressed as Belle from Beauty from the Beast, with a sparkling dress and long yellow gloves.

"Trick or treat!" she says with a beaming smile.

"Happy Halloween," you tell her. She seems cute. "What's your name?"

"Maria!" she says, with another smile. Her bag of candy is on the ground next to her.

"Nice to meet you, Maria. Let me get you some candy."

Maria thanks you and then turns around to wave at a friend walking by. In that instant, the intense headache and nausea hit you once again, this time with much more force than before. Time seems to rush by incredibly quickly, as in that instant, you get a strange sensation all over your body, like you're dwindling into yourself. It goes by too fast for you to notice, but you feel that something isn't right.

In that split second, you have become...
14323221.title: The Princess

choices: Maria opens the bag to check what she got
You fall out of the bag and onto the sidewalk
143232211.content:
You blink and look around. You see huge white, orange, and yellow shapes surrounding you, and it looks like you're standing in some sort of valley. Then it dawns on you; you're actually inside the candy bowl! You must've shrunk down in that instant - and since Maria was turning away, she didn't see you. Now you see her, and she looks absolutely enormous for a little girl. You can barely see her face for the bottom of her princess gown takes up most of your field of vision. You gulp. Maybe you can get out of the bowl and into the house, and even then you'd have to wait for Clara, Addy, or your mom to come home.

"Hello? Where'd you go?" Maria says. She sounds confused. "Oh well, I guess I'll just take some candy myself!"

It took a few moments for you to realize what that meant. By that time, it's too late. A huge shadow crosses over you. You look up and see a gigantic yellow-gloved hand reaching to grab a bunch of candy. You try to run out from under the shadow, but Maria moves too quickly for you. You feel yourself being surrounded by her fingers as she takes the candy and brings it to her back. You fall into the bottom of the bag as she closes the top and walks to the next house.

There's no way for you to climb out of the bag, so you wait in the bag, as candies fall around you. This continues until...
143232211.title: One inch tall

choices: Maria puts the candy in her mouth and doesn't notice you.
Maria accidentally drops the candy and decides to leave it.
1432322111.content: As Maria continues to walk the candy in the bag continues to move around making it hard for you to go anywhere. But then you have that feeling again before you first shrunk and you begin to dwindle down until you are 1/16th of an inch. The candy around you is much bigger now and you can only imagine at how big Maria is. But she is still walking which means the candy is still moving around and that includes you. You were being thrown around in the bag until your back hits something sticky and you become stuck. Looking around you see you are in a candy wrapper and you look up to see it was partially open, which is how you got stuck. You try to see what you are stuck to and its a slightly crushed milky way bar with the caramel exposed, the part you are stuck to is the caramel. As you try to get unstuck Maria stops walking and opens her bag to see what she got, she also wants eat a piece of candy. That is when she notices the milky way bar and decides to eat that first. You look through the opening and you can see Maria's yellow gloved hand reaching for you, so you try to yell for here to notice you but she can't hear you. Then she brings the chocolate up to her face thinking she sees you but says "Since it seems to be open already I think I will eat this candy first". You are struck with fear as this young Hispanic girl is about unknowingly eat you. Maria removes the wrapper and begins to move the candy and you towards her opening mouth. You look at the dark cave that is the girls mouth and never thought you would be a trick or treater's treat. Then...
1432322111.title: A Trick or A Treat?

choices: She feels your struggles and looks to see what you are
She feels you and spits the candy on the ground
14323221111.content: As you see the bar get closer to her mouth you struggle to free yourself, dreading the fate that awaited if she swallows you. As darkness enveloped you. You tried hitting her tongue, praying that it wasn't too late.
14323221111.title: Maria puts the candy in her mouth and doesn'...

choices: She wants to savor it all, she's gonna suck on you
143232211113.content:
Maria moaned at the taste of the bite size bar, unaware of you with the wet, steamy confines of her hungry maw. Her saliva washing over you as her mighty tongue shifter beneath you.moving the food to her jaw.

Maria was so glad she got the milky way first beginning to enjoy the treat as she chewed it up like anything else.

Her teeth began to come down, "Dear god no..." You uttered as your tiny caramel soaked body fell into a small crevasse in her tooth, the sound of her smashing the two behemoths toghether in such a simple act was terrifying. Seeing wet sticky chocolate leak in around you as she raised her teeth. Shifting a bit more of the bar on to you, pinning you under the chocolate as her teeth came down hard, pushing the warm gooey chocolate on to you, dragging you up with it this time, trapped against a piece as it sloughed off. Landing with a splat on her sticky, gooey candy covered tongue.

You were close to the edge though when you heard a loud wet splat, followed by a small moan. The central mass of her delicious treat on the middle of her raising tongue...
143232211113.title: Charleston chew this ain't

1432322112.content:
With each step, Maria's bag swings in turn with arms, making swishing noises as it rubs against the fabric of her dress. Inside her bag you were feeling more and more seasick by the second, there is a sudden jerking motion as Maria's bag hits her knee. Suddenly you no longer feel a floor of candy beneath you. Instead the chilly autumn air is all around.

You have no time to react as your inadvertently catapulted from the young princess's bag of candy. Hurtling through the air, you see the rigid concrete sidewalk growing larger. You close your eyes tightly in preparation for your death.

With a sickening crunch of bones, you hit the ground and role forward about a foot. You open your eyes, surprised that you're even alive let alone free of any grievous bloody injuries. A pain in your side tells you that you may have hurt a couple rubs, but other than that you're fine.

After checking for injuries you begin to look around, Maria was already a considerable distance from you and at her speed there was no way to catch up with her. With that said, you needed to find help or more specifically a way to get someone to notice you. Looking around the dark street that you barely recognized the you see a few things that give you an idea.

An the front step of one house not far from you was a "self-service" candy dish which is surprisingly somewhat full. If you went to that you'd probably be guaranteed to be seen. Then again considering how you came into Maria's possession in the first place, you were more than a little nervous to willingly climb into a bowl full of sweets and treats without any idea who might find you.

Your other option was just next door, a group of girls were sitting around a lantern telling scary stories to each other. It was a bit farther of a hike, but at least you could choose to approach.

Where do you go?
1432322112.title: Lost on Halloween

1433.content:
Is it Thanksgiving or is it actually someone's Birthday?

Whether its your birthday or a siblings, lots of friends will be over to celebrate and you'll be getting the gift of unexpected shrinking.
1433.title: Thanksgiving (Or Another Holiday)

choices: you all shrink on the couch
go outside to the woods and find something
14331.content:
"Its the next right isnt it? I thought they..."

"No no no. I remember now. Its just down... here! Ha ha there it is. Told you didnt I?"

"Yeah real impressive dad. But maybe if you made that turn the first time we wouldnt have gotten lost for half an hour."

"Oh is that right Clara? Well i didnt hear you helping out so zip it."

"Hahaha! Yeah Clawa dthip it!"

"Ugh! Your voice is so annoying Jacob. Just shut up."

"Adrianna! Dont tell your brother to shut up!"

"Okay okay! Everyone just relax! Were almost there... just another fifteen minutes to get down this driveway. Jeez."

"Well thats what a portfolio manager and physician salary will get you babe."

"Yeah rub it in why dont you."

"Im just teasing.", Ann leans over and kisses Rick on the lips.

"Ew.", Carla says with a bratty tone.

You (Davey) lean your head on the window, counting the seconds until you could get out of the car. Your family continues driving down the incredibly long driveway, approaching closer to the lakeside mansion that they were to be spending Thanksgiving day and night at. This was a rural neighborhood with thick areas of trees that separated neighbors from each other by close to a mile. Needless to say it wasnt cheap to live here. Your Uncle Maurice worked as a portfolio manager to an incredibly wealthy client and your Aunt Linda made her money as a decorated physician, one of the top in the country. Despite their success, the couple remained humble and good people, managing on top of all that, to raise five children (with the help of nannys). Their daughters, Jessica (25) ,Sarah (19), and Madelyn (17), and their two twin boys, Liam and Luke (6). Who would all be present, adding on to the large amount of extended family members who would also be their, this house would be packed.

The van finally arrives at the house and your dad parks it behind your grandparents 1968 Buick Skylark. A car your Uncle had touched up and given to your grandfather as a birthday present.

"Look at that beauty eh Davey? And to think, Im his brother in law and all ive gotten from him was that van for you little brats.", said Rick.

"Dont be stingy dad."

"Thats easy for you to say. You got an Xbox and a 42 inch plasma screen for your birthday."

"Guess he likes me more than you then.", you joked.

"Yeah you little weasel? Come here."

Your dad grabs you and puts you in a headlock, proceeding to dip his pinkie into your ear and twist.

"Oh god no! Dry willies are so much worse!", you yell.

You break your dads grip and playfully smack his forehead before trotting away, inciting a laugh from your sisters and brother.

"Alright children thats enough.", your mother chimes in. She instructs everyone to form together at the doorway as she rings the doorbell. You could all here the voices and laughter of the guests who made it before you inside. The door opens and your Aunt Linda is there to greet you.

"Hello everyone!", she cheers joyfully.

You all say hello and proceed inside. Your dad is the first to enter, giving Linda a kiss on the cheek and her returning the courtesy. She then receives a hug from your mother (her sister) and the two immediately start conversing like long lost best friends, with your Aunt almost forgetting to hug the rest of you. You had no time to notice though, as a small army of family members started crowding around your family with greetings, hugs, kisses, handshakes, the whole package. Thankfully, your best friends out of all your cousins Scott, Nathan and Dawson came to whisk you away from the horde and take you to the basement to play some floor hockey and Xbox. You all enter the basement and see that Jacob ad somehow managed to make it down there before you and was playing with toy light sabers with Luke and Liam in the basement living room. You avoid them and follow your cool cousins into the room with the makeshift hockey rink. Your Uncle Maurice had laid down tiles that acted as ice when they were all connected and built rink walls around it, creating a small, but amazing hockey rink. Since none of you brought any skates, you all just put on some big socks and used them to glide around and play.

After a few minutes of play, your sister Clara and cousin Madelyn came down to watch and tease.

Dawson tried to deke you out at one point, but ended up falling on his ass.

"Ohhhh nice one Dawson!", Madelyn laughed.

"Shut up Maddie! You`re more than welcome to come out here and show us what you got!", Dawson snapped back.

"You dont need to be embarrassed more than you already are!", Clara mocked.

This annoyed you enough to grab a stray tennis ball and huck it at your sister, pegging her right on the side of her head.

"Ow you jerk!"

"Just get lost."

The girls giggle as they walk out the room and Dawson flips them the bird behind their backs.

"Uh.. so you guys?",Nathan says lightly. "So im like, a distant enough cousin that like... it wouldnt be weird if i had a crush on Maddie right?"

You all look straight at him.

"Ew! No! Thats always weird dude!", Dawson said.

"Well now hold on. Lets be honest here fellas. Im not saying any of us would make a move but you gotta admit, she, Jess and Sarah are definitely not ugly people.", said Scott. "Hell, even Aunt Linda is a bombshell. And Davey, your mom and sisters are..."

"Alright enough!", you interrupted.

You couldnt deny what he said was true, and you knew he was just busting your balls... but still.

"Look can we drop this conversation and just play some hockey?", you begged.

The game goes on for another twenty minutes, but you all eventually decide to jump on over to the Xbox and play some zombies.

You have fun playing with them when...
14331.title: Thanksgiving dinner with your LARGE family

143311.content:
A strange scent begins to linger into the room.

"Yo did someone fart?", Dawson asked.

"Wasnt me."

"No."

"Im innocent."

Shortly after, a blue fog sifts into the room through an open window well and slowly fills the room. It was thin enough to remain undetected from the boys due to their full attention being on the huge plasma screen for a time until it had already surrounded them.

Suddenly, their vision gets cloudy and through their obscured vision they see the world around them seemingly start to spin before setting back to stillness. In their fear and confusion the boys all begin screaming for eachother and their relatives upstairs, hoping to get help.

Eventually, their vision returns and they all gasp and reel in horror at the sight of the now ginormous world around them. They had shrunk down to the size of fleas! The ground had become soft as they were now standing on the cushions of the black leather couch. To them it was like standing on the roof of a 60 story building.

When the boys had regrouped with eachother, Dave and Dawson had to keep their composure and calm Nathan and Scott down. They managed to relax them and then began to discuss a plan.

"We should stay here. I dont know how this happened but its gotta wear off eventually right?", said Scott.

"We dont know that! We need to go upstairs and get someones help!", exclaimed Nathan.

"My phone didnt shrink with me... but its here on the couch over there. We should use it to call someone down here to help us.", Dave suggested.
143311.title: Eventful family reunion

143312.content:
"Nate! For fucks sake cover the alley! They're gonna get me! Cover the alley you son of a.... thats it, thats it game over man. You fucked us Nate.", Dawson rambled.

Nathan, along with you and Scott were too busy laughing your asses off at Dawsons rage to care how angry he was. After a few seconds, Dawson began to cool off and join the laughter.

"Oh boys. Well ive had enough of this shit. Its a lovely day out. Lets go out to the woods or something. See whats what out there.", he suggested.

"Yeah. That sounds fun. Lets do it!", said Scott.

You all spring off the couch and take off sprinting up the stairs. You always felt like a little kid when you were with these guys, and if it wasnt for the distance in which you all lived from eachother you had no doubt they would be your best friends. You all do your best to avoid getting stopped from inquisitive relatives who want to tell you for the thousandth time how big youve gotten or ask about your social life and crap like that. Aside from giving the odd hug and saying the odd hello, none of you were hindered away from the outdoors for long.

"Come on fellas. You remember that fort we built for the kids last time we were here? I think it was this way and if im not mistaken, there should be a little surprise buried for us there if you know what i mean.", Dawson smiled and flexed his eyebrows.

"Are you talking about that roach you buried? You realize its gonna probably be moldy and just no good right?", you said.

"What? No. Weed is a herb. If i bury it its like im replanting it right?"

"But you put it in a baggie.", said Scott.

"Yeah so?"

"So its going to be warm under all that ground and its gonna get moldy dumbass."

"Look enough with the doubting. Just come with me and watch me smoke a fat doobie while you chumps inhale my fumes. And to think i was gonna share it. Pffft."

You all follow Dawson into the woods and after a few minutes of trekking through brush and sticks, you find the run down remains of the "fort" you all built together.

At the start, it had been a tarp held up by a stick in each corner and surrounded with four walls made of plywood sheets. Now, the tarp lost two sticks, leaving it draoed on the ground, and the plywood was moldy and bent to shit.

"Wow. This didnt hold up well at all.", Nathan said.

"Well, it did its duty boys. It kept ole mary jane here safe and secure.", Dawson pointed down at a patch of earth he had marked with lego minifigure he stole from Liam one time. He bent down, tossed the lego man aside and plunged his hand down into the dirt, retracting his hand out along with a baggie containing a single splinter sized spliff.

"Wow. You were going to share that Dawson? How thoughtful.", teased Scott.

"Hey. You pipe in like that one more time smartass and ill fart in your eye when you sleep. You know I will."

Nathan did know it.

"Okay okay. Anyways. We're out here now. What should we do?"

"We could pick up some sticks and sword fight?", said Scott.

"Hahaha! Seriously dude? What are you nine?", Dawson laughed.

"You cant actually tell me with a straight face that isnt fun! Just because you're a year older than us doesnt make you a total downer yet does it?", Scott retorted.

"Hm... fair point. HEEYAHHHHH!!!!"

In an instant, Dawson had armed himself with a stick and smacked Scott right on the hand, then proceeded to spin around and smack your arm and Nathans hip in two quick strikes.

You all laugh and arm yourselves, then begin to duke it out in medieval free for all. While Scott was busy dealing with Dawson, you started chasing down Nathan, when suddenly Nathan stopped and instructed you to dothe same.

"What?", you asked.

"Look at that. That thing in the ground there. What is that?"
143312.title: Discovery in the woods

1433121.content:
"Whoa. It looks like some kind of remote thing but... weirder. Look at that glow coming off that orb part.", you say.

The remote had the shape of a regular tv remote, aside from its button layout and an glowing blue orb that resided in the centre of the top of the device.

"Yeah thats spooky. Hey guys! Come over here! Check this out!", Nathan called out.

"Whats up?", Scott asked with Dawson in tow.

You both show them the remote and without hesitation, Dawson walks over and picks it up.

"Whoa! Dawson what are you doing man! Look at that glow! It could be radioactive or something!", Nathan yells.

"Oh relax.", said Dawson.

He begins fidgeting with the remote and after pressing a button with an thunderbolt on it, the glow fades and a charging sound can be heard emitting from the remote.

Dawson sees a small digital meter being filled up, indicating to him that he charged the thing up.

"Wow. I think this thing self charges. I wonder what it does though."

Dawson again, begins fidgeting with it and...
1433121.title: Discovery of The Device

14331211.content:
Suddenly, a beam of blue light shoots out form the tip of the remote and envelops an entire tree, dwindling its size down until Dawson frantically presses another button, turning it off.

You all stare in utter shock, amazement and slight horror at what you all witnessed.

"Guys? Holy fucking moly. This is a shrink ray... this a bonafide, real deal, sci-fi shrink ray!", Dawson shrieked ecstatically.

"Be careful with that thing dude you could shrink us!", you plea.

"Wait. That actually sounds like fun.", said Scott.

"Yeah and incredibly dangerous. Im all for fun but we dont fully understand this thing yet.", said Nathan.

"Yeah you're right. Lets shrink that squirrel up there and see what happens."

"Whoa whoa whoa! What if it kills it?", Dawson protests.

"Would you rather test it on a squirrel or us? We gotta see what it does to living things.", you say.

After brief hesistation, Dawson shoots the squirrel and watches it fall from the tree and shrink down simultaneously. Nathan catches it and you all gather round and watch the pea sized squirrel scurry up to the tip of Nathans finger.

"This is unreal. Okay now see if you can change it back to normal."

Nathan sets it down on the ground and Dawson presses another button, now roughly learning the layout and function of the remote.

"Okay well, if that button shrinks... then this one should grow."

He presses the button and the squirrel reverts back to regular size before scurrying off into the thicket of trees.

"Theres your answer bro. Now whos first?", asked Dawson.

"Me!"
"Me!"
"Me!"
You all shout in unison.

"Okay. You all huddle together and ill shrink you all down in one blast."

You follow Dawsons instruction and huddle with your cousins. Dawson activates the remote, blinding you all in blue light and you feel a wave of nausea overcome you. You see the world around you growing larger and larger as you dwindle in size with your cousins until you were all a mere half an inch tall.

"Oh fuck. I think i might have overdone it. You guys okay?"

The feeling if sickness passed when the light ceased and was replaced with a feeling of sheer excitment.

"Yeah were good! You could have taken it easy though! Were bug sized now!", you yell.

"Wait... i can hear you guys through the remote!"

Dawson flips it around and notices and compartment which he at first believed was for batterys, but seemed to be where your voice was coming from. He opened it up and pulled out a small earpiece.

"Now this is gonna be useful."

He places the earpiece in his ear and speaks to his shrunken cousins.

"This is so cool! What should we do now? Go prank someone? Should i join you guys? Should i..."

Dawson is interrupted by a girls voice calling out for you all.

He springs to his feet just as Scotts 18 year old sister Amber and her boyfriend Dylan,come walking out from the trees. Dawson hides the remote in his waistband and gives his sister a forced smile in an attempt to dissuade suspicion.

"There you are! None of you were answering your phones! You didnt hear me calling for you? Anyways, my mom sent me out here to get you guys for dinner... where is Scott and the others by the way?", asked Amber.

"Uhm... i think they went back already. Im just out here uhhhh... smoking this joint." , Dawson said, reaching into his pocket and pulling out the pin sized joint from earlier.

"Wow. Uhhh, okay then. We're going back to the house. Dont be long or ill probably be sent back out to get you."

At this point, the shrunken trio had...
14331211.title: Test the device

143312111.content:
While Dawson was busy making up excuses, the three of you had decided to jump onto Ambers foot for a lift back to the house, much to Scotts discomfort.

"But thats my sister. I dont want to be climbing all over her feet.", he protested.

"Come on dude it'll be fun! We can prank her by like... going into her ear and scaring her.", you said.

"Her ear? How do you plan on getting there?"

"We could climb her.", you replied, doing your best to fight off the blush in your cheeks.

"Oh is that right? Except that we would have to climb past her private bits to get there! Just cuz you guys think my sisters hot doesnt mean i do!", Scott said.

"Fine then, you stay here and get a lift from Dawson. You know how smelly he is at normal height, imagine how worse it'll be when he picks you up.", said Nathan.

With that thought in mind, Scott quickly began to walk over to his sisters sandal clad foot with the others cheerily tailing behind him. You couldnt deny this was pretty arousing for you. Amber was a gorgeous girl, but your feelings were always followed by a sense of shame and disgust with yourself for obvious reasons... but this was too good an opportunity to pass up. You all quickly jog over the giant leaves and under the giant branches while on your way to the objective.

You all approach Ambers foot, and are met by the wall that was the front of the sandal. It only reached about an inch in height, but the three of you in your quarter inch states, made it to tall to jump and grab the ledge.

"Alright Davey. We'll boost you up and you pull us up when you get there.", said Nathan.

"Sounds good.", you reply.

Nathan and Scott crouch down and cup their hands. You place your feet in them and signal when you were ready to be thrown.

"One.... two....three!"

They boost you up into the air and you manage to grab onto the top of the sandals sole. You dangle there for a second before dragging yourself up onto the comfortable platform, where you are met with the astonishing sight of Ambers gigantic toes. Your current position brought you face to face with the bottom of her second largest one and it seemed to you to be the size of a two story building. You hear the guys calling from down below to pull them up, so you crawl back over to the ledge and reach down.

At this point, you tune in to what the giants are saying to eachother. You hear Dawson speaking and listen.

"Uhm... i think they went back already. Im just out here uhhhh... smoking this joint."

Then you hear Amber speak.

"Wow. Uhhh, okay then. We're going back to the house. Dont be long or ill probably be sent back out to get you."

"Oh shit! Move it guys!", you yell down at Nate and Scott. "Dawson! Can you hear me?! Keep her still! We're climbing onto her sandal!"

Dawson looked down at Ambers foot and could faintly see his little cousins helping eachother onto her sandal. Ambers opposite foot had already shifted in preparation to turn around and walk away but Dawson stopped her.

"Amber stop!", he yelled.

She stopped dead in her tracks and looked at Dawson in surprise. Dylan also seemed shocked by Dawsons sudden outburst.

An awkward silence filled the air for a few seconds as Dawson tried to conjure up a reason for his actions, after a few more seconds Amber broke the silence.

"What? Dawson?"

"I uhhh... Just wanted to talk to you guys. Yeah. Its been awhile. How you guys been? Dylan! Hey buddy looking good! Hahaha! So whats new with you guys huh?"

This distraction (as cringe as it was), provided you all with enough time to make it onto Amber's sandal.

"Phew! Alright man we're good down here. You can stop.", said Scott.

Dawson recieved the news.

"How have we been? Uhm.. good. Well there was this one time.."

"Yeah yeah great. See you guys at dinner.", Dawson interrupted.

Amber looked at her cousin. She was really confused by the way he was acting. He was normally weird but in a fun way, not a... weird way.

"Okay then. Uhm... see you later? I guess?", she said.

"Yep! Mm hm. Okay go on now.", Dawson again forced a smile on his face.

Amber looked at Dylan, who had the same confused look. She was almost certain Dawson was hiding something but didnt want to spend anymore time in the woods than she needed to. Her walking out here in sandals and a strapless sundress was not her best idea, as mosquitoes had taken to her as an easy target and she had to constantly fend them off. Meanwhile, Dylan was layered with a flannel shirt and maroon zip up hoodie. Amber did not ask for it because she wanted Dylan to offer it to her, but unfortunately he was a bit of a meat head. Amber turns to leave her cousin and Dylan follows, following their footsteps back towards the house.

Meanwhile, down on her foot. The trio of shrunken teens had to quickly leap in between Ambers big and second toe as she started to walk. They pressed themselves against the side of her toe and gripped onto the flesh as tight as they could to avoid being flung off. The odor that eroded off her feet was not entirely pleasant... but not all bad either. Amber was a clean girl who kept her hygiene at top levels, but she never planned on having to impress tiny people who had to endure stronger scents. You however, enjoyed the smell.

Back with Dawson, he noticed he was only getting static in the earpiece when he tried to talk with his cousins.

"Shit! I must have to be in close range or something. Ugh! Dammit.", Dawson quickly began to follow Amber, calling her name and asking her to wait up.

Amber hears him and stops. Looking behind her she sees Dawson speed walking over towards her. The way Dawson was acting made her feel concerned.

"Dawson? Why are you acting so strange? Are you okay?", she asked.

"Am I okay? Aw thats sweet of you to ask. Im fine how are you? HOW ARE YOU?!"

"Whoa! Dude was that like... tourretes or something?", asked Dylan.

"What? No. I just want to know HOW ARE YOU GUYS?!"

On Ambers foot, you realize Dawson is trying to speak to you. But why wouldnt he ask that when he was away from Amber? The thought occurs to you that he must have to within a certain range to speak to you all with the earpiece.

"Dawson! We're good! Give us another minute! And stay by Amber!", you yell.

You all begin to scale the side of Ambers toe until you reach the top, then traverse along the top of her foot until you reach one of the straps on the sandal. You all sit down and slide your lower halfs under neath the strap, allowing it to keep you secure against Ambers foot when she would start walking again.

"Okay we're good to go!", Nathan yells.

"Didnt you already ask us how we were?", said Dylan.

"I did didnt I? The hunger must be getting to me. Come on lets go eat.", Dawson motions for the couple to start walking again, and they reluctantly do so. During the walk, Dylan finally clues in after seeing Amber swat a mosquito of her shoulder, that she could use his hoodie for protection against the bugs. He takes it off and offers it to Amber.

"Finally you moron!", Amber thinks to herself. "Thanks babe.", she says.

Dylan holds it open, allowing he to slip her arms in and put it on. They arrive at the house and enter the back door. Where they take off their shoes and place them on the rug.
143312111.title: Jump on Ambers toes

1433121111.content:
"Well guys we're in the house. Can we get off my sisters foot now please?", Scott asked.

You and Nathan glanced at eachother.

"Come on Scott. This is awesome! Were standing ontop of a giant foot! I say we stick around and have some fun.", said Nathan.

"Oh okay. Yeah, lets have fun on my sister!... Did you hear the words that just came out of my mouth!? This is weird guys! Lets just explore the house or something!"
1433121111.title: They stay on Ambers foot

choices: Dawson bursts into the bathroom and shrinks Amber
14331211111.content:
"Nah man, I think we're gonna stay with your sister," you say to Scott, which causes him to sigh and roll his eyes.

"Yeah man, if you wanna go off and explore the house go ahead, but we're gonna stay here," Nathan chimes in.

Scott is visibly annoyed. There are a lot of things he'd rather be doing right now than standing on his older sister's giant feet. But, he was in this situation now, and he didn't exactly feel comfortable wandering off on his own. So he might as well get comfortable right now.

--

Amber felt a slight rumbling in her stomach and knew she had to go to the bathroom. "Excuse me," she said, after letting out a quiet fart, and quickly made her way to the bathroom and locked the door. She made herself comfortable on the toilet, completely unaware that she had just brought, you, Nathan and Scott into the bathroom with her, all bug sized on her giant feet.

As she is sitting on the toilet, Amber casually glances up from her phone, and sees something moving on her foot. "Ewww," your giant cousin exclaims. She turns her foot, sending the three of you tumbling to the floor.

"Shit, get out of here," you yell, as Amber begins to raise her foot.

Carelessly thinking she was about to crush an ant under her foot, Amber begins to lower her foot down. Who does Amber crush?
14331211111.title: Stay with Amber

choices: Amber doesn't find either of you
143312111112.content:
To say Amber was grossed out would be an understatement. She literally had ants crawling on her foot. Where had they even come from? Outside no doubt. Damn Dawson keeping her outside just long enough for insects to come after her. She'd deal with these pests now.

She raised her foot high... and brought it down hard on the first ant she saw. Amber never even knew that the helpless ant she stomped underfoot was her own brother, Scott. Meanwhile down below, you and Nate were in a panic. Amber's foot hit the ground with the force of an atomic bomb.

You were sent flying by the shockwave and landed hard against the floor behind the toilet. Nathan landed hard against the bathroom wall before sliding down. Scott wasn't so lucky as he disappeared completely under his giant sister's foot. He never stood a chance as the sheer weight and force guaranteed he was smashed into paste. He was now nothing more than a bloody smear under Amber's divine sole.

"Damn bugs." Amber whispered.

Slowly you propped yourself up on your elbows and tried to regain your bearings. Amber had separated you all and crushed Scott flat. Poor Scott, if they got back to normal they could never tell Amber about his fate under her foot, it would crush her (No pun intended).

Amber's eyes scanned the bathroom floor, did she find you or Nathan?
143312111112.title: Stomp The Ants

choices: Amber leaves and someone new steps in
1433121111122.content:
Unfortunately your troubles weren't over yet. As Amber continued to scan around the bathroom, her eyes eventually locked-on to a new target... Nathan.

His collision with the wall must've messed him up good because the poor guy was now stumbling around unable to tell up from down. Was he concussed? It would explain why he was just roaming around?

You wanted to cry out to the guy, to warn him of the impending danger, but fear for your own wellbeing kept you from doing so. That and your voice probably wouldn't register anyway.

Amber for her part looked down at the ''bug'' with obvious disgust. Insects were one of if not the most gross creatures roaming the face of the earth. She hated them. Their multiple legs, long antenna, creepy little eyes, and mandibles. She hated every single thing about bugs.

This little pest took it upon itself to crawl on her person, it was the last mistake it would ever make. Narrowing her eyes she stomped over to target of her ire and raised her foot high. All you could do was watch in horror as the confused and not all their Nathan refused to move.

Just like with Scott, Amber brought her foot down and obliterated Nathan no the spot. Both boys were now reduced to barely noticeable stains on the bottom of her foot.

Seeing the carnage unfold brought you to your knees. They were gone, Scott and Nathan were gone. All three of them were the size of ants and Amber crushed them like such. You were the only one left now... Well, you and Dawson, but he wasn't shrunk so he didn't count.

Oh god. What were you going to tell Dawson if you made it out of this? What were you going to tell the other's when they wondered where the two had run off? That Scott and Nathan were painting Amber's foot? Not an option. You had to find some way to pull yourself together and get out of here.

"Two down. One more to go." Amber whispered.

All the color seemed to drain from your face at hearing those words. She was coming for you next. You were the only one not inhabiting the underside of her foot.

You had to be careful.
1433121111122.title: One is the loneliest number

choices: Someone finds the remote and reveals its power
After dinner, Dawson finds that the remote is missing
143312112.content:
Dawson breathed in relief as Amber and Dylan walked off through the trees back into the houses immediate backyard. He flicked the needle joint with distaste away and looked down at his trio of shrunken cousins.

"Jeez... that was close. You guys alright?"

"Yeah.", said Scott. "I dont think im going to be able to look at Amber the same way again."

"What? Why? Dawson and Dylan were just as gigantic.", Nathan pointed out.

The color flushed from Scotts face.

"I uh... I accidentally looked up under her dress and... saw...some...things."

Everbody couldnt help but snicker at Scotts bad stroke of misfortune. He was certainly not the kind of person who wouldnt enjoy a good view of an attractive girls upskirt looming high above him, but this particular girl happened to be his sister and he was obviously wanting to purge that memory from his brain.

"Ok guys I think Ive had enough. Dawson? Grow me back okay?"

Dawson gives him a "sure man" and fired the ray down enlarging all of them back up to regular height. Once again, you were splashed with a sense of vertigo that quickly passed once the ray receded back into the device.

"Well boys, dinner time. Guess we better move out.", said Dawson.

"Hold up. Where are you gonna keep that thing?"

"Uhm...well. I think we should keep it close to us but not too close. I think until dinners over Ill stash it in my coat pocket on the rack once we get into the house. Nobody should come across it there."

"Sounds as good a plan as any. Alright lets eat."

You all walk across the property and enter back into the busy, noisy house full of family members. You, Scott and Nathan go and take your seats at the dinner table as Dawson sneaks off to his coat and slips the device inside.
143312112.title: Stay with Dawson

A basketball sized green pod protruded from a clearing of dirt around the trees. The bodies of some of its roots poked out of the ground like they were sea serpants and the leaves that stuck out of the base of the pod were half the size of it. This thing definitely didnt fit its surroundings.

"Look at that thing man. Its gross looking."

"Have you seen anything like that before?"

"No. That looks like something youd find deep in jungles on the ends of earth."

Dave approaches the strange plant, ignoring Nathans objections. He picks up a stick and lightly pokes it, causing it to instantly react and pop open, releasing a small cloud of gas that is breathed in by him and Nathan.

"ACK!! Oh fuck! We just got poisoned! Dave you motherf...uugghhh...."

Dave and Nathan find themselves losing consciousness and eventually pass out.

an intruder with a strange device

1433131.content:
"Nate! Watch our backs bro come on!", said Dawson.

"It would be alot easier if someone was watching mine! Hurry up with that puzzle!"

You all had reached round 23 and tension was thick.

"Okay its done. Im gonna... Oh fuck! Shit! No! God dammit!", Dawson exclaimed.

"You died? For fucks sake man!"

"Shut up Dave."

Dawson slouched into the cushion in frustration and watched the three of you continue blowing up zombie heads. He pulled his phone out of his pocket and began texting his girlfriend Sophia, who was currently upstairs talking to her best friend Madelyn. Dawson had only met Sophia thanks to his cousin bringing her to a family reunion at one point a couple years back. Dawson had immediatly fallen for her shoulder length golden blonde hair, gorgeous face and shining brown eyes.

*"Hey babe. Still with Maddie?"

"Yep. Still with the boys?"

"Yep. My cousin Dave showed up while you were out on the porch. You should come down and meet him. Besides.. im starting to miss you 😪"

"Hahaha lol ik you are. Ok im coming down"

"Im counting the seconds ❤❤❤"

Dawson put his phone down and perked up from his slouched position.

"Hey Dave. Sophia's coming down to say hi."

Daves attention shifted from the game to his cousin.

"What? So... Sophias here? Oh, ok yeah cool."

"Dave! Get that guy!", Scott demanded.

"Oh sorry."

Dave had never met Sophia in person for in the 2 and a half years Dawson had been dating her as timing and circumstance had always gotten in the way whenever Dave and Dawson would meet. But Dave remembered seeing her at the family reunion and being in awe of her. He was much to scared to talk to her unlike his cousin.

Daves heart sank when he heard footsteps descending down the stairs, and sank to the point when he felt he was going to vomit when Sophia entered the room. Time seemed to move in slow motion as Dave admired her. He took notice of her atire, quickly studying over it as he performed a full body scan with his eyes as she approached the couch. Her turqoise socks. Her light blue jeans and black long sleeve v neck sweater that softly hugged her form, perfectly outlining the curvature of her hips and breasts. Dave also took notice of the gold key necklace she wore that Dawson had given her, which snapped him out of his trance when he realised Dawson was looking at him.

"Hey guys.", said Sophia.

"Hey babe."
"Hey."
"Hey Soph."
"Hiwo (cough cough) um hi... there... Sophia."

"Um.. (giggles) hey? You're Dave right?"

"Yep mm hm that is i. Haha."

"Ok. Its... nice to meet you."

Sophia walks over to Dawson and snuggles up to him, inquiring the others about what they're playing and striking up a conversation with the group as you're left to stew on how awkward you sounded.
1433131.title: Gargantuan girlfriend

14331311.content:
After a few more minutes of gameplay, Dave couldnt take the feeling of embarrassment and nervousness anymore. He had to take a break from everyone before he got a migraine. With a quick "Ill be back", Dave got off the couch and exited the room and headed off towards the bathroom.

Dave heard Dawson offer Sophia the now free controller, which made him even more embarrassed because there was no doubt that controller would have been made slick with his sweat and Sophia would notice how disgusting he is.

"God damn it.", he muttered, scurrying away faster than before until he reached the bathroom and shut the door behind him and locked it. Dave sat on the toilet and craddled his head in his hands, rubbing his temples in an effort to calm his nerves. He could practically feel the shade of cherry red that colored his face, not to mention how hot it was. He could only hope nobody noticed. He suspected Dawson knew something was up, but honestly, Dave could live with that. He felt confident that Dawson wouldnt tell Sophia anything, the worst thing that Dave forsaw was major teasing... no big deal.

This helped Dave regain his composure. He lifted his head from his hands and let out a big exhale before standing up again.

"(Sigh)... guess i better get back out there.", he said. "...Once i flush the toilet, dont want them thinking i was doing something gross in here.", he thought to himself.

Dave turned to flick the toilet lever when he saw something floating in the toilet bowl. At first glance, believing it was a turd, Dave winced in disgust, but upon a second of further inspection, he saw it wasnt a turd at all... or if it was, whoever it came from needed to see a doctor right away. This strange object had a dark colouration and was round in shape. It was about the size of a golfball with glowing veins pulsing all around its bumpy surface.

"Holy shit. What the hell is this thing?"

Dave couldnt stand the sight of this putrid thing any more. He prepared to send it down to the sewers, pressing the lever and watched the water start to drag it down. However, as it rode the spiraling current, it slammed against the walls of the toilet and cracked it, releasing a small spew of gas out of the toilet and right into Daves face, blinding him. He jumped back in disgust one second, and the next, he felt a sudden shift on himself, like gravity was pushing against him with 200 pounds of force. This brought Dave to his knees as he frantically rubbed his eyes. The pressure ceased and Dave stood up and blindly reached around looking for the sink so he could wash his face.

Dave felt nothing but free air no matter where he reached. Which made no sense as this bathroom was only 5' x 8'. Eventually Daves vision began to clear on its own, and once it did, he saw that he was now the size of an insect! Dave had shrunk to a mere half centimeter in height!

Dave was back to panicking. That piece of shit looking shit must have caused this... but how!? Wasnt this supposed to be impossible!?
14331311.title: The Turd of Shrinking

You were at a doorway, you were going to be spending your Friday night babysitting some kid, but you could only blame yourself. You told your mom that you needed some extra money, but you didnt think she would tell someone this and that you would have to end up babysitting.

You rang the doorbell and a nice lady, in her mid 30s, opened it. She had a big smile on her face and she was barely putting on her heels.

"Hi! You must be Davey. Come on in, I would like you to meet ___________"....
before we can get any further into this part of the story, who are these kids you have to be babysitting?

choice 2; a 10 year old girl
or

1441.content:
"I want to introduce you to the kids you'll be babysitting." She led you down the hallway to a room with two kids, a boy and a girl, all excited; they were sitting on one bed, bare feet dangling, and they were leaning forward. "This is Cody," the boy ran towards his mother and burrowed his face in her dress, "sorry about him, he's shy. Cody, say hello!" Cody looked up from his mom's dress once, and down again.

"H-hi," Cody said, and buried his face once more.

Indicating the girl, the mother said "and this is Melissa."

"Hi" Melissa said, in a bratty kind of voice.

"Now, this is your babysitter for the next week!" The mother spoke to you in a quiet voice, "Cody is 4, so he'll need to go to bed at 8:00, but Melissa can go to bed whenever she wants."

That didn't sound fair to you, and you knew that Cody will have a problem if he has to go to bed, but Melissa can go to bed whenever she wants. In fact, YOU have a problem with that! But, whatever... It's not your rules...

"Okay, kids," the mom said, "I'm going now... Bye!"

Cody was hanging on to his mother's leg all the way to the door.
1441.title: choice 1

choices: Putting you on the table to give her a foot rub
Setting you back on the couch so she can sit on you
14411.content:
You were happy to find that the children were pretty well behaved. Melissa mostly kept to her room, occasionally coming downstairs for something but just as quickly leaving. Cody on the other hand had gotten over his shyness for the most part and you had spent the evening playing video games. After dinner, which Melissa apparently didn't feel like, he obediently went to bed, leaving you alone to watch TV for the rest of the night.

It was around 8:30 when you heard footsteps on the stairs. You turned around, wondering if Cody couldn't sleep or something, but instead found his sister standing at the foot of the stairs. Melissa was wearing long black sweat pants and a purple shirt with a logo from My Little Pony; on her wrist was an antiquated gold bracelet with red gems all over it.

"Where'd you get that?" You ask pointing to the bracelet, you're worried she might have taken it from her mother's jewelry box.

"Its mine, I found it," She replies walking over to the couch.

"Really, where?" You question, trying to sound interested as opposed to suspicious, you still didn't believe her.

"In the forest out behind the house," She answered, seizing the TV remote, "Its magic, wanna see?" She tacks on as she flips the TV to some girly show.

"Hey, give that back," You say, grabbing for the remote, you no longer cared about her bracelet.

Melissa held the remote as high as she could, but you easily snatched it away. Sitting down you flipped back to Deadliest Warrior and turned to see Melissa reaching towards you. Slightly annoyed you move the remote to the opposite side of the couch, but Melissa keeps her hand extended. As you are about to ask her to stop, you notice the gems on her bracelet glowing brightly.

A sudden wave of vertigo hits you like a brick. You keel over clutching your head as the strange sensation of falling overtakes you. Just as you feel ready to pass out, it fades. You look over to ask Melissa what happened, only to see her gigantic fingers wrapping around your body. It takes but a second to realize that you're only a foot tall, unfortunately within this second you're lifted up to Melissa's face, a fact you realize when her hot, chocolatey breath washes over you.

The eight-year old's voice nearly deafens you as she speaks excitedly, "Wow, I've never tried that on a person before!"

"What did you do to me?" You inquire in an aggressive tone, swinging your arms about.

"I shrank you with my magic bracelet because you wouldn't give me the remote!" Melissa answers, her tone becoming angry towards the end, "Speaking of which, that was mean!"

"I'm sorry Melissa, that was wrong. Now could you please grow me back.

"No!" Melissa yells getting her spit all over your face, "You're going to be my toy now," Melissa explains with a dark grin.

Melissa's hand suddenly begins to move. What is she doing?
14411.title: Everything's Right Until Its Night

144111.content:
"Well I guess slave would be a more fitting title," Melissa notes, dropping you down on the glass topped coffee table.

Dazed and confused, you look around, then unfortunately down. What you once saw as an interesting piece of furniture has become a psychologically-scarring landscape. You had never been in any building with a see-through glass floor, but you could only imagine that this is far worse. The clearly visible carpet seems miles below and the glass makes you feel as if you could fall through. You move around blindly, unable to take your eyes off the ground as you seek stable ground. Your drunken stumbling causes you to collide with the bottom of Melissa's foot which she has propped up the table. Recoiling at the strong vinegar-like odor of her foot, you hear Melissa starting to talk again.

"Oh, excellent slave!," Melissa exclaims excitedly, "How did you know I wanted a foot rub?"

"Um?" Is all you managed to say, you're still reeling from the foot odor and didn't understand the question anyway.

"Doesn't matter! Go on get to work, I'll tell you when to stop," Melissa informs you as she brings up her other foot to join the first.

You simply stand there dumbfounded. You don't know whether to go through with it or not and quite frankly the prospect of being this little girl's slave also has you thinking about escaping, maybe hiding until her parents come back so they can help you.

"Bug, I want my foot rub! I'm not going to ask again!" You hear Melissa's bratty voice call down, she seems pretty peeved. She definitely wouldn't take to kindly to an attempted escape.

So what do you do?

"Hey, Davey....you seem shorter."

You freeze at the sound of Nicole's voice behind you. Resisting the urge to flee to your room, you face the situation coolly, in hopes of attracting a minimal amount of attention.

"Nah, that's impossible, I'm just slouching," You lie, glancing back.

"I dunno," Nicole says, walking towards you, "You must be 'slouching' quite a bit.

You turn turn to face Nicole, about to defend yourself, but find that she has her own winning argument against you, her firm C-cup breasts to which you were now at eye-level. When, Nicole had first walked in you were eye-to-eye!

"Didn't realize, I'd be babysitting so many little kids," Nicole joked, almost unfazed by your change in height.

"Okay, it started a few minutes ago, please help me!" You pleaded with her.

"Hmmm..." Nicole crossed her arms and tapped a finger on her lip as if deeply thinking.

"Please!" You dropped to your knees, inadvertently lowering your face to Nicole's crotch.

"Okay, but first you're gonna have to do a few things for me," Nicole says, looking down on you with a wicked smile.

You felt backed into a corner, on one hand you felt like you needed help soon, but on the other hand you had no idea what Nicole wanted you to do. You also wondered if maybe the shrinking was only temporary, and would wear off in an hour or so, instead of getting worse. In any case you had to make a decision...

Just as your about to question her again about the specifics, you start shrinking even more. The nice chest of Nicole soon rose above you, leaving her C cups over your head now. You shrunk all the way til you were face to face with her belly button, making you around 3 and a half feet tall now.

"Ahaha Your going to have to agree with my conditions now." Nicole says laughing at your reduced size.

info.brief_description: Your life will be changed as you or others grow or shrink.
info.description:
You find yourself going through a normal day when you or others start to change size.

This is supposed to be a fun story so the more people add on to it, the funner and better this story will become.You can grow to anything under 1500 feet, and shrink down to anything above 1/16 inch tall.

For the first time in a story, Im letting the reader be a female character, I realized that not every one who will read this will be a guy so I want to be fair.

Here are the characters; You, the main character, can be any of these three people;
You- Either, Davey, a 16 year old guy with a normal life, family and girlfriend. He is normally 5'10. Davey is intelligent and atheletic, he has dark colored hair and is very well-liked.
or,
Elizebeth, Liz or short. She is a teenage girl, she is very attractive and has long, beautiful hair, a nice body and is very playful and fun. She has a size fetish and has often dreamnt of being a giantess or being shrunken. She normally is 5'6 in height and likes to play sports ( soccer, baseball and basketball being her favorites.)
or,
Sean, a 35 year old guy who works at an office for a big business. He lives with his wife, and two daughters. Sean is normally 5/9 in height, he is smart and is very 'cautious'.


Other Character's;
Adrianna, she is Davey's 11 year old sister, she has long brown hair, she is very pretty but has a punky attitude, she loves to mess with Davey, she is normally only 4'10 tall.

Clara is your 17 year old sister, she has a great body and is very good looking. She has long black hair, she is playful and doesnt like Davey too much. She is normally 5'7 tall

Jacob is your five year old brother, he is very playful and Davey is his idol. He has short black hair and he is about 3'9 normally.

Ann, is Davey's mother. She is still in good shape for her age, she has dark colored hair like Davey and is very playful. She is a fun person and this may or may not be a good thing. Is normally 5'4.

Rick, Davey's dad, he isn't home much if at all. He is like Davey so there really isn't need for a good description for him.
_______________________________________

Eddie, Liz's older brother. He is around 17 years old and never really got along with Liz. He is normally 5'11 and spends alot of time at their house. He is a little bit of a trouble maker as well.

Ray, Liz's younger brother. Ray is 2 years older than Liz and is a very nice person. he usually does what Liz says and is very quiet. He is smart andlikes to be succesful in anything he does. He is normally 5'6 tall.

Susie, Liz's older sister. She is 23 years old and isn't home as often. She has long brown hair and has always gotten along with Liz. She is normally 5'1 and is called short sometimes which gets her mad.

Goerge, Liz's father. he is a very strict person, former marine and is still a pretty big dude being 6 feet tall and in great shape. He loves football and often punishes Liz for anything she does wrong.

Mary, Liz's mother. Get along with her daughter and loves her family. She resembles Liz alot and is normally 5'7.
________________________

Kim, Sean's wife. Kim has an amazing body and is has loved her husband, Sean for the past 5 years, which they were married. She is very pretty and is a nice lady. Kim hates bugs though and likes to shop, but not as much as she use to when she wasn't with Sean. She is normally 5'4 tall

Isabel, Sean's daughter. Isabel is a 12 year old girl, she has long hair and is very atheltic. Isabel likes her dad alot but sometimes gets in trouble with him for wahtever reason. Isabel is normally 4'9

Amy, Sean's 6 year old daughter. Amy likes her dad and likes to play. Amy is cute and doesn't get mad often. She has alot of dolls and toys and stuff. She is normally 3'11

Rules
-keep chapter above a sentence, make them about two sentences in length at least
- good grammar and spelling, for this story, Im going to fix any chapters that have any misspelled words, okay
-Im fine with alot of stuff here in this story and those are my only rules.

Have fun, add on to this story, and enjoy.

Im amazed as I realize just how well this interactive has done. It has nearly 50 thousand views and over 600 chapters.
